"Vajra” Barolo DOCG Piedmont
$140.00
Generous aromas of fresh black cherry, dried roses, and tar. Palate has concentrations of red fruits noted by dried cranberry and cocoa.
“Barbi” Brunello Di Montalcino DOCG Tuscany
$240.00
Well-balanced sweetness & acidity with good complexity & a fruity aftertaste of apricots.
Lombardi  Brunello Di Montalcino DOCG Tuscany
$165.00
Full Bodied brunello with deep cherry flavors
“Marchesa Mariabella” DOC Valpolicella Ripasso Veneto
$95.00
Notes of dried red cherry with hints of herbal aromatics, plums, and cloves. Beautiful pairing with rich meat pastas and steaks.
Traversa Barbera D'alba
$65.00
Traversa Langhe Nebbiolo DOCG
$74.00
aromas of dried cherry.
“Traversa” Barbaresco DOC Piedmont
$149.00
Dry, full, strong, velvety with ripe cherry jam, soft leather, and a hint of anise.
“Traversa” Canova Barbaresco Riserva 2012 Piedmont
$220.00
Rich nose with black cherries ripe strawberries, cassis, and light tones of vanilla. Chocolate and espresso play well into a satisfying smoky tobacco tone. Light anise and licorice.
Monte degli Angeli Pinot Noir
$65.00
This wine its rich and silky, aromas of red berries like raspberry
“La Salette” Amarone DOCG Valpolicella Veneto
$185.00
Full-bodied with a velvety, warm mouthfeel and long finish. Dried and jammy fruit characteristics with vanilla and toasted oak coming through from the back end.
Giuseppes Cellar Select
Santa Maria La Nave” Calmarossa Sicily
$199.00
Captivating notes of red cherry and spices with a beautiful tertiary note of volcanic ash. Situated on the side of a volcano, this vineyard has developed a unique and beautiful wine.
Guiseppe Quintarell
$499.00/1.5ML
The bouquet is accompanied by notes of roasted coffee and cocoa powder. Caressing layered mouthfeel. Closing with spicy notes of pepper and licorice that merge with pleasant sensations of aromatic herbs. Lengthy finish.
“Sassicaia” Antinori 2019 Tuscany
$599.00
Intense ruby red color. On the nose, it’s rich and alluring with notes of tobacco, licorice, plum, and balsamic. light, elegant aromas of toasted coffee. On the palate, it’s characterized by precision and purity. Tannins are of outstanding quality.
Antinori Tignanello DOCG
$399.00
“Solaia” Antinori 2019 Tuscany
$799.00
Notes of small red fruit, especially raspberries and mulberries, lead over to the sweet sensations of ripe apricots. The palate is enveloping, and harmonious with an excellent and well-balanced structure.
“Fuedo Montoni” Vrucara Prephylloxera 2018 Sicily
$135.00
A bright ruby red color, Vrucara is intense on the nose with earthy aromas, and notes of red plum and dark berries, which are in harmony with notes of rose petals, vanilla, and balsamic. Soft and velvety on the palate, with delicate acidity and well-balanced and soft tannins.
Silver Oak” Napa Valley Cabernet California
$499.00
Black cherry and huckleberry aroma laced with dry floral notes. Ruby in color, it has a fruit-forward entry with silky tannins. Structured while still approachable.
Opus One” Robert Mondavi California
$699.00
Intense aromas of black plum, blueberry, black currant, and dried rose petals. Dark fruit flavors, savory herbs, espresso, and cocoa. A delicate dark chocolate bitterness lingers on the finish.
Chateau Palmer” Grand Cru Classe    2007
$699.00
49% Merlot, 44% Cab Sauvignon, and 7% Petit Verdot
This dry wine has a medium body, with a silky, smooth, and fresh character and notes of blackcurrant, cassis, chocolate, earth, and tobacco on the nose and palate. Smooth tannins lead to a long, uncluttered finish.
“Louis Jadot” Nuits-Saint-George    Premier Cru 2016  Burgundy
$150.00
100% Pinot Noir. Aromas of ripe red cherry and raspberry with hints of earth and spice. On the palate, it shows concentrated fruit flavors, firm tannins, and a savory, age-worthy structure typical of this prestigious appellation.

Our Menu
DINNER MENU
WINE - BEER
Cocktails
20% gratuity may be added for parties 8 or more we cook with, wheat, dairy, nuts & shellfish | Consuming raw meat, poultry, shellfish or unpasteurized milk may lead to foodborne  illness
ANTIPASTO EARTH
Arancinette Alla Carne
$15.00
Bite-sized balls of premium rice, filled with slow-cooked meat, fried to a golden-brown perfection, served with Sicilian tomato sauce and a drizzle of rich cheese sauce.
Carpaccio Tartufato
$35.00
Thinly sliced beef with arugula & caramelized cherry tomatoes, finished with truffle tomato sauce, shaved parmigiana and fresh truffle.
Speck and Dates
$15.00
Smoky speck from northern Italy on top of sweet dates, topped with salty parmesan chunks and served on a creamy parmesan foam.
Tagliere Italiano
$39.00
The finest charcuterie ingredients Italy has to offer. Cured meats, delectable cheeses, and other carefully selected ingredients.
Bruschetta Pomodoro
$15.00
Perfectly grilled bread with a zesty mixture of sweet cherry tomatoes and garlic that has been marinated in olive oil. Served with a drizzle of balsamic, lemon zest, fresh basil and aged Parmigiano.
Melanzane Alla Parmigiana
$18.00
Sliced eggplant, layered with a rich San Marzano tomato sauce, and topped with a blend of mozzarella and aged Parmigiano Reggiano cheese.
Prosciutto & Melone
$20.00
Twenty-four month aged prosciutto San Daniele topped with the best hand picked cantaloupe and finished with a drizzle of honey.
Polpette Della Nonna
$20.00
Experience the flavors of Italy with Nonna's Homemade Meatballs, lovingly prepared and served with a delightful Sicilian tomato sauce with freshly baked bread.
Wild Zucchini Blossom
$15.00
Wild Zucchini blossom tempura, served with a drizzle of truffle mayo and 24 month aged parmigiano.
ANTIPASTO SEA
Octopus Carpaccio
$15.00
Thinly sliced octopus, with cherry tomatoes, dill, olive oil and a drizzle of lemon juice.
Frittura Di Pesce
$25.00
A combination of calamari, argentinian shrimp and flavorful sardines, all lightly battered and fried to perfection. Garnished with lemon and Sicilian tomato sauce.
Gambero Rosso
$18.00
Perfectly breaded and baked Argentinian shrimp with the heads on. Topped with chimichurri.
Polipo Don Pino
$23.00
Tender octopus that is grilled to perfection and seasoned with a mix of aromatic herbs, garlic, olive oil, paprika and lemon juice. Finished on a bed of a refreshing yogurt sauce and topped with fried capers and pine nuts.
Cozze Di Pino
$18.00
Sautéed mussels in a tomato, garlic, and white wine sauce served with toasted bread.
Tonno & Burrata
$25.00
Thinly sliced tuna curd marinated and rolled in a soy honey vinaigrette, served on a bed of 100% Italian cow milk Burrata.
Insalata
Caprese
$15.00
Our caprese is a modern twist on a classic dish. Heirloom tomato, basil & fior di latte mozzarella, dressed with the finest olive oil and aged balsamic vinegar.
Panzanelle
$17.00
Cucumbers, olives, heirloom & cherry tomatoes, and onion served with a light mustard & lemon vinaigrette dressing, fior di latte mozzarella, all on a bed of croutons.
La Insalata Di Caesar
$15.00
Crisp, fresh romaine lettuce with crunchy croutons, complemented by a rich & creamy caesar dressing all prepared to perfection tableside.
Wild Green
$15.00
This is a modern twist on a classic dish. Wild arugula salad with a light truffle garlic caesar dressing, with a touch of croutons.
Contorni
Pollo Milanese
$14.00
Side of breaded chicken served with a lemon wedge and sea salt.
Spinaci In Padella
$12.00
Salted spinach served with parmigiano and drizzle of balsamic.
Gambero Rosso
$18.00
Perfectly breaded and baked Argentinian shrimp with heads on. Topped with salsa verde. (Chimichurri)
Sofia's Asparagus
$14.00
Poached asparagus baked with bread crumbs and parmigiano.
Mixed Green Salad
$9.00
Mixed green salad with heirloom tomatoes tossed with lemon vinaigrette dressing and aged parmigiano.
Pasta
Add fresh black truffles $35.00
Bucatini Cacio & Tartufo
$55.00
Our take on a traditional recipe where we combine Caccio cheese, Parmigiano, and pepper all sauteed together with bucatini pasta creating a creamy & cheesy white sauce that is topped off with seasonal fresh truffle.
Signature Carbonara
$30.00
Expertly crafted with the finest ingredients, our creamy pasta is enriched with savory pancetta and finished to perfection inside a wheel of aged Parmigiano-Reggiano. Every bite is a sensory experience, with the richness of the sauce and the salty tang of the cheese | *This dish contains eggs.
Tagliolini  Bolognese
$30.00
Slow cooked Bolognese, a true labor of love, infused with aromatic herbs and spices that perfectly balance the dish's bold flavors. Topped with Ricotta.
Bucatini Pompa
$30.00
Bucatini pasta, in a cherry tomato sauce topped with burrata cheese and basil.
Gnocchi Sorrentina
$29.00
A classic Italian pasta, Gnocchi in a slow-cooked red sauce with fragrant garlic, fresh basil, and a dash of cream to create a sauce that is both sweet and savory.
Gnocchi Al Formaggio
$25.00
Gnocchi in a decadent four cheese sauce with fragrant flavor. A classic Italian pasta dish.
Rigatoni alla Vodka
$28.00
A dish that expertly balances the bold and tangy flavors of tomato sauce with the silky smooth richness of vodka sauce.
Pacchero Pancetta & Burrata
$30.00
Pachero pasta in a pistachio cream sauce with pancetta, topped with burrata and crispy pancetta.
Lasagna
$25.00
You have 4 options, first choose the type of lasagna, Bianca or Rossa. Bianca includes béchamel, mushroom and spinach. Rossa includes béchamel, bolognese and pomodoro. Then choose your size. Single portion or sharable for the table. Single Portion $30.00. Sharable Portion $68.00
Tagliolini Sicilia Mia
$35.00
Home-made tagliolini with a mix of clams, mussels, shrimp & calamari cooked to perfection in a garlic white wine sauce, and chopped tomato finished with a drizzle of olive oil.
Tagliolini Alle Vongole
$30.00
Home-made tagliolini with plump juicy clams that are cooked to perfection in a garlic white wine sauce, and finished with a touch of fresh lemon zest.
Ravioli Sage & Butter
$30.00
Ravioli filled with butternut squash is a classic Italian pasta dish that is served with a sage and butter sauce then topped with Parmigiano.
Tortelli Alla Parmigiana
$30.00
Eggplant filled tortelli served in a cherry tomato sauce and topped with ricotta & a dust of parmigiano.
Tortelli  alla Genovese
$35.00
Tortelli filled with slowly cooked beef and onions (Genovese sauce ) served in a bed of parmigiana cream , beets dots and a sprinkle of walnuts.
Angelo's Agnelotti
$33.00
Agnolotti filled with prosciutto , brie and walnuts, Served with butter sauce fresh aged parmigiana, honey, crispy prosciutto and balsamic caviar.
Ravioli Mushroom
$33.00
Ravioli filled with white wine, portobello mushroom, parmigiano, and sausage, in a butter mushroom sauce. Topped with spinach and sweet Modena balsamic.
Secondi - CARNE
Add Black truffle mushroom butter $15
Add seared foie gras $25
Porcini Bone-in Ribeye
$99.00
Piedmontese bone-in ribeye, cooked to perfection and carved table side, then finished in a cast iron pan and served with a Sicilian chimichurri sauce called Salmoriglio. Add truffle butter 15$
Filetto al Gorgonzola
$65.00
Perfectly seared & tender Piedmontese Filet Mignon, covered with our delicate gorgonzola cheese sauce. Add truffle butter 15$
Bistecca Alla Griglia
$69.00
Expertly seasoned Piedmontese ribeye, this truly premium cut is finished with a touch truffle butter
Milanese Alla Pizzaiola
$28.00
Milanese-style breaded chicken breast that is topped with tomato sauce, basil, oregano, and mozzarella and finally baked in the oven.
Secondi - Seafood
Branzino Saltimbocca
$35.00
Pan seared Branzino, sautéed with butter sage lemon sauce, capers, and topped with prosciutto & parmigiano.
Salmone Livornese
$35.00
King Salmon pan-seared to perfection and served with a tomato livornese sauce, made with capers, olives, onion and oregano.
Cioppino
$39.00
Cioppino is a classic San Francisco seafood stew. Our version features a delicious medley of fresh salmon, clams, mussels, shrimp, and calamari. Finished with a baked pizza dough that we place on top of the stew and then open tableside.
Want to try a wine first? Ask for a sample! 1.5 oz for $5.50 (Dolfo & Lambardi 1 oz) .
(Limited to 2 per person, and 1 per type, only wines available by glass) | Ask your server about availability. Prices subject to change. Please drink responsibly!
Sparkling
"Villa Minelli" Prosecco Brut DOC
$13.00
$55.00
A fresh, fruity, and easy-to-drink sparkling wine with a creamy, delicate texture and mineral notes.
"Kylie Minogue" Rose’ Prosecco
$15.00
$65.00
Aromas of fresh strawberries, raspberries, and blossom, it has a well-balanced sweetness with a crisp palate and a refreshing citrus finish. Note : Ask to see the bottle...its one of a kind!
"Nino Franco Rustico" Prosecco Superiore DOCG
$79.00
Light-bodied wine with gorgeously elegant notes of pear, citrus, honeysuckle, and bread dough. It has a creamy, soft texture with persistent effervescence and a dry, refreshing palate offering crisp yellow apple, lemon drop, orange zest flavors balanced by vibrant acidity. 92 Points.
"Monte Rossa" Franciacorta Rose Brut
$120.00
Blend of Chardonnay and Pinot Noir grapes, elegant and refreshing, offering vibrant flavors of red berries, citrus, and a subtle minerality, balanced by a lively acidity and a smooth, creamy finish.
"Monte Rossa" Blanc de Blanc Brut
$110.00
An elegant bouquet of green apple, citrus fruits, and white flowers, complemented by subtle notes of brioche and almonds. On the palate, it is crisp and refreshing, with a creamy mousse and vibrant flavors of lemon zest, pear, and a hint of minerality, balanced by a lively acidity and a long, sophisticated finish.
"Pol Roger" Reserve
$199.00/750ml
$449.00/1500ml
Champagne that first delivers aromas of fruit & then releases light flavors of honeysuckle & white jasmine, lingering on vanilla & brioche notes. 33% Pinot Noir, 33% Pinot Meunier, 33% Chardonnay
"Pol Roger" Vintage 2016 Brut
$240.00
Aromas of smoky peach, apple, pastry cream, white flowers, and mandarin. On the palate It has a refined mousse, racy balancing acidity, and layers of complexity with notes of green apple, spice, citrus, and yeasty brioche. 60% Pinot Noir, 40% Chardonnay
"Ruinart" Blanc de Blanc
$249.00
Notes of nectarines & citrus fruits with a pleasant mineral quality with a long, very refreshing finish. 100% Chardonnay
"Dom Perignon" Vintage 2012/2013
$470.00
A delicate yet complex nose that unfolds in layers of color and aroma. On the palate, it is elegant with a luxuriant yet precise mouthfeel. The attack is enveloping and ethereal, leading to a refined, silky mid-palate. 98 Points

Peroni

$65.00

$59.00

"Vosca Aria" Pinot Grigio IGT Veneto
$13.00
$55.00
Light bodied and crisp, with flavors of lemon zest, pear, and a hint of almond, balanced by lively acidity and a clean, refreshing finish. Ideal for pairing with seafood.
"Terredora" Falanghina Campania
$14.00
$59.00
An enticing bouquet of citrus fruits, green apple, and white flowers, enhanced by subtle notes of almond and Mediterranean herbs. On the palate, it is medium-bodied and crisp, offering refreshing flavors of lemon, pear, and a hint of honey, balanced by a lively acidity and a clean, mineral finish. Ideal for pairing with seafood, fresh salads, and light pasta dishes.

$18.00
$75.00

SWEET WINES
"Sourgal" Moscato d'asti
$14.00
$59.00
A delightful dessert wine, this Moscato d'Asti dazzles with its pale golden hue and a fragrant bouquet of ripe peaches, apricots, and orange blossoms, accented by hints of honey and white flowers. On the palate, it is light-bodied and gently effervescent, delivering luscious flavors of juicy stone fruits, citrus, and a touch of tropical fruit, balanced by refreshing acidity and a smooth, sparkling finish. $49.00

$90.00

$59.00

$75.00
Deep ruby red in color with aromas of red and black fruits, such as cherries, plums, and blackberries, t is a rich and intense wine with flavors of ripe red and black fruits, complemented by hints of spice and a wellstructured tannic profile.
Marchesi di barolo Barbera DOC
$16.00/Glass
$65.00/Bottle
Medium Bodied wine. clean scent of wild Barries
"Vajra” Barbera D’Alba DOCG Piedmont

$69.00

$59.00
Dry, Full bodied wine with bold flavors of ripe red fruits. Pairs well with tomato based dishes like lasagna and ragu.

$85.00
Ruby red in color with aromas of cherries, red plum, blackberry, warm spices like cinnamon and clove. Soft, velvety texture with delicate tannins on the palate.ody of soft and velvety texture.
“Russiz” Cabernet Franc Superiore DOC Veneto
$89.00
A profound and limited Cabernet Franc from Italy's Collio region. Aged for 12 mths in French Oak. Incredible depth and plushness with soft, velvety tannins that glide across the palate. Notes of ripe red fruits are complemented by a kiss of oak lending a luxurious, velvety texture. Only 10,000 bottles produced, making this a rare gem. The wine has a medium to full body with supple tannins.

$150.00
An enticing bouquet of red cherries, violets, and rose petals, interwoven with notes of licorice, tobacco, and a hint of earthy truffle. It is full-bodied and well-structured, with layers of ripe red fruit, spice, and a touch of minerality. The firm tannins and vibrant acidity lead to a long, sophisticated finish. Pairs well with braised meats and charcuterie
“Marchesi Di Barolo” Barolo DOCG Piedmont
$150.00
Experience the essence of Piedmont with this exceptional Barbera. Featuring a deep ruby color, this wine offers an intense bouquet of red and black berries with hints of vanilla and toasted oak. On the palate, it delights with ripe cherries & blackberries, balanced by bright acidity and smooth tannins with a long, refreshing finish. Enjoy with pasta, grilled meats, or aged cheeses for a truly memorable dining experience.
"Vajra” Barolo DOCG* Piedmont
$140.00
This Barolo captivates with its garnet red color and complex aromas of red cherries, roses, and tar, enhanced by subtle notes of anise and truffle. On the palate, it reveals a harmonious balance of rich fruit flavors, firm tannins, and a refined acidity, leading to a long, sophisticated finish. Perfectly paired with hearty meat dishes, truffle-infused recipes, or aged cheeses.
“Banfi” Brunello Di Montalcino DOCG Tuscany
$170.00
This iconic wine boasts a deep garnet color and an exquisite bouquet of ripe cherries, plums, and dried herbs, accented by hints of vanilla, tobacco, and leather. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and velvety texture, with complex flavors of dark fruit, spice, and a touch of earthiness. The well-structured tannins and balanced acidity culminate in a long, elegant finish. Perfect for pairing with roasted meats, game, and rich pasta dishes.
“Lambardi” Brunello Di Montalcino DOC Tuscany
$165.00
A powerful, full-bodied Brunello with deep cherry flavors along with notes of tobacco and cedar. It is concentrated but balanced, with a firm tannic backbone.
“Marchesa Mariabella” Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore DOC*
$95.00
Notes of dried red cherry with hints herbal aromatics, plums, and cloves. Beautiful pairing with rich meat pastas and steaks.
Guiseppe Traversa Collection
Traversa is an historic winery founded in 1834, with a long tradition of producing wines from the Langhe region using traditional methods. They are particularly renowned for their Barbaresco wines made from the Nebbiolo grape, which is one of the flagship wines of the Langhe region.
“Traversa” Barbera D’Alba DOC* Piedmont | Single CRU
$65.00
The palate is graced with a lively acidity, velvety tannins and layers of cherry, plum, smoke, and subtle spice.
“Traversa” Langhe Nebbiolo DOCG* Piedmont | Single CRU
$74.00
Layered aromas of dried cherries, plum, vanilla, spice. Featuring an equally complex palate with bright acidity and creamy tannins.
“Traversa” Barbaresco Starderi DOCG* Piedmont | Single CRU
$149.00
Aged for 2 years, one of which in oak barrels. The palate is dry, full, strong, velvety, ripe cherry jam, soft leather, hint of anise and harmonic.
“Traversa” Canova Barbaresco Riserva 2012 DOCG
$220.00
Produced only in the best vintages. Aged 7 years in small Allier oak barrels and 2 years in the bottle. This stunning Barbaresco shows ripe cherry and strawberries,
heavenly flavors of cocoa and sweet rose and violet notes, roasted hazelnuts, ripe, round and firm tannins that last. Pairing: Rich pastas, savory meats, game.
Other
“Monte degli Angeli” Pinot Noir DOC* Piedmont
$64.00
This wine captivates with its rich, silky texture and smooth tannins. On the nose, it offers aromas of red berries like raspberry and strawberry, complemented by floral notes reminiscent of rose petals. The palate bursts with flavors of cherry, ripe tomato, and a hint of red currant.
“La Salette” Amarone della Valpolicella DOCG | Veneto
$185.00
This Amarone boasts a deep ruby color and a luxurious bouquet of dried cherries, figs, and dark chocolate, accented by hints of spices, tobacco, and roasted coffee. On the palate, it is full-bodied and velvety, offering rich flavors of blackberries, prunes, and sweet spices, balanced by well- integrated tannins and a touch of balsamic complexity.
Giuseppe’s Private Cellar Selections
ITALY
“Santa Maria La Nave” Calmarossa Etna Rosso 2019 | Sicily
$199.00
Captivating notes of red cherry and spices with a beautiful tertiary note of volcanic ash. Situated on the side of a volcano, this vineyard has developed a unique and beautiful wine.
“Tenuta San Guido” Sassicaia 2019 DOCG | Tuscany
$599.00
An elegant, complex blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Cabernet Franc, it captivates with intense aromas of ripe red/black fruits, mulled spices, rose petals and sandalwood. On the palate, layers of juicy berries and black fruits mingle with savory notes of licorice and cured meat, framed by polished tannins and brilliant acidity.
“Antinori” Tignanello DOCG 2020 Tuscany
$369.00
80% Sangiovese, 15% Cab Sauv, 5% Cab Franc Intense ruby red color. It offers complex aromas of ripe red fruits like cherries, berries, along with floral notes, roasted coffee, and cocoa powder. The palate is vibrant and layered, with silky tannins, notes of pepper, licorice, and herbs, leading to a fresh, lengthy finish.
“Antinori” Solaia 2018 Tuscany
$799.00
73% Cab Sauv, 20% Sangiovese, 7% Cab Franc Aromas of ripe black plum, cassis, fresh lavender, graphite, mint, clove, white pepper, and cherry blossoms complemented by notes of roasted coffee beans. The palate is concentrated yet silky and elegant, with flavors echoing the aromatic profile. It shows impressive structure, bright acidity.
“Barbi” Brunello Di Montalcino DOCG Tuscany
$199.00
Brilliant ruby red with a touch of garnet. Intense aromas of ripe cherry rounded by scents of citrus and spices, wild herbs, earthy hues. On the palate, the wine is soft and balanced with delicate tannins and vibrant acidity, long persistency. 93 Points
CHILE
“Almaviva” 2016 Puento Alto
$420.00
76% Cab Sauv, 24% Carmenère, Cab Franc, Petit Verdot Elegant, powerful and well-structured, with a refined mix of dark fruit, dried red fruit and spice flavors. Flavors of blackberry, black cherry, plum, dark chocolate, coffee,
herbal tea, and baking spices with soft tannins and integrated oak.
FRANCE
“Chateau Palmer” Grand Cru Classe 2007 Margaux, Bordeaux
$490.00
49% Merlot, 44% Cab Sauvignon, and 7% Petit Verdot This dry wine has a medium body, with a silky, smooth, and fresh character and notes of blackcurrant, cassis, chocolate, earth, and tobacco on the nose and palate. Smooth tannins lead to a long, uncluttered finish.
“Joseph Faiveley” Puligny-Montrachet 2017 Burgandy
$249.00
Made from 100% Chardonnay grapes, this wine exhibits a brilliant golden color and an aromatic bouquet of citrus fruits, green apple, and white flowers, with subtle notes of almond and vanilla. On the palate, it is medium-bodied and impeccably balanced, offering vibrant flavors of lemon, pear, and toasted nuts, complemented by a lively acidity and a smooth, mineral-driven finish. Ideal for pairing with seafood, poultry, and creamy pasta dishes, this wine promises a sophisticated and memorable wine experience.
“Chateau La Nerthe”   Chateauneuf-du-pape 2016  Southern Rhône Valley
$149.00
Aromas of incense, smoke, black raspberry, thyme, and Mediterranean herbs. On the palate, it is medium-bodied with a sweet and tart wild cherry profile, soft textures, and a finish of espresso and smoke-filled red berries. A highly-rated, full-bodied Southern Rhône red blend
UNITED STATES
“Silver Oak” Cabernet Sauv 2018 Napa
$499.00
Black cherry and huckleberry aroma laced with dry floral notes. Ruby in color, it has a fruit-forward entry with silky tannins. Structured while still approachable.
“Opus One” Cab Sav Blend 2019 California
$699.00
78% Cabernet Sauvignon, 8% Merlot, 6% Petit Verdot, 6% Cabernet Franc, 2% Malbec. 22 days skin contact & 19 months in new French Oak Intense aromas of black plum, blueberry, black currant, and dried rose petals. Dark fruit flavors, savory herbs, espresso, and cocoa. A delicate dark chocolate bitterness lingers on the finish.
Ask your server about availability. Prices subject to change. Please drink responsibly!

AUTHENTIC ITALIAN FOOD FOR DINE IN OR TO GO
At Brio, we believe that to eat well is to live well. We only use the freshest and highest quality ingredients, making sure that every meal is a truly memorable dining experience. Ask your server for the perfect wine or crafted cocktail to compliment our signature Carpaccio with shaved tender beef, capers, and mustard aioli to start your meal. Enjoy an authentic taste of Tuscany with our Spaghetti Bolognese or Pasta Brio. Tuscan inspired Italian restaurant menu is sure to satisfy. Make it a Brio dinner to remember with our double-cut New Zealand Lamb Chops, Grilled Chicken Marsala, or Gorgonzola Crusted Beef Medallions. Whether you’re enjoying a romantic dinner for two or celebrating a special occasion with family and friends, the Brio dinner menu is the perfect way to indulge in all your favorite Italian dishes.
We’re open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner with Brunch on weekends. Reserve your table and
DINE IN
or
ORDER TO GO
for Brio Italian food delivery or curbside pickup. Planning a gathering for 20 or more? Click
GROUP DINING
to get all the details you need to plan your special event, birthday party, family celebration, or corporate event. Want the party delivered? Visit our
CATERING
page for easy ordering for 10 or more. Join us for a great Italian dinner in the restaurant or take out to enjoy at home.
Buon Appetito!

Welcome

Restaurant
BOHO BLOG

OLD SCHOOL FOOD
Our menu is a balance of old-world european special fare
combined with pub classics and american favorites.
OUR FOOD IS ALWAYS MADE WITH THE FRESHEST INGREDIENTS — WE MAKE EVERYTHING FROM SCRATCH DAILY. ALWAYS NATURAL, ALWAYS FRESH.
STARTERS
Giant Pretzel
Served with house-made beer cheese
PIEROGY TEASER
3 Pieces of our house pierogies topped with bacon & onion, served with dill sour cream
GARLIC FRIES
Idaho spuds with our own blend of garlic. Served with house aioli
FRIED CALAMARI
Red onion, red, green, & yellow bell peppers and calamari, topped with chipotle aioli & fresh cilantro
CRAB CAKES
Rock crab leg & claw meat cakes served on a bed of sauteed spinach with bacon, onion & tomato relish
NACHOS
Fresh tomatoes, green onions, black olives, black beans, a blend of cheeses, and topped with sour cream & salsa fresca / add your choice of ground beef, BBQ pork or grilled chicken
POTATO PANCAKES
Served with apple sauce & sour cream
CHICKEN WINGS
Fried wings with Buffalo or BBQ sauce, served with celery, carrot sticks & blue cheese dressing
ROASTED GARLIC BULBS
Fresh Gilroy garlic bulbs with toast points & tomato basil tapenade
ONION RINGS
Sweet onions soaked in buttermilk-seasoned beer batter, deep-fried until crispy, served with house aioli
BREWMASTERS BASKET
A basket of our calamari with roasted garlic bulbs & garlic fries served with chipotle aioli & tomato basil tapenade
CAPRESE
Fresh mozzarella with tomato & basil served with baby mixed greens & dijon vinaigrette
SOUPS
FRENCH ONION SOUP
French onion soup with a melted layer of Swiss cheese
SOUP OF THE DAY
Our chefs create traditionally inspired soups from all over the world, ask your server for daily selections.
SALADS
BOHEMIAN HOUSE SALAD
Mixed greens, grape tomatoes, pickled cabbage & carrots, garlic croutons with walnut vinaigrette
ROASTED BEET SALAD
Roasted beets, caramelized onions, grape tomatoes, goat cheese, candied walnuts, pickled cabbage & carrots, spring mix with orange maple balsamic vinaigrette
CAESAR SALAD
Romaine lettuce, grape tomatoes, garlic croutons, shaved parmesan cheese, with housemade caesar dressing
STEAK SALAD
Petite beef tender, mixed baby greens, pickled cabbage & carrots, red onion, sautéed mushrooms & bacon tossed with blue cheese dressing
THE WEDGE
Romaine wedge, blue cheese, bacon, grape tomatoes, red onion, with blue cheese dressing & balsamic reduction
KARLOVY VARY SPA SALAD
Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, bacon, grape tomatoes, black olives, red onions, cucumbers, sautéed mushrooms & mozzarella with herbed vinaigrette
POACHED PEAR SALAD
Mixed baby greens, poached pear, pickled cabbage & carrots, roasted hazelnuts & brie cheese wedges with blue cheese dressing
SALMON SPINACH SALAD
Grilled Atlantic Salmon, spinach, craisins, candied hazelnuts, pickled cabbage & carrots, mandarin oranges, grape tomatoes, red onion & bacon with orange-ginger vinaigrette
SANDWICHES
GARLIC BURGER
1/2 lb. garlic burger with smoked bacon & cheddar cheese, served on an onion roll. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
BOHEMIAN CLUB
Toasted homemade rye with cured ham, turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato & onion with our house aioli & cheddar. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
CLASSIC REUBEN
Fresh sliced pastrami, sauerkraut, swiss cheese & kosher dill pickle. Served on homemade rye bread. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
CHICKEN SCHNITZEL SANDWICH
Breaded Chicken breast, ham, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato & honey mustard on ciabatta bun. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
PILSENER BRAT SANDWICH
Your choice of beer-battered and fried or grilled bratwurst, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese & dijon mustard on a parmesan hoagie. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
CHERNY BOCK FRENCH DIP
Thin-sliced roast beef, melted muenster cheese, sautéed peppers & onions on ciabatta bun with Cherny Bock au jus. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
B.L.T.
Bacon, tomatoes & romaine on rye with our house aioli.  Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
GRILLED VEGGIE SANDWICH
Zucchini, portabello mushroom, red peppers, yellow squash, feta cheese, onion, aioli, lettuce & tomato on an onion roll. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
BBQ PULLED PORK SANDWICH
Pulled BBQ pork, pilsener-battered fried onion ring, melted Swiss cheese & sliced red onion, served on an onion roll. Served with choice of soup, salad or garlic fries
OLD WORLD PUB FARE
OLD WORLD ROAST PORK
Tender cubes of roast pork served with homemade bread dumplings & sauerkraut
BAVARIAN BRATS
Two bratwursts served with our old school sauerkraut & mashed potatoes
BOHEMIAN SCHNITZEL
Your choice of lightly breaded chicken or pork filet., served with garlic mashed potatoes, beurre blanc sauce & fresh steamed vegetables
PIEROGIES & BRATWURST
Eastern European pastry pockets filled with cheese & dill-seasoned potatoes, served with bratwurst & sauerkraut topped with bacon, onions & dill sour cream
CHICKEN PAPRIKASH
Sautéed breast of chicken with Hungarian paprika & sour cream sauce, served with spätzle & fresh steamed vegetables
BOHEMIAN GOULASH
Beef cubes stewed in sweet & spicy paprika sauce with bread dumplings and onions
BEEF STROGANOFF
Pan-seared tender beef with a mushroom & caramelized onion pan sauce with hint of red wine & a dollop of dill sour cream, served over pasta or spätzle
SCHWEINSHAXEN
Slow-braised pork shank topped with a roasted onion pan sauce, served with house red cabbage & choice of mashed potatoes or spätzle
ENTRÉES
PILSENER-BATTERED FISH & CHIPS
Halibut in our seasoned pilsener batter served with garlic fries, house remoulade & coleslaw. Salmon substitute available
CHEF’S MEATLOAF
Country meatloaf with mushroom sauce, mashed potatoes & fresh veggies
NEW YORK STEAK
Prime cut New York steak with mushroom demi-glace. Served with mashed potatoes & fresh steamed vegetables
GRILLED PORTABELLA MUSHROOM
With spinach, roasted red peppers & fresh mozzarella, served with toast points
ORANGE-GLAZED GRILLED SALMON
Served with wilted spinach & garlic mashed potatoes
PUB STEAK
Beef shoulder tender steak with rosemary demi-glace. Served with fresh vegetables & your choice of garlic mashed potatoes or french fries
HALIBUT FILET
Horseradish & parmesan crusted halibut with citrus herb beurre blanc. Served with garlic mashed potatoes & fresh vegetables
BLACKBERRY BRANDY CHICKEN
Herb-crusted chicken breast with a blackberry brandy sauce served with garlic mashed potatoes & fresh vegetables
POMODORO PRIMAVERA
Linguini pasta & housemade tomato sauce with bell peppers, red onions, cremini mushrooms, fresh spinach,  black olives, and creamy goat cheese.
WOOD-FIRED PIZZAS
FLAMMEKUCHEN
Our housemade pizza dough topped with dill sour cream, caramelized onions, bacon & Swiss cheese, garnished with fresh dill
MARGHERITA
Tomato, fresh mozzarella, parmesan, basil, black pepper & olive oil
PACIFIC
Ham, grilled pineapple, fresh roasted jalapeno, mozzarella & cheddar, tomato sauce & parmesan
2002 OLYMPIAN
Pepperoni, sausage, caramelized onions, mushrooms, mozzarella & cheddar, parmesan & tomatoes
CHICKEN PESTO
Grilled chicken, pesto, artichokes, roasted garlic, mushrooms, caramelized onions, mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan
MOUNT SUPERIOR
Pesto, artichoke, green onions, spinach, mozzarella, cheddar, goat cheese, ricotta & parmesan
THE DICTATOR
Pepperoni, sausage, bacon, ham, mozzarella & parmesan
FLATBREAD & HUMMUS
With caramelized onion, goat cheese, fresh rosemary, sun-dried tomatoes and balsamic reduction served with our housemade hummus
BUILD-YOUR-OWN PIZZA
CHOOSE 4 FROM THE FOLLOWING TOPPINGS: (olives, tomatoes, green peppers, cremini mushrooms, anchovies, pepperoni, bacon, sausage, ham, chicken, fresh mozzarella, grated mozzarella, goat cheese, ricotta, spinach, sun-dried tomato, artichoke, onions)
SIDES
SAUTEED VEGGIES
SPÄTZLE
What is spätzle? (Say “shpaytzle”) Spätzle is a traditional german fried pasta... Ours is delicious!
MASHED POTATOES
BOHEMIAN GARLIC FRIES
RED CABBAGE or SAUERKRAUT
Not like your mom made. It’s more like what our mom made
PARMESAN TOAST POINTS
SIDE SALAD
DESSERTS
BREAD PUDDING
Rum soaked raisin bread pudding glazed with caramel & chantilly cream
MORAVIAN APPLE STRUDEL
Homemade traditional apple strudel with rasins and walnuts. Served with vanilla ice cream
CZECH FRUIT DUMPLINGS
Steamed fresh fruit dumplings served with vanilla cream sauce (ask server for fruit of the day)
GERMAN CHOCOLATE CAKE
Served with vanilla ice cream
CHEESECAKE
With Chef's blueberry compote
BRUNCH MENU /// Saturday & Sunday, 9:30am—3pm
THREE EGGS HOW YOU LIKE IT
Three eggs any style with choice of bacon or bratwurst. Served with breakfast potatoes and fruit.
CRISPY FRENCH TOAST
With blackberry cream cheese stuffing and maple syrup. Garnished with fruit.
BISCUITS & BRATWURST GRAVY
Warm fluffy biscuit smothered in bratwurst gravy. Served with breakfast potatoes and fruit.
BUTTERMILK PANCAKES
Two fluffy buttermilk cakes with choice of bacon or bratwurst served with fresh fruit.
THREE-EGG OMELET
With roasted red peppers, onion, bacon, ham, mozzarella and chipotle aioli. Served with breakfast potatoes and fruit.
HAM & EGG SANDWICH
Fried or scrambled egg with ham, tomato, cheddar and aioli on toasted sourdough bread or croissant. Served with breakfast potatoes and fruit.
BOHEMIAN EGGS FLORENTINE
Two poached eggs on dumplings with sauteed spinach, tomato, ham, and Hollandaise sauce. Served with breakfast potatoes and fruit.
GYPSY HASH
Pastrami with red potatoes, bacon, peppers, onions, & mushroom, topped with cheese & two fried eggs.
BREAKFAST SCHNITZEL
Your choice of chicken or pork schnitzel smothered in bratwurst gravy. Served with breakfast potatoes and fruit.
STEAK & EGGS
Grilled 8 oz. beef petite tender steak with two eggs any style, breakfast potatoes, and Hollandaise sauce on the side.
BRUNCH SIDES
BUTTERMILK BISCUIT
BRATWURST GRAVY
BUTTERMILK BISCUIT W/BRAT GRAVY
PEPPERED BACON
BREAKFAST POTATOES
BUTTERMILK PANCAKE
FRESH FRUIT
STUFFED FRENCH TOAST
BRUNCH BEVERAGES
LOADED BLOODY MARY
(from 10:30am on) Special house blend mix, Monopolowa Vodka pickled asparagus, bacon slice, garnished with olives, lemon, lime

IVY & VARLEY ONLINE PRIVACY POLICY AGREEMENT
November 1, 2024
Ivy & Varley (Ivy & Varley) values its users’ privacy. This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) will help you understand how we collect and use personal information from those who visit our website or make use of our online facilities and services, and what we will and will not do with the information we collect. Our Policy has been designed and created to ensure those affiliated with Ivy & Varley of our commitment and realization of our obligation not only to meet, but to exceed, most existing privacy standards.
We reserve the right to make changes to this Policy at any given time. If you want to make sure that you are up to date with the latest changes, we advise you to frequently visit this page. If at any point in time Ivy & Varley decides to make use of any personally identifiable information on file, in a manner vastly different from that which was stated when this information was initially collected, the user or users shall be promptly notified by email. Users at that time shall have the option as to whether to permit the use of their information in this separate manner.
This Policy applies to Ivy & Varley, and it governs any and all data collection and usage by us. Through the use of https://ivyandvarley.com, you are therefore consenting to the data collection procedures expressed in this Policy.
Please note that this Policy does not govern the collection and use of information by companies that Ivy & Varley does not control, nor by individuals not employed or managed by us. If you visit a website that we mention or link to, be sure to review its privacy policy before providing the site with information. It is highly recommended and suggested that you review the privacy policies and statements of any website you choose to use or frequent to better understand the way in which websites garner, make use of and share the information collected.
Specifically, this Policy will inform you of the following:
1. What personally identifiable information is collected from you through our website;
2. Why we collect personally identifiable information and the legal basis for such collection;
3. How we use the collected information and with whom it may be shared;
4. What choices are available to you regarding the use of your data; and
5. The security procedures in place to protect the misuse of your information.
Information We Collect
It is always up to you whether to disclose personally identifiable information to us, although if you elect not to do so, we reserve the right not to register you as a user or provide you with any products or services. This website collects various types of information, such as:
• Voluntarily provided information which may include your name, address, email address, billing and/or credit card
information etc. which may be used when you purchase products and/or services and to deliver the services you have
requested.
• Information automatically collected when visiting our website, which may include cookies, third party tracking technologies and server logs.
In addition, Ivy & Varley may have the occasion to collect non-personal anonymous demographic information, such as age, gender, household income, political affiliation, race and religion, as well as the type of browser you are using, IP address, or type of operating system, which will assist us in providing and maintaining superior quality service.
Ivy & Varley may also deem it necessary, from time to time, to follow websites that our users may frequent to gleam what types of services and products may be the most popular to customers or the general public.
Please rest assured that this site will only collect personal information that you knowingly and willingly provide to us by way of surveys, completed membership forms, and emails. It is the intent of this site to use personal information only for the purpose for which it was requested, and any additional uses specifically provided for on this Policy.
Why We Collect Information and For How Long
We are collecting your data for several reasons:
• To better understand your needs and provide you with the services you have requested;
• To fulfill our legitimate interest in improving our services and products;
• To send you promotional emails containing information we think you may like when we have your consent to do so;
• To contact you to fill out surveys or participate in other types of market research, when we have your consent to do so;
• To customize our website according to your online behavior and personal preferences.
The data we collect from you will be stored for no longer than necessary. The length of time we retain said information will be determined based upon the following criteria: the length of time your personal information remains relevant; the length of time it is reasonable to keep records to demonstrate that we have fulfilled our duties and obligations; any limitation periods within which claims might be made; any retention periods prescribed by law or recommended by regulators, professional bodies or associations; the type of contract we have with you, the existence of your consent, and our legitimate interest in keeping such information as stated in this Policy.
Use of Information Collected
Ivy & Varley does not now, nor will it in the future, sell, rent or lease any of its customer lists and/or names to any third parties.
Ivy & Varley may collect and may make use of personal information to assist in the operation of our website and to ensure delivery of the services you need and request. At times, we may find it necessary to use personally identifiable information as a means to keep you informed of other possible products and/or services that may be available to you from https://ivyandvarley.com.
Ivy & Varley may also be in contact with you with regards to completing surveys and/or research questionnaires related to your opinion of current or potential future services that may be offered.
Ivy & Varley uses various third-party social media features including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube and other interactive programs. These may collect your IP address and require cookies to work properly . These services are governed by the privacy policies of the providers and are not within Ivy & Varley’s control.
Disclosure of Information
Ivy & Varley may not use or disclose the information provided by you except under the following circumstances:
• as necessary to provide services or products you have ordered;
• in other ways described in this Policy or to which you have otherwise consented;
• in the aggregate with other information in such a way so that your identity cannot reasonably be determined;
• as required by law, or in response to a subpoena or search warrant;
• to outside auditors who have agreed to keep the information confidential;
• as necessary to enforce the Terms of Service;
• as necessary to maintain, safeguard and preserve all the rights and property of Ivy & Varley.
Non-Marketing Purposes
Ivy & Varley greatly respects your privacy. We do maintain and reserve the right to contact you if needed for non-marketing purposes (such as bug alerts, security breaches, account issues, and/or changes in Ivy & Varley’s products and services). In certain circumstances, we may use our website, newspapers, or other public means to post a notice.
Children under the age of 13
Ivy & Varley’s website is not directed to, and does not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from, children under the age of thirteen (13). If it is determined that such information has been inadvertently collected on anyone under the age of thirteen (13), we shall immediately take the necessary steps to ensure that such information is deleted from our system’s database, or in the alternative, that verifiable parental consent is obtained for the use and storage of such information. Anyone under the age of thirteen (13) must seek and obtain parent or guardian permission to use this website.
Unsubscribe or Opt-Out
All users and visitors to our website have the option to discontinue receiving communications from us by way of email or newsletters. To discontinue or unsubscribe from our website please send an email that you wish to unsubscribe to
info@realine.com. If you wish to unsubscribe or opt-out from any third-party websites, you must go to that specific website to unsubscribe or opt-out. Ivy & Varley will continue to adhere to this Policy with respect to any personal information previously collected.
Links to Other Websites
Our website does contain links to affiliate and other websites. Ivy & Varley does not claim nor accept responsibility for any privacy policies, practices and/or procedures of other such websites. Therefore, we encourage all users and visitors to be aware when they leave our website and to read the privacy statements of every website that collects personally identifiable information. This Privacy Policy Agreement applies only and solely to the information collected by our website.
Notice to European Union Users
Ivy & Varley’s operations are located primarily in the United States. If you provide information to us, the information will be transferred out of the European Union (EU) and sent to the United States. (The adequacy decision on the EU-US Privacy became operational on August 1, 2016. This framework protects the fundamental rights of anyone in the EU whose personal data is transferred to the United States for commercial purposes. It allows the free transfer of data to companies that are certified in the US under the Privacy Shield.) By providing personal information to us, you are consenting to its storage and use as described in this Policy. Live Nite Events Presents takes precautions to protect your information. When you submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline. Wherever we collect sensitive information (e.g. credit card information), that information is encrypted and transmitted to us in a secure way. You can verify this by looking for a lock icon in the address bar and looking for “https” at the beginning of the address of the webpage. While we use encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online, we also protect your information offline. Only employees who need the information to perform a specific job (for example, billing or customer service) are granted access to personally identifiable information. The computers and servers in which we store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment. This is all done to prevent any loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure or modification of the user’s personal information under our control.
The company also uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) for authentication and private communications to build users’ trust and confidence in the internet and website use by providing simple and secure access and communication of credit card and personal information.
Acceptance of Terms
By using this website, you are hereby accepting the terms and conditions stipulated within the Privacy Policy Agreement. If you are not in agreement with our terms and conditions, then you should refrain from further use of our sites. In addition, your continued use of our website following the posting of any updates or changes to our terms and conditions shall mean that you agree and acceptance of such changes.
How to Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns regarding the Privacy Policy Agreement related to our website, please feel free to contact us at the following email, telephone number or mailing address.
Email: info@realine.com
Telephone Number: 801.419.0858
Mailing Address:
Realine Group
30 E Broadway
Salt Lake City, Utah
84111

Menu
Famous 3 Course Meals
Menu items and prices can vary by location.  Please contact The Old Spaghetti Factory near you for specific information.
Every entree at The Old Spaghetti Factory is served with hot fresh baked bread, soup or crisp green salad, and a scoop of our signature spumoni or vanilla ice cream. Our menu is full of flavorful value that feels just like home.
View Your Location’s Menu
Appetizers
Sicilian Garlic Cheese Bread
A generous portion of fresh bread topped with a tasty blend of garlic and three melted cheeses served toasted with a side of our homemade Marinara Sauce. (1220 cal)
Salad
Chicken Caesar Salad
Lightly breaded chicken breast strips atop romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, shredded Romano cheese, and croutons.  (1120 cal)
Without chicken (820 cal)
Served with soup (100-320 cal) and spumoni ice cream (170 cal)
Founder's Favorites
Our Famous Baked Lasagna
Layers of noodles, Marinara Sauce, ground beef and pork, and four delicious cheeses.  (820 cal)
Gourmet Jumbo Crab Ravioli
Large ravioli stuffed with savory crab meat and ricotta cheese topped with a rich Pesto Alfredo Sauce. (810 cal)
Garlic Mizithra
Spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter tossed with a delicious blend of sautéed garlic, bacon,
and mushrooms. (1360 cal)
Spaghetti Vesuvius
A spicy blend of tender chicken, sausage, and diced meatballs with green peppers and onions. Seasoned with Tabasco® and Sambal Chili Paste. (860 cal)
Savory Chicken
Chicken Parmigiana
A perfectly seasoned breast of tender chicken with melted cheese and Pomodoro Sauce. Served with spaghetti and Marinara Sauce. (750 cal)
Breast of Chicken Fettuccine
Fettuccine topped with tender diced chicken breast, fresh broccoli, sautéed mushrooms, Alfredo Sauce, and shredded Romano cheese. (1260 cal)
Chicken Marsala
A freshly seasoned breast of tender chicken with a Mushroom and Marsala Wine Sauce. Served alongside spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter. (1000 cal)
Pasta Classics
Served over the finest 100% durum semolina spaghetti.
Marinara Sauce
Our from scratch recipe of fresh onions, carrots, tomatoes, and garlic sautéed in olive oil and Italian seasonings.  (560 cal)
Rich Meat Sauce
Mamma Mia!  Our 1969 original from scratch recipe of perfectly ripe tomatoes and ground beef sautéed with freshly chopped onions, celery, and garlic, all simmered slowly to perfection with savory Italian herbs and spices.  Delizioso!  (650 cal)
White Clam Sauce
Our from scratch recipe for clam lovers – with hints of wine, fresh garlic, green peppers, onions and parsley.  (810 cal)
Mushroom Sauce
Our from scratch Marinara sauce topped with freshly sautéed seasoned mushrooms.  (670 cal)
Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter
A toothsome treat for cheese lovers.  (1190 cal)
The Manager’s Favorite
Pair any two of the above Classic Sauces to create our favorite combination.  (600-1000 cal)
Pot Pourri
A sampler of Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter, Meat, Clam and Marinara Sauces.  (880 cal)
Hearty Meal
A larger serving of our Pasta Classics or Factory Favorites entrees. (950-1990 cal)
Factory Favorites
Italian Sausage with Meat Sauce

AUTHENTIC ITALIAN FOOD FOR DINE IN OR TO GO
At Brio, we believe that to eat well is to live well. We only use the freshest and highest quality ingredients, making sure that every meal is a truly memorable dining experience. Ask your server for the perfect wine or crafted cocktail to compliment our signature Carpaccio with shaved tender beef, capers, and mustard aioli to start your meal. Enjoy an authentic taste of Tuscany with our Spaghetti Bolognese or Pasta Brio. Tuscan inspired Italian restaurant menu is sure to satisfy. Make it a Brio dinner to remember with our double-cut New Zealand Lamb Chops, Grilled Chicken Marsala, or Gorgonzola Crusted Beef Medallions. Whether you’re enjoying a romantic dinner for two or celebrating a special occasion with family and friends, the Brio dinner menu is the perfect way to indulge in all your favorite Italian dishes.
We’re open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner with Brunch on weekends. Reserve your table and
DINE IN
or
ORDER TO GO
for Brio Italian food delivery or curbside pickup. Planning a gathering for 20 or more? Click
GROUP DINING
to get all the details you need to plan your special event, birthday party, family celebration, or corporate event. Want the party delivered? Visit our
CATERING
page for easy ordering for 10 or more. Join us for a great Italian dinner in the restaurant or take out to enjoy at home.
Buon Appetito!

Menu
Famous 3 Course Meals
Menu items and prices can vary by location.  Please contact The Old Spaghetti Factory near you for specific information.
Every entree at The Old Spaghetti Factory is served with hot fresh baked bread, soup or crisp green salad, and a scoop of our signature spumoni or vanilla ice cream. Our menu is full of flavorful value that feels just like home.
View Your Location’s Menu
Appetizers
Sicilian Garlic Cheese Bread
A generous portion of fresh bread topped with a tasty blend of garlic and three melted cheeses served toasted with a side of our homemade Marinara Sauce. (1220 cal)
Salad
Chicken Caesar Salad
Lightly breaded chicken breast strips atop romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, shredded Romano cheese, and croutons.  (1120 cal)
Without chicken (820 cal)
Served with soup (100-320 cal) and spumoni ice cream (170 cal)
Founder's Favorites
Our Famous Baked Lasagna
Layers of noodles, Marinara Sauce, ground beef and pork, and four delicious cheeses.  (820 cal)
Gourmet Jumbo Crab Ravioli
Large ravioli stuffed with savory crab meat and ricotta cheese topped with a rich Pesto Alfredo Sauce. (810 cal)
Garlic Mizithra
Spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter tossed with a delicious blend of sautéed garlic, bacon,
and mushrooms. (1360 cal)
Spaghetti Vesuvius
A spicy blend of tender chicken, sausage, and diced meatballs with green peppers and onions. Seasoned with Tabasco® and Sambal Chili Paste. (860 cal)

A freshly seasoned breast of tender chicken with a Mushroom and Marsala Wine Sauce. Served alongside spaghetti with Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter. (1000 cal)
Pasta Classics
Served over the finest 100% durum semolina spaghetti.
Marinara Sauce
Our from scratch recipe of fresh onions, carrots, tomatoes, and garlic sautéed in olive oil and Italian seasonings.  (560 cal)
Rich Meat Sauce
Mamma Mia!  Our 1969 original from scratch recipe of perfectly ripe tomatoes and ground beef sautéed with freshly chopped onions, celery, and garlic, all simmered slowly to perfection with savory Italian herbs and spices.  Delizioso!  (650 cal)
White Clam Sauce
Our from scratch recipe for clam lovers – with hints of wine, fresh garlic, green peppers, onions and parsley.  (810 cal)
Mushroom Sauce
Our from scratch Marinara sauce topped with freshly sautéed seasoned mushrooms.  (670 cal)
Mizithra Cheese & Browned Butter
A toothsome treat for cheese lovers.  (1190 cal)

Half Baked Brie
Our take on the ever-so-amazing baked brie appetizer. First, we let the brie take a spin in our pizza oven. Once it comes out oozy and toasted, we top it with a sweet peach compote and pair it with our house-made focaccia bread. Garnished with a balsamic reduction and parsley.

Millions of peaches, These Peaches aren't free. We start with a garlic oil base, then add dried rosemary, peppered bacon, sliced shallot, our three cheese blend, fresh peaches, and gorgonzola, then cook it to perfection. Topped with a beautiful arugula salad and finished with our Hot Honey.  Do yourself and your loved ones a favor and come check out this pizza!

Lucky 13 Terms & Conditions
Thank you for submitting your Lucky 13 Reservation Request. This is a
request
, not a guarantee.
Please notify us promptly if your party has any specific needs or requests. I.E. Wheelchair accessibility, time constraints, surprise parties etc…
Please note that all reservations are subject to the following terms in order to ensure prompt and efficient service;
*All members of the party MUST present valid identification (please see description below)
*Each reservation is subject to a 15 minute hold time.
*All members of the party must be present within the 15 minute hold time in order to be seated.
*Due to high volume and small space, we are only able to provide the number of seats originally requested. The party will be seated when all members are present.
*Any disorderly behavior is subject to ejection from our premises.
Please be patient with our staff, parties may have a slight wait, but will be sat as close to requested time as possible. We cannot take requests for specific areas of the bar, and all reservations have the possibility of being sat at a communal table. We appreciate your help in assisting us to provide the best customer service to all of our customers.
Lucky 13 is a bar and, as per state law, everyone will be required to provide a valid form of ID stating they are 21 years or older.
WE ID EVERYONE
The State of Utah allows us to accept the following forms of identification card A) A Valid US State Issued Drivers License B) A Valid US State Issued Identification Card C) A Valid Military Identification Card D) A Valid Passport.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause but we strictly adhere to Utah State Law.

About the Business
Manoli's is a small plates restaurant that reinterprets Greek cuisine in a way that showcases fresh, local and seasonal products. All dishes are ingredient driven and prepared from scratch, allowing a variation of styles and techniques to emphasize the importance of seasonal and local bounty. As a neighborhood restaurant, we believe a small plates menu will allow customers a greater palate variety and the opportunity to create an elevated sense of community fashioned by sharing.
…
Read more
Ask the Community

Q:
How is the parking?  Easy or difficult?
A:
The Asian grocery next door looks shuttered so the angled parking out front is easier than it has been. If you don't get a spot on 9th, you'll have to comb through the neighborhood. I've never found it to be an issue.
Katherine T.

Home

Authentic Italian Traditions
Thanks for a Great Summer Season!
We will be discontinuing Lunch until further notice.
See you for Dinner starting at 5:00pm
PIZZA HAPPY HOUR
1/2 PRICE PIZZA AT THE BAR ONLY
Tuesday-Friday
5pm – 6pm
We are a small Italian restaurant that loves gathering around the table with family and friends where the love of food and conversation fills the air.
Cortona Italian Cafe is inspired by classic Italian recipes with an emphasis on authentic ingredients and rustic flavors with our made from scratch pastas, traditional-style sauces and our fresh-batched gelato.
Welcome to the family!
DINNER RESERVATIONS
Or call
435-608-1373
between the hours of 4pm – 5pm.
TO GO ORDERS
To place your order, please call between 4pm – 5pm, to reserve a pick-up time, so we have time to prepare your meal.
DINNER MENU
DINE-IN
Reservations are required as we are an intimate restaurant. We suggest booking a few days prior to your date.
DINNER MENU
FAMILY-STYLE TAKEOUT
Family-style dinners are available for takeout. Limited availability,
call 24 hours in advance
.

WE OFFER A FULL BAR AND WINE LIST
WE HAVE TWO DINING ROOM OPTIONS:
Cortona Cafe Room or the Main Dining Room

About the Business
Business owner information
Angie and Andrew F.
Business Owner
Established in 2019. Drew and I met at Copper Onion over 10 years ago. We dated for 8 years and got married. We both knew we wanted to own a restaurant and here we are! Building our life and dream together. We’ve been researching spaces for years and this one finally became available. We began the remodel in October of 2018 and opened on February 26, 2019. Oquirrh is the mountain range to the west. We chose the name Oquirrh because of our love for mountains. Wasatch is always used and Oquirrh not as much and we watch these amazing sunsets everyday..

Authentic Indian Food in Downtown Salt Lake City
Our newly remodeled British Colonial-style restaurant in the heart of Salt Lake City. Our Indian Cuisine is made with the freshest locally sourced ingredients.
Other daily specials include favorites like Chicken Tikka Masala, Coconut Korma, Vindaloo and rotating classic dishes. Dinner is cooked to order and served family style with choices that range from traditional, classic, modern and sweet offerings.
Vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free options available. We offer dine in, take out, and delivery as well as
private dining and event space

frequently asked questions
explanation of acronyms
(V) Vegan, (VO) Vegan Option, (GF) Gluten Friendly, (GFO) Gluten Friendly Option.
handcrafted cuisine notice
Please note, items on our menu are handcrafted and made to order. While we strive for consistency, slight variations may occur.
alcoholic beverages
Available for Brunch, Lunch, and Dinner. Must be 21+ in age with a valid ID.
outsourced ingredients disclosure
Select ingredients such as our bread and ketchup are sourced from our trusted partners to ensure the highest quality.
Consuming undercooked meats, poultry, shellfish, or eggs
may increase your risk of food born illness***
seasonal menu advisory
Our menu items may change seasonally to feature the freshest ingredients available. Please ask your server for the most current selections.
allergy advisory
We openly handle several allergens throughout our kitchen, including dairy, nuts, eggs, wheat, and others. While we take precautions to keep ingredients separate, we cannot guarantee a completely allergen-free environment. Please inform your server of any allergies.

							Slice of the Day
At our store, we provide products that contain peanuts, tree nuts, soy, milk, eggs, and wheat. Despite taking necessary measures to minimize the risk of cross-contamination, we cannot guarantee that any of our products are entirely safe for individuals with peanut, tree nut, soy, milk, egg, or wheat allergies. We advise our customers to take necessary precautions and consult with our staff if they have any concerns regarding allergies.

Starters
Pull-A-Parts
Cheese Pull-A-Part
(Breadsticks stuffed with cheese) Indulge in a 14" crust stuffed with Mozzarella Cheese, brushed with Olive Oil, and sprinkled with Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano Cheese. Served with creamy Ranch and Pizza Sauce, this cheesy treat is a steal at only 9.99
The Chedda Pull-A-Part
(Breadsticks stuffed with cheese) Satisfy your craving for cheesy goodness with our 14" breadsticks, with a blend of Sharp Cheddar and Mozzarella Cheese, brushed with Olive Oil and seasoned with Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano Cheese. Accompanied by creamy Ranch sauce and Pizza Sauce for dipping, this irresistible treat is available at a wallet-friendly price of just 9.99
Pizza Pull-A-Part
(Breadsticks on a pan) Treat yourself to a 14" pan of freshly baked Breadsticks, brushed with Olive Oil and sprinkled with a flavorful blend of Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano Cheeses. Served with creamy Ranch and Pizza Sauce, this delectable delight is a steal at an affordable price of just 6.99
Wings & Bread
Cheese Garlic Bread
Try our Texas Toast Garlic Cheese Bread, topped with Mozzarella Cheese. Each slice of Bread is seasoned with Garlic and toasted to a crispy golden brown, then smothered in melted Cheese. This decadent twist on a classic side is sure to be a crowd-pleaser. 2-Slices 3.99 / 4-Slices 6.99
Garlic Bread
Indulge in our Texas Toast Garlic Bread, crafted with freshly baked Bread, seasoned with Garlic, and toasted to a crispy golden brown. This classic side is the perfect complement to any meal. 2-Slices 2.50 / 4-Slices 3.99
Buffalo Wings
Savor six succulent Buffalo Wings, available in a variety of our delicious sauces - Spicy, Spicy BBQ, Spicy Teriyaki, Spicy Thai, Strawberry Balsamic, or classic Buffalo - all at an unbeatable price of 9.49
Salads
Crisp Salads
All of our salad dressings are made fresh daily from scratch.  Available dressings:
1000 Island
Buttermilk Ranch
Caesar
Chipotle Ranch
Chunky Bleu Cheese
Low-Calorie Italian (VEGAN)
VEGAN "House-made" Buttermilk Ranch
Cobb Salad
Enjoy a refreshing and nutritious Cobb Salad featuring crisp Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Bacon Bits, Blue Cheese crumbles, Red Onions, Oven-Roasted Chicken, Hard-Boiled Eggs, and fresh Tomatoes. 10.99
Chicken Caesar Salad
Enjoy a satisfying meal of Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast paired with a crisp blend of Romaine lettuce, Garlic Croutons, Parmesan Cheese, mild Banana Peppers, and our house made Caesar dressing, all generously portioned and offered at a great value of 9.99
Deluxe Chef Salad
Savor a delicious and hearty Chef Salad, made with a blend of fresh Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, topped with Smoked Ham, Mozzarella Cheese, Red Onions, fresh Green Peppers, Black Olives, fresh Mushrooms, Tomatoes,  Carrots, and Garlic Croutons - all for the affordable price of 10.99
Half Chef
Indulge in a delectable half-sized Chef Salad comprising a combination of crispy Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Smoked Ham, flavorful Mozzarella Cheese, Red Onions, fresh Green Peppers, Black Olives, fresh Mushrooms, Tomatoes, fresh Carrots, and Garlic Croutons - all for only 7.99.
Dinner Salad
Experience a simple yet satisfying diner-style Salad made with a fresh blend of Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Tomatoes, fresh Carrots, and Garlic Croutons. Serves 1 for $5.99
Group Salad
Experience a simple yet satisfying Group Salad made with a fresh blend of Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Tomatoes, fresh Carrots, and Garlic Croutons.  Our Group Salad (serves 4-6) $17.50
Specialty Pies
Deletions No Problem. No Substitutions Please!
Caprese Pie
Thin crispy Cheddar crust, herbed Marinara, Parmesan Cheese, fresh raw Mozzarella, sliced Tomatoes and fresh Basil topped with a sweet Balsamic Reduction. *(not available in 1/2 & 1/2) 12"-13.99  /  14"-17.99  /  16"-23.99  /  23"-N/A
Cheesy Bacon Burger Pie
Hand-tossed dough with toasted Sesame Seeds, Seasoned Ground Beef, Red Onions, Bacon, Tomatoes, and a mix of aged Mozzarella and sharp Cheddar Cheese - Topped with chopped Dill Pickles and The Pie’s Gourmet Burger Sauce. A must-try!! 12"-14.99  /  14"-18.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A
Bacon-Berry Pie
Indulge in the perfect combination of sweet and savory with our Bacon-Berry Pie. Our thin crust is brushed with a Strawberry Balsamic sauce and topped with Oven-Roasted Chicken, Mozzarella Cheese, Bacon, Red Onions, and Feta Cheese. The pizza is then baked to perfection and garnished with freshly chopped Cilantro and fresh Strawberries. It's a flavor explosion you won't want to miss! 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
Buffalo Chicken Ranch
Get ready for a spicy twist with the Buffalo Chicken Ranch Pie pizza. Our Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast is marinated in a spicy Buffalo Sauce, and paired with Mozzarella Cheese, Garlic Ranch Sauce, and Red Onions, all atop a Cheese Spiced Crust. This pizza packs a punch of flavor to satisfy your cravings for something bold and delicious. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
The Wise Guy Pie
Introducing The Wise Guy Pie, a pizza that will make you want to exclaim, "Say hello to my little friend!" This hand-tossed pie boasts a blend of whipped Cream Cheese, fresh Spinach Leaves, Artichoke Hearts, Chicken Breast, Mozzarella Cheese, and a hint of Marinara Sauce, all layered on top of the Dough. Once baked to perfection, it's topped with diced Tomatoes, freshly cut Basil, and a sweet Balsamic Reduction drizzle that ties it together. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
Mountain of Meat
The Mountain of Meat Pie pizza is a carnivore's dream, loaded with an irresistible combination of Pepperoni, Smoked Ham, Genoa Salami, Italian Sausage, and Ground Beef. Get ready to sink your teeth into a flavor-packed pizza that delivers on all levels of meatiness. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-43.99
Chicken Ranch
Satisfy your cravings with the mouthwatering Chicken Ranch Pie pizza. This savory treat features our signature Garlic Ranch Sauce spread over the crust and topped with Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast, Bacon, Tomatoes, Onions, and a blend of Sharp Cheddar and Mozzarella Cheese. Each bite is a burst of delicious flavors that will leave you wanting more. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
Hawaii Pie-O
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with the Hawaii Pie-O Pie pizza. Featuring Smoked Ham, Pineapple, Marinara, and Mozzarella Cheese, each bite is a delicious blend of sweet and savory flavors. As they say in Hawaii Five-O, "Book it Dano!" and enjoy this mouthwatering pizza. 12"-15.49  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-23.99  /  23"-41.99
Stromboli Pizza
Indulge in the perfect combination of savory and spicy with our delicious Stromboli Pizza topped with slices of Pepperoni, freshly diced Onions and Green Peppers, and Italian Sausage. Each bite is bursting with flavor and is sure to satisfy your cravings. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-43.99
BBQ Chicken Cilantro
Indulge in the savory and sweet flavors of the BBQ Chicken Cilantro pizza. This delicious pie is made with Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast, Smoked Gouda, and Mozzarella Cheese, all smothered in a mouthwatering sweet BBQ Sauce. Topped with fresh-cut Cilantro, each bite is a flavorful explosion that will leave you wanting more. 12"-14.99  /  14"-18.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-42.99
Xtreme Veggie
Our Xtreme Veggie pizza is bursting with fresh flavor, featuring a colorful medley of fresh Spinach, Artichoke Hearts, Sicilian Spiced Tomatoes, Red Onions, and a blend of Feta and Mozzarella Cheeses. It's a veggie lover's dream come true! 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-43.99
The Pie’s Combo
Get ready for a pizza that has it all with the Combo Supreme! Loaded with Pepperoni, Smoked Ham, Genoa Salami, fresh Mushrooms, Onions, Green Peppers, Italian Sausage, Linguica Sausage, and Ground Beef, this pizza is a flavor explosion. Each bite is packed with a delicious mix of savory meats, fresh veggies, and bold spices. As they say, "Look Out!" - this pizza is sure to satisfy your cravings and leave you feeling full and happy. 12"-16.99  /  14"-20.99  /  16"-26.99  /  23"-46.99
Thai Pie
Looking for something different to eat? A perfect blend of spicy Thai Peanut Sauce, Oven Roasted Chicken Breast, Carrots, Red Onions, Pineapple, fresh Basil, and chopped Cilantro on a thin crust topped with light Mozzarella Cheese and toasted Sesame Seeds. You won't regret it... 12"-13.99  /  14"-17.99  /  16"-23.99  /  23"-N/A
The Greek
Get ready for a taste of the Mediterranean with the Greek pizza! This delicious pie is topped with a White Cucumber Yogurt Sauce, Gyro Meat, Mozzarella Cheese, and Feta Cheese, and finished off with a sprinkle of fresh Cut Tomatoes, Red Onions, and a squeeze of Lemon, all on a crispy Thin Crust. As they say in Greece, "Opa!" - this pizza is sure to impress with its delicious blend of flavors. 12"-14.99  /  14"-18.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A

Pasta & Zappis
Pasta
Macaroni and Cheese
Indulge in perfectly baked Macaroni, drenched in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, velvety Cream Cheese, Romano, and Parmesan Cheese. Crowned with a smoky, buttery cracker crumb, it’s comfort food with a gourmet twist!  Available for just 9.99
Buffalo Macaroni and Cheese
Get ready to savor baked Macaroni smothered in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, Cream Cheese, Romano, and Parmesan Cheese. Topped with zesty Buffalo Chicken, a sprinkle of Gorgonzola, and a smoky, buttery cracker crumb for the perfect finish. It’s a flavor-packed twist on a classic!   Available for just 12.99
Jala-Bacon Mac and Cheese
Macaroni baked in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, Cream Cheese, Romano, & Parmesan, topped with Jalapenos, Bacon, & a smoky Butter Cracker Crumb. It’s a flavor-packed twist on a classic!   Available for just 11.99
Spaghetti with Meatballs
Satisfy your cravings with our Spaghetti and Meatballs dish, featuring two Meatballs drenched in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce and served on a bed of al dente Italian Spaghetti. For an extra kick, pair it with our spicy Cajun Link Sausage. it's a meal you won't want to miss. Available for just 10.99
Spicy Thai Pasta
Indulge in the flavors of Oven-Roasted Chicken, Pineapple, fresh Carrots, Red Onions, and Sesame Seeds tossed with Spaghetti and a spicy Thai Peanut Sauce. This dish is finished with a generous sprinkle of fresh-cut Cilantro and Basil to elevate the taste. It's the perfect combination of sweet and spicy at a great value of 11.99
The Vesuvius Calzone
Experience the fiery explosion of flavors with our signature calzone, The Vesuvius, inspired by the only active Volcano in Italy. Our hand-tossed Dough is stuffed with Italian Spaghetti, Meatballs, and Mozzarella Cheese, all generously smothered in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce. Don't miss your chance to try this mouthwatering masterpiece, available for just 11.99
Zappis
The Pie's version of a Calzone.
Deletions No Problem. No Substitutions Please!
The Vesuvius Calzone
Experience the fiery explosion of flavors with our signature Zappi, The Vesuvius, inspired by the only active Volcano in Italy. Our hand-tossed Dough is stuffed with mouthwatering Italian Spaghetti, savory Meatballs, and gooey Mozzarella Cheese, all generously smothered in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce. Don't miss your chance to try this mouthwatering masterpiece, available for just 11.99
The Wise Guy
Indulge in our delicious Zappi made with our hand-tossed Dough and filled with a creamy mixture of fresh Spinach Leaves, Artichoke Hearts, Whipped Cream Cheese, and Mozzarella Cheese. It's then topped with fresh-cut Basil, Romano Cheese, and diced Tomatoes marinated in a sweet Balsamic Reduction, making it a truly irresistible treat. You can also add Oven-Roasted Chicken for an extra burst of flavor at just .99 cents more. All of this is available for only 11.99
Cheese Zappi
Experience a classic Italian taste with our cheese Zappi, featuring melted Mozzarella Cheese and Pizza Sauce that creates the perfect balance of flavors. Enjoy it as it is for a simple yet satisfying meal, or add your favorite toppings such as fresh vegetables or savory meats for an extra burst of flavor. You can also add a dollop of creamy Ricotta Cheese for an indulgent twist. Each additional topping is only .99 cents, and our Seafood toppings are not available for Zappis. Get yours now for only 8.99
Meat Zappi
Indulge in our delicious Meat Calzone, loaded with gooey Mozzarella Cheese, zesty Pizza Sauce, and your choice of savory toppings. Pick from Pepperoni, Smoked Ham, Canadian Bacon, or Genoa Salami, fresh cut Onions, all mixed with fresh Mushrooms, crispy Green Peppers, and tangy Black Olives. For an extra burst of creaminess, add Ricotta Cheese for only .99 cents, or spice it up with Cajun Link Sausage for just .99 cents more. All this goodness for only 10.99
Vegetarian Zappi
Savor the delicious flavors of our Veggie Zappi, filled with creamy Mozzarella Cheese and zesty Pizza Sauce. Packed with wholesome ingredients such as fresh Mushrooms, Black Olives, Onions, and Green Peppers, this Calzone is a perfect choice for vegetarians. Want to add some extra richness? Go for a dollop of Ricotta Cheese at just .99 cents more! Only for 9.99
Desserts & Drinks
Beverages
Micro-Brewed Root Beer
Indulge in our delicious Micro Brewed Root Beer, made with a traditional recipe that's sure to satisfy your cravings. Our Root Beer is brewed from scratch using only the finest ingredients and served ice cold from a keg. With its smooth, rich flavor and frothy head, it pours like a fine Ale and is the perfect complement to any meal. Come and experience true Root Beer done right!
Soft Drinks
Our beverage selection includes unlimited refills of Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, and Dr. Pepper. You can also take your favorite soft drinks to go with our convenient 2-liter bottles and 6-packs available for delivery or take-out. So whether you're dining in or taking out, you can enjoy your favorite sodas anytime, anywhere.
Draft Beer
At our establishment, we take pride in offering a diverse selection of beers to our patrons. We feature a rotating selection of local craft beers on tap, showcasing the best brews from the region. In addition, we offer a range of domestic and imported beers in the bottle, ensuring that there is something for every taste and preference. Whether you're a fan of hoppy IPAs, cool Ambers, or refreshing Lagers, we have a beer that will satisfy your cravings. Come in and check out our beer menu today!
Bottled Juices
We offer a refreshing selection of bottled fruit juices to quench your thirst. Choose from sweet and tangy Orange Juice or crisp and refreshing Apple Juice. Each bottle contains a generous serving of your favorite fruit juice, perfect for enjoying on-the-go or pairing with your favorite meal.
Desserts
Cinn-A-Part
Treat your taste buds to The Pie's artisanal sweet Cinnamon Breadsticks, made with their signature hand-crafted Sweet Dough, brushed with Butter, a blend of ground Cinnamon and Brown Sugar,  then finished with a layer of Cream Cheese Frosting - perfect for sharing with groups. 7.99
Half Baked Cookies & Cream
Satisfy your sweet tooth cravings with our Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, partially baked in-house and paired with a generous serving of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream, drizzled with Caramel and Chocolate sauces, topped with Whipped Cream, and a Cherry - this dessert is big enough for sharing. 9.99
*Not available for take-out or delivery
Two Scoops of Vanilla Ice Cream
Two scoops of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream is a classic dessert for a bargain of 4.99
*Not available for take-out or delivery
Chocolate Caramel Sundae
Indulge in a delicious finale to your dining experience with two scoops of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream, topped with Caramel and Chocolate, a dollop of Whipped Cream, and crowned with a Cherry on top. 5.99
*Not available for take-out or delivery
Campfire Calzone - New
Give me Smore! The Pies Sweet Dough stuffed with toasted Marshmallows, Nutella, and Graham Crackers all folded up then brushed with smoked Butter and topped with Chocolate Sauce.  8.99
Fast Lunch
In a hurry? Our Large Slices of Pizza are ready in minutes.
Express Slice Hours: Monday through Friday 11:00 am to 2:00 pm
Express Slices are sold at Dine-In locations Only!

Our store offers products with peanuts, tree nuts, soy, milk, eggs, and wheat. While we take steps to minimize the risk of cross-contamination, we cannot guarantee that any of our products are safe for consumers with peanut, tree nut, soy, milk, egg, or wheat allergies.

(Gluten Free Breadsticks in a pan) 14” Crust brushed with Olive Oil and sprinkled with Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano cheeses. Includes Ranch and Pizza Sauce. 14"-7.99

(Gluten Free Breadsticks topped with cheese) 14” Crust topped with Mozzarella and Cheddar Cheese, then brushed with Olive Oil and sprinkled with Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano cheese. Includes Ranch and Pizza Sauce. 14"-9.99
