Gluten-Free Specialty Pizzas
Deletions No Problem. No Substitutions Please!
Gluten-Free pies are all 14" Large.
GF Bacon Chicken Ranch
Indulge in the savory and satisfying flavors of our Gluten-Free Bacon Chicken Ranch pizza. This delectable creation features Ranch Sauce, Oven Roasted Chicken, Breakfast Bacon, Red Onions, Sicilian Tomatoes, and a blend of Mozzarella and Cheddar Cheese. Every bite is bursting with deliciousness, making this pizza a must-try for any pizza lover. Available in a 14" size, this Gluten-Free pizza is priced at 20.99
GF Bacon and Berries Pie
Indulge in the unique Gluten-Free flavor combination of our Strawberry Balsamic Sauce, Oven-Roasted Chicken, Mozzarella Cheese, Bacon, Red Onions, and Feta Cheese. This delicious pizza is topped off with fresh Cilantro and chopped Strawberries. Available in 14" size for 20.99
GF Mini Meat Pie
Our Gluten-Free Mini Meat Pizza, a perfect choice for those who love a classic meaty flavor. This pizza is made with Breakfast Bacon, Pepperoni, Canadian Bacon, Mozzarella, and Pizza Sauce, all on a delicious Gluten-Free crust. It's compact and satisfying choice for a quick lunch or snack. Available in a 14" size, for just 20.99
GF Chicken Bar-B-Que
Indulge in our Gluten-Free Chicken Bar-B-Que pizza, featuring Oven-Roasted Chicken, BBQ sauce, Pineapple, Red Onions, and Mozzarella Cheese. Savor the perfect combination of sweet and savory flavors in every bite. Available in a 14" size for only 19.99
GF Veggie Xtreme
Our Gluten-Free Veggie Xtreme pizza is a vegetable lover's dream. It features a delicious combination of fresh Spinach, Artichoke Hearts, Sicilian Spiced Tomatoes, and Red Onions, all topped with Feta Cheese and Mozzarella Cheese. Our signature pizza sauce ties it all together, creating a perfect balance of flavors. Available in a 14" size, this Gluten-Free pizza is priced at 20.99
GF Supreme Pie
This mouthwatering Gluten-Free Supreme Pizza comes loaded with Pepperoni, Breakfast Bacon, Canadian Bacon, fresh Mushrooms, Black Olives, Red Onions, Mozzarella Cheese, and our signature Pizza Sauce. Available in a 14" size, for just 20.99
GF Pie Island
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our Gluten-Free Pie Island pizza. Our Gluten-Free Pie Island pizza features Canadian Bacon, Pineapple, Marinara Sauce, and Mozzarella Cheese. Available in 14" size for only 19.99

Heisenberg Pie - *Specialty*
Break out your Lederhosen and swing by any of The Pie's to try our Heisenberg’s Oktoberfest Pie. Smoked Brats & Spicy Link Sausages, Caramelized Onions, Sauerkraut, Toasted Caraway Seeds, Caramelized Green Apples, Mozzarella, Cheddar, and a sweet Bavarian Mustard Sauce with Fresh Dill swirled on top! It's only available until the end of October so get yours soon before it's gone!

Menus | Silverside Deli
top of page
Order Now
Menus
More
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
Menu
We Do Nothing More Than the Best Sandwich You’ll Ever Have
Monthly Specials
Sweet Habanero Chicken (September 2025 Monthly Special)
Panko-crusted chicken offers a golden crunch beneath layers of sweet habanero sauce and warm spice-infused pickled pineapple. Fresh romaine, cool cucumber, and sharp red onion brighten each bite, while crispy fried onions add the finishing touch. Served on airy ciabatta.

Make it spicy by adding house pickled habanero +$0.75
$15
Tapenade Turkey (September 2025 Monthly Special)
Thin-sliced hickory smoked turkey pairs with our wild garlic aioli and a rich olive tapenade. Crisp lettuce, vine-ripened tomato, and shaved red onion bring freshness, while provolone melds into the layers. Dill cucumber crisps add tang and crunch, all nestled on artisan ciabatta.
$15
Gochujang Hot Honey Ranch (September 2025 Monthly Special
A bold balance of heat and cool. Crispy fried chicken drenched in gochujang hot honey glaze with a sprinkle of honey crystals, layered with house-made ranch, cucumbers, cilantro, shredded lettuce, and crispy onions. Served on toasted ciabatta for a sandwich that’s fiery, sweet, and refreshing all at once.
$15
Mild
Chopped Chicken Fries
Golden fries loaded with chopped chicken tossed in our house seasoning blend, sautéed bell peppers, caramelized onions, and melty provolone. Drizzled with our scratch-made honey mustard BBQ sauce for the perfect balance of smoky, sweet, and savory. Forks optional.
$14
Dessert
Rotating Dessert Specials – Sweet surprises are always baking up at Silverside. One day it might be warm, house-made peach hand pies, the next rich chocolate fudge brownies, zesty lemon bars, chewy chocolate chip cookie bars, or nostalgic scotcharoos. The lineup changes often and each treat is here for only a short time, so be sure to ask your server what’s tempting today. All desserts made in house and available exclusively in-store while they last.
$3
Hot Sandwiches
Gochujang Hot Honey Ranch (September 2025 Monthly Special
A bold balance of heat and cool. Crispy fried chicken drenched in gochujang hot honey glaze with a sprinkle of honey crystals, layered with house-made ranch, cucumbers, cilantro, shredded lettuce, and crispy onions. Served on toasted ciabatta for a sandwich that’s fiery, sweet, and refreshing all at once.
$15

Panko-crusted chicken offers a golden crunch beneath layers of sweet habanero sauce and warm spice-infused pickled pineapple. Fresh romaine, cool cucumber, and sharp red onion brighten each bite, while crispy fried onions add the finishing touch. Served on airy ciabatta.

Make it spicy by adding house pickled habanero +$0.75
$15
Fried Chicken Caesar
Panko fried chicken, house-made Caesar dressing, served on toasted ciabatta over romaine, with pickled red onions, crispy onions, and shaved parmesan.
$15
Korean Fried Chicken
Crispy don-gaseu chicken topped with sriracha chili crisp mayo, ginger-garlic gochujang sauce, crispy onions, fresh cilantro, and house-made kimchi bacon jam, served on a toasted ciabatta with crisp cucumber.
$15
Chicken Parmigiano
Panko crusted chicken thighs, house-made vodka sauce, melted provolone, cherry pepper relish, honey balsamic glaze, chopped basil and parsley, 36-mo aged parmigiano reggiano.
$16
Mild
Honey Buffalo Chicken
Panko and herb crusted chicken thigh, house made honey buffalo & dill ranch, with lettuce, pickles, on ciabatta.
$14
Mild
Chopped Cheese
It's not a Philly, it's not a cheeseburger, it's just plain and simply the best in a bun! Grilled peppers, onions, ground angus, lettuce, tomato, house sauce and spice mix.

Add serrano peppers for +$1
$14
Collard Greens Melt
Collard greens slow braised for five hours in spicy miso, beer, onion, and garlic. Paired with chili crisp mayo & slaw, imported reserved Swiss cheese, on rye swirl.
$15
Vegetarian
Mild
Spicy Chicken
Panko & herb crusted chicken thigh, roasted Thai bird's eye chili & spice mix, chili crisp mayo and slaw, pickles, spicy house sauce, on ciabatta. Spice levels - mild, hot, fire.
$14

Reaper's Kiss Spicy Chicken
We take our delicious Spicy Chicken Sandwich, Fire level, and then generously coat it with Carolina reaper for an extra kick that doesn't sacrifice flavor for increased spiciness. Waiver REQUIRED. Available only in-store.
$15

Thin-sliced hickory smoked turkey pairs with our wild garlic aioli and a rich olive tapenade. Crisp lettuce, vine-ripened tomato, and shaved red onion bring freshness, while provolone melds into the layers. Dill cucumber crisps add tang and crunch, all nestled on artisan ciabatta.

$14
Italian Cold Cut

Retired Menu Items
Menu items from months past that may or may not be returning shortly.
Orange Chicken (August 2025 Monthly Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Our bold spin on a classic: panko-crusted chicken glazed in a zesty garlic-orange ginger sauce, layered with creamy orange aioli, house-pickled orange slices, sesame cucumber salad, and crispy onions. Fresh cilantro brings it all together on toasted ciabatta. 

Want it spicy? Add roasted Thai chilis for $0.50.
$15
Jerk Chicken Sandwich (August 2025 Monthly Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Spicy, sweet, and bright: jerk-seasoned chicken meets a preserved lime & Thai chili aioli, with pickled mango-pineapple, cucumbers, shaved red onion, and fresh cilantro on toasted ciabatta.
$15
Hot
Tuna Salad Sandwich (August 2025 Monthly Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Our house tuna salad made with fresh dill, celery, red onion, lemon, mustard, pickle brine, and fire-roasted red pepper aioli. Topped with cucumber, romaine, and Lay’s Sour Cream & Onion chips for the perfect crunch. Served on a toasted hoagie roll.
$15
Smoked Turkey (July 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Smoked turkey layered with raspberry chipotle jam, avocado ranch, provolone, shaved red onions, romaine, and mild jalapeño crispy chips, on rosemary parmesan ciabatta. Sweet, smoky, creamy, and crunchy with just a little kick of fun.
$15
Porchetta (July 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Pork belly rubbed with fennel and warm spices, roasted until crispy and rich. Topped with preserved lemon aioli, pickled lemons, crispy onions, arugula, and a touch of honey balsamic, on herbed ciabatta. Pure indulgence, no apologies.
$16
Tamarind Black Pepper Chicken (July 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Glazed tamarind black pepper chicken with bright yuzu kosho aioli, pickled pineapple, cucumber, fresh cilantro, and crispy onions, on soft ciabatta. Juicy, tangy, herby, and unexpectedly addictive.
$15
Carnitas Fries
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- A loaded fry experience—crispy hand-cut fries smothered in spiced confit pork shoulder, caramelized onions for depth, roasted bell peppers, serranos for a kick, pickled red onions for zing, melted Monterey Jack cheese, and a drizzle of cilantro aioli. Bold, rich, and irresistibly savory.
$15
Hot
Roast Beef (June 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Elevate your deli experience with thinly sliced roast beef, sharp provolone, and a zesty Italian salsa verde. Complemented by tomato aioli, arugula, fresh tomato, pickled red onion, and crispy onions, all layered on a marbled rye swirl. It’s a symphony of flavors and textures.
$16
Carolina Gold Confit Pork (June 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE-----Experience the South with our tender confit pork, glazed in house-made Carolina gold BBQ sauce. Topped with chili crisp slaw, sweet pickled pineapple, and fried dill chips, all on a toasted sesame bun. It’s a harmonious blend of tangy, sweet, and mildly spicy flavors.
$15
Chipotle BBQ Chicken Salad (June 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- A bold twist on a deli classic. Our chipotle chicken salad brings smoky heat, balanced by cool cucumber, fresh cilantro, and a creamy cilantro aioli. Crispy jalapeños add the perfect crunch, all nestled in a soft ciabatta roll. It’s a flavor fiesta in every bite.
$14
Sriracha Hoisin Pork Belly (May 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Pho-spiced, confit pork belly, flash-fried for a crispy finish and tossed in a bold sriracha hoisin BBQ glaze. Layered with crisp cucumbers, fresh cilantro, jalapeños, pickled daikon and carrots, and a touch of mayo, all served on a toasted hoagie. This one delivers rich, melt-in-your-mouth pork with a touch of heat, crunch, and tang in every bite.
$17
Mild
Bacon Ranch Chicken Salad (May 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Juicy chicken, sous vide in rendered bacon fat for a rich, savory depth, served with crispy bacon lardons, romaine, house-made ranch, tangy pickles, and crispy jalapeños chips. It’s a crunchy, smoky take on a comfort classic.
$14
TRUFF Fried Chicken (May 2025 Special)
-----CURRENTLY RETIRED AND UNAVAILABLE----- Crispy panko-breaded chicken thighs, slathered in our signature house-made TRUFF aioli, tucked into toasted ciabatta. Finished with cucumbers, fresh cilantro, and crispy fried onions. We took the iconic TRUFF sauce and built a sandwich around it - bold, savory, and unforgettable.
$15

Welcome
your neighborhood cafe & caterer
fresh fabulous food × Crafted with Love
Family owned and operated
We are a small, local, family owned restaurant that has been serving fabulous food since 2004. We use only the finest ingredients and prepare everything fresh in house daily. We offer our in house menu of salads, soups, paninis, and desserts, as well as dinner on Friday  nights.  We also have a separate catering menu to meet all your needs from breakfast, lunch, desserts, appetizers and dinner entrees. Catering is pick up or delivery on disposable serving trays/bowls/pans. We no longer offer staff/service for events.
We love our customers and hope to make each one feel like part of our family.  Thank you to an amazing community for your continued support!
Phone
(801) 292-2425
email platesandpalates@msn.com
Please DO NOT email orders
Please get your summer event catering orders in asap!
We would be happy to answer any questions or send estimates for large events via email.

$48

$48

$48
Ham, Gruyere, Potato, Caramelized Onion Egg Bake
$48
Fruit, Vegetable, Artisan Meats/Cheeses Trays Available- ask for pricing and seasonal selection
Baci Rolls $7.50 per dozen, $8.95 with butter pats
INDIVIDUAL PACKAGED CATERING AVAILABLE- order from daily lunch menu please.
Do you take reservations?
Sorry, our tables are first come, first serve. You may be seated when your entire party arrives. If you have a large party you may call ahead and we will do our best to accommodate you. Our peak hours are from 11:30-1, so you may consider coming at an off time if you have a large group. We do rent our space Mon-Thursday from 6:30 pm-10. Hourly charge plus food purchase minimum required.
How much is catering  per person?
As each event is different it is extremely hard to give you an estimate until we have more information. If you can give us a general guest count and either budget or an idea of the kind of menu you would like (finger foods, salad buffet, full dinner/entrees), then we are happy to get you an estimate. The best way to do that is to email platesandpalates@msn.com  Our catering menus are structured differently than most. Our menu items come in certain quantities, such as bowls of salad, 9x12 pans of entrees, sheets of dessert bars, so it is not a per person charge. We can help you over the phone for pick up or delivery orders for under 100 guests. For events larger than 100 guests we can help you via email or phone with menus/questions. We have coordinated many events from afar if you are not local. We can generally work with most budgets
How can I book my event?
After we have menu selections and a very rough guest count, we will give you an estimate. If the estimate is agreeable to you, we will then take a NON-REFUNDABLE deposit,  and then your event will be booked. Your date is NOT saved until we have a menu and deposit.  We can
slightly fine tune
the quantities/ guest count within 10 days. Increasing the order/guest count can be difficult for us so please shoot a little high on guest estimate.
What catering services do you offer?
We offer pick up or drop off on disposable serving dishes. Payment in full is due 2 days before any delivery.  We are no longer offering full offsite service with staff/servers.

Blue Iguana’s Menu
Welcome to Blue Iguana’s authentic Mexican experience! Located in the heart of Salt Lake City, our food is all prepared in-house, using only the freshest ingredients. We pride ourselves on upholding our ancestors’ tradition of slow-cooking, marinating, and seasoning our meats and vegetables to perfection.
You will love our variety of margaritas and other cocktails, while enjoying our authentic and lively atmosphere. We might be famous for our traditional molés, but don’t let that stop you from trying any of our other delicious chimichangas, burritos, and tacos!
Are you ready to eat? Call us at 801-533-8900 or click the “Reserve” tab above to make your reservation. Please note that this page only includes a partial lunch menu. For the full lunch, dinner, and alcohol menus, please click the buttons below.

Food Menu | The Bayou
Today is Mardi Gras (AKA Fat Tuesday)
This is our busiest day of the year!  Live music, killer food and cocktails, face painting and more!
In order to give our guests the best possible experience we may have to disable to-go orders during our dinner rush.
If you are unable to checkout this is because we are unable to handle any more orders at the moment.
You can either come join us in person or hopefully wait a while and once we are back under control we will enable on-line to go orders again.
During this time we may be unable to answer the phones as well so please bear with us.
Laissez les bons temps rouler!
Order To-Go
Specials
Asian Tuna Steak Sandwich
17
Lightly seasoned, sesame crusted and seared tuna steak on a brioche bun with arugula, shredded daikon, tomato and a wasabi ginger aioli.
Satay Chicken Pasta Salad
16
Bowtie pasta, grilled chicken, red peppers, cucumber, and cilantro tossed with a satay peanut dressing and topped with crushed peanuts.  Served chilled
Smoked Salmon Alfredo
18
Penne pasta tossed in Alfredo sauce with smoked salmon, and green peas.
Appetizers
Alligator Cheesecake
11
A savory cheesecake made with alligator sausage. Baked in a cracker, pecan crust and served with roasted red pepper coulis.
Buffalo Wings
17
Crisp and spicy with a creamy blue cheese dressing.
Your choice of either regular, cajun dusted or 1/2 and 1/2. (GF*)
Cajun Seafood Balls
14
A mix of salmon, crawfish and shrimp, breaded and fried to a crisp and served with chipotle cocktail and tartar sauce.
Chicken Quesadilla
11
Chicken, green chilies and a blend of cheeses. Served with cumin sour cream and our house salsa.
Chips and Salsa
11
Fresh corn chips, fried in house and served with our house salsa. (GF*)
Crispy Ravioli
13
Five cheese ravioli, fried to a golden brown, served with a spicy tomato dipping sauce.
Gumbo Fries
16
White fries, covered in cheddar and jack cheese and then smothered with Gumbo.
Add shrimp or crawfish +6

14
Shrimp sauteed with our paprika spice blend.
Popcorn Crawfish
14
Crawfish tail meat, lightly breaded, deep-fried and served with a side of tomato-chipotle dipping sauce.
Popcorn Shrimp
14
Shrimp, lightly floured and deep-fried. Served with a side of tomato-chipotle dipping sauce.
Southwest Artichoke Cheese Dip
15
Hot and creamy, made with roasted new mexico chilies, artichoke hearts, parmesan and cream cheese. Served with house fried tortilla chips. (GF+)
Sweet Potato Fries
12
A 50/50 mix of white and sweet potato fries served with our famous garlic-chipotle aioli.
all sweet +2 (GF*)
Bayou Favorites
Served with a mixed greens salad or substitute gumbo/soup for +3.
Dressing choices.
Bayou Fish Plate
19
A Bayou Classic. Choose either blackened salmon or blackened or fried catfish. Served with steamed vegetables and your choice of either creamy Cajun fettuccine or 50/50 fries.
Cajun Burrito
19
Jambalaya rolled in a flour tortilla and smothered in craw fish etouffee, and topped with sliced avocado.
Crawfish Etouffee
18
A butter based spicy crawfish sauce.  Served over seasoned rice.
Smothered over a filet of Fried Catfish +8.

52
Make 3 choices from Jambalaya, Red Beans & Rice, and Hoppin John plus get salads for 4.  Perfect portions for multiple people. (GF)
Gumbolaya

Our famous Jambalaya smothered in Gumbo to ensure full cardiac arrest.

Hoppin John
18

Jambalaya
18
A southern classic. Choose from traditional made with sausage and ham or vegetarian.
Add shrimp or crawfish +6. (GF)
Red Beans & Rice

Entrees
Served with a mixed greens salad or substitute gumbo/soup for +3.
Dressing choices.
Ahi Tuna Tacos
18
Ahi tuna dusted with chipotle pepper for a kick of flavor. Served in flour tortillas with salsa cumin sour cream and avocado relish. (GF+)
Cajun Game Hen
21
Tons better than deep fried turkey, our cajun spiced cornish game hen is deep fried and served with rosemary new potatoes and steamed vegetables. (GF*)
Chicken Fried Chicken
19
A juicy chicken breast, breaded and pan fried then smothered in country style gravy.  Served with caramelized shallot mashers and steamed vegetables.
Grilled Pizzas
Artichoke Pizza
14

Bayou Pizza
14
Spicy diced chicken with carmelized onions on a bed of cheese and spicy tomato sauce.
Jambal Pizza

Turkey Burger
16
Asian style curry turkey burger. Made with plum sauce, 	applesauce, curry and other secret ingredients.  Served on a brioche bun with lettuce, tomato and red onion. 	Please try before adding ketchup or mustard.

Non-Alcoholic Beverages
Athletic Brewing Athletic Lite
6
Athletic Lite is a light brew, completely reimagined. Its classically simple but expertly crafted with 25 calories, 5 carbs, and organic grains. We brewed it specifically for the sport of life and all the good times that come with it.
Athletic Brewing Cerveza Athletica
6
Atlética is a refreshingly bright take on a Mexican-style copper. Using the finest Munich malts, it boasts a lightly toasted malt character with a whisper of spicy florals before rolling into smooth and lightly sweet waves of bread crust and wheat. A medium-body brew that is big in flavor, its the epitome of easy drinking. A smooth and satisfying cooler must-have.
Athletic Brewing Free Wave Hazy IPA
6
Our Free Wave Hazy IPA is meant for the open road. Whether youre cruising the Pacific Coast Highway in a convertible or tracing your way up the coast on your bike, our Free Wave doesnt cut corners. This mouth watering IPA is loaded with Amarillo, Citra, and Mosaic hops. Show Less
Athletic Brewing Run Wild IPA
6
The ultimate session-able IPA. Brewed with a blend of Northwest hops with Citra and Mosaic at the forefront. Body of premium organic malts from US & Germany. Subtle yet complex malt profile.
Athletic Brewing Upside Dawn
6
Refreshing, clean, balanced, light-bodied. Aromas subtle with floral and earthy notes. Brewed with premium organic malts from US & Germany along with combo of English and traditional American hops to the golden ale style. 50 Calories.
Bayou Lemonade
5
House lemonade with fresh muddled mint. Garnished with mint.
Best Day Brewing Hazy IPA
6
We founded this company with the sole mission of creating genuine craft beers, that were also non-alcoholic. Our non-alcoholic Hazy IPA is that mission in spades. Honeyed amber in color, it has a strong hop-forward aroma with hints of resinous pine and grapefruit. Its luscious medium body has a smooth, complex citrus flavor with a full and lively mouthfeel and a dry finish. Finally, a non-alcoholic craft beer for real craft beer drinkers.
Best Day Brewing Kolsh
6
The complement to the Hazy had to be easy-drinking, approachable, and low calorie, yet full of flavor and authenticity. We used a combination of Cologne and Pilsner malts and Hallertau Traditional hops to create a refreshingly complex Kolsch-style ale. Its sturdy caramel malt flavor is perfectly balanced by the citrusy hops, leaving a bright and crisp finish. The quintessential embodiment of "ALL DAY. EVERY DAY."
Best Day Brewing West Coast IPA
6
Our non-alcoholic West Coast IPA is a tribute to our back yard and its rich history of making damn good beers. Its Cascade hops are an ode to the beers that started the IPA revolution. The rich malt backbone provides ample structure for the grapefruit Cascade notes to shine. Drink up, get out there.

Gruvi alcohol-free sparkling rose is crisp, effervescent, and fruity on the nose, with notes of tart green apple and fresh strawberry.
Gruvi Dry Secco Alcohol-Free
7
Delicate, floral and semi-dry with a touch of tartness, this alcohol-free sparkling prosecco is Gruvi's most popular bev for a reason.
Gruvi Non-Alcoholic Dry Red Blend
8
This alcohol removed Red Blend is a weeknight winner. It also won some actual hardware, taking a silver medal at the International Wine & Spirits Competition for its pleasantly dry, full-bodied taste, and rich notes of cranberry, cherry, savory cardamom and nutmeg.
Gruvi Non-Alcoholic Sangria
8
This alcohol removed Sangria may look like sparkling wine, but its actually solid gold. Thats right, this uncompromising bev earned top honor at the International Wine and Spirits Competition. Bright notes of blood orange, red currant and blueberry are perfectly balanced with a warm touch of cinnamon and clove; its the not-too-sweet Spanish bev thats always down for m?s good times.

The Bayou App
We are Utah's largest beer bar and have the best selection of beers in the region. You simply will not find a better selection of beers available anywhere in Utah.  We feature many local Microbreweries on our 36 tap draft system and have an extensive selection of beers in the bottle.
With a beer list now reaching into the many hundred, it can be overwhelming to find a beer you want.  To solve this problem, The Bayou released the first and still only beer app for any Utah bar.  Our app's beer list is updated in real time and allows filtering, sorting, and searching for beers in many ways.  You can even give your phone a shake for a random beer selection.
It is simply the best way to access our beer menu.

About the Business
The Grand America Hotel is an opulent European-style hotel in the heart of Salt Lake City. If you're traveling for business, the hotel is conveniently located 1 mile from the Salt Palace Convention Center and 1.2 miles from the Salt Lake City Amtrak station. If traveling for pleasure or with family, you'll find dining, nightlife, shopping, and local attractions, only minutes away. For those looking to ski, snowboard, or snowmobile, the hotel is located within an hour's drive of 9 ski resorts. Additional outdoor recreation within an hour's drive includes biking, hiking, golfing, rock climbing, fishing, and much more.

At the hotel, you'll find elegant rooms decorated in rich colors and fabrics, with handcrafted furniture, balconies, and marble bathrooms, as well as flat-screen TVs, iPod docks, and free Wi-Fi. Suites add separate living spaces, and some have full kitchens.

The main restaurant, Laurel Brasserie & Bar, brings locals and visitors together for an elevated dining experience in a socially vibrant atmosphere. Our neighborhood brasserie offers a European-inspired menu that excites restaurant enthusiasts and dazzles locals and visitors with an expansive wine and cocktail list In addition, Grand America offers two elegant bar/lounges (1 serving afternoon tea), and a French-style sweet shop, Bonne Vie...
…

About Us
Menu
Catering
Books
Indulge in Southern Comfort
Indulge in the rich flavors of Soul Food at Sauce Boss Southern Kitchen. From classic fried chicken to our signature soul sauce, every dish is a celebration of tradition. Experience the warmth of Southern hospitality and let us tantalize your taste buds.
Catering Inquiry
Appetizers
Fried Green Tomatoes
- Crispy cornmeal-breaded green tomatoes served with our house-made ranch
Bacon Cheese Fries
- Crispy fries topped with our golden splendor cheese sauce, cubed bacon, and a drizzle of soul sauce
Blackened Chicken Wings
- Baked then fried wings tossed in our blackened seasoning and served with our spicy ranch
Main Dishes
Served with 2 sides & cornbread
Fried Chicken
Boneless chicken thighs freshly breaded with herbs and spices, then fried. Served with our maple hot sauce
Catfish
Cornmeal breaded filet served crispy with our soul sauce  (catfish sourced from Mississippi and Louisiana)
Blackened Pork Chops
Seasoned and seared chops served with our soul sauce
Fried Pork Chops
2 floured and fried pork chops, served with our apple purée
Chicken Fried Chicken
Butterflied and breaded chicken breast, topped with brown gravy
Served with 1 side & cornbread
Shrimp and Grits
Shrimp and bacon sautéed in blackened butter and served over cheesy cheddar grits
The Big Cheddar
Shrimp and bacon sautéed in blackened butter served over our golden splendor shells and cheese
Pork Shank
Braised pork shank, served over mashed potatoes and topped with a rich broth and collard greens. (Limited quantities available)
Sides
Collard Greens
- Tender collard greens slow cooked with bacon, onion and garlic
Candied Yams
- Fresh yams simmered with vanilla, butter and cinnamon
Golden Splendor
- Shell pasta tossed with a cheddar cheese sauce
Black eyed peas
- Slow simmered with bacon in a savory broth
Spiced Corn
- Yellow corn sautéed with our blackened butter
Mashed potatoes and gravy
- Buttery garlic mashed red potatoes served with gravy
Fries
- Crispy fries tossed with our blackening spice
Seasonal Vegetables
- Chef's choice, always delicious
Salads
All salads served with dressing glazed chicken
Broccoli Kale Salad
- Chopped kale, red cabbage and broccolini tossed with a honey dijon dressing, topped with dried cranberries and sunflower kernels
Kale Apple Salad
- Chopped kale and apples tossed with a creamy cranberry dressing, topped with Candied walnuts and bacon
Southern Wedge
- Wedges of lettuce topped with bacon & cheddar, drizzled with our soul sauce and finished with a basted egg.
Sandwiches
(*Sandwiches are served on French bread with chopped lettuce and sauce. Comes with 1 side.)
Fried Chicken
- Chicken breast with soul sauce.
Breaded Shrimp
- Fried shrimp with tartar sauce.
Blackened Pork Chop
- Seasoned chop with soul sauce.
Fried Catfish
- Fried catfish with tartar sauce.
Sticky Chicky
- Fried thigh glazed in maple hot sauce with a blackened aioli.
Messy Boy
- Mashed potatoes and brown gravy in the middle of 2 fried pork chops.
Desserts
Lemon Bars
- Lemon curd baked in a buttery graham cracker crust
Apple Bread Pudding
- Soft and sweet bread pudding topped with an apple cream
Sweet Potato Pie Cheesecake
- Sweet potato pie and cheesecake swirled together and baked in a graham cracker crust
Drinks
House Red Drink
(aka Bissap, Zobo, Jamaica, the original cool-aid) A drink originating from Africa that’s made with red hibiscus, ginger and pineapple and lemon.
House Lemonade
- Our refreshing homemade lemonade, made with fresh-squeezed lemons. Enjoy it classic or with a seasonal fruit puree.
Soft Drinks
- Coke products
House Brewed Iced Sweet Tea
- It’s tea and it’s sweet.
Family Dinners
(takeout only, serves 4-6)
7 Blackened Pork-Chops
2 large sides, 6 slices of cornbread with honey butter
4 Chicken Fried Chicken (breasts)
large sides, 6 slices of cornbread with honey butter
6 Fried Chicken Thighs
large sides, 6 slices of cornbread with honey butter
4 (7-9oz) Filets of Catfish
large sides, 6 slices of cornbread with honey butter

Closed Sundays, Mondays and all major holidays.
Independence Day, Halloween, Thanksgiving  & Black Friday, Chrismas  Eve, Christmas Day, New Years Eve and New Years Day.

Unlimited Salad Festival

Unlimited Salad Festival
®
- Dinner
see pricing
Unlimited Salad Festival
®
- Lunch
see pricing
Mon-Fri, 11a-3p
Unlimited Grilled Vegetables and Pineapple
see pricing
Specialty Skewers
Specialty skewers can be added to any Tucanos' Churrasco. A skewer of your choice is cooked to order and brought to your table by your meat server. Each item is priced per skewer and sharing is encouraged.  Cooking times vary and availability is limited.
Shrimp Skewer
see pricing
A full skewer of large shrimp grilled and brushed with our garlic sauce.
Center Cut Sirloin Wrapped in Bacon Skewer
see pricing
Center cut sirloin wrapped in bacon and grilled to perfection.
Sea Scallop Skewer
Succulent jumbo scallops hand-wrapped in bacon, slowly open-flame grilled and brushed with a special herb-garlic butter sauce.  MARKET PRICE
gluten free
Appetizers
Taste of Brazil
see pricing
A tapas style plate of traditional Coxinhas de Frango (chicken fritters) served with zesty Brazilian sauce.
Onion Tropical
see pricing
Seasoned sweet onion straws, fried and served with a wild mango dipping sauce.
Nachos Brasileiros
see pricing
A traditional favorite served with a Tucanos twist.
Calamari
see pricing
Tender calamari, lightly dusted with manioc flour and fried, served with sweet and zesty carnaval sauce.
tucanos specialty item
Beverages
Brazilian Traditions
Brazilian Lemonade
see pricing
A festive lemonade freshly-made from Brazilian Lemons and can be added onto with any of our pure fruit purees. It’s also bottomless. 
You can add other fruit to your Brazilian Lemonade too:
Mango • Passion Fruit • Pineapple • Guava Raspberry • Strawberry
note: Brazilian Lemonade contains dairy
Fresh Fruit Juices
see pricing
Enjoy a refreshing, fruity drink with your Churrasco. Choose between Mango, Passion Fruit, Pineapple, Guava, Raspberry or Strawberry juices.
Guarana
see pricing
A refreshing soft-drink from the heart of the Amazon
Brazilian Sunrise
see pricing
A drink sure to wake-up your taste buds with mango, passion fruit, and lemon-lime rising over grenadine.
Tucanos Specialty Blended Drinks
Rio De Janeiro
see pricing
A festive flavor that smacks of sunny beaches and distant sea breezes with passion fruit, lemon-lime, ice cream, and topped with whipped cream and sweet coconut flakes.
Amazon
see pricing
Look forward to the combined flavors of Brazil’s fresh fruits(mango, papaya, pineapple, and banana) with ice cream to add sparkle to your dining.
Ipanema
see pricing
You might forget about the girl from Ipanema after one taste of this coconut milk, banana, raspberry and ice cream treat.
Tucanos
see pricing
Our namesake drink takes the best of Brazil’s signature fruits and blends them to an irresistible sip of mango, passion fruit, pineapple, papaya, lemon-lime, and ice cream.
Add a shot of Malibu Rum
see pricing
Alcoholic Beverages
All Tucanos locations feature a full bar
Other Drinks
Pepsi, Diet Pepsi & other Pepsi Products, Hot Chocolate, Coffee & Tea
tucanos specialty item
Desserts
Select from our abundant dessert tray or ask your server about our house favorites
Créme Brûlée
see pricing
A time-honored favorite made with our special Brazilian crafting care.
Pudim de Leite
see pricing
Our Brazilian Flan, richer and creamier than a traditional flan.
Torre Chocolate
see pricing
A decadent tower of rich chocolate cake, covered in chocolate shavings, drizzled with a vanilla creme sauce and surrounded with whipped cream.
Brûlée Cheesecake
see pricing
A home-made, rich and creamy baked cheesecake, glazed in a luscious creme and raspberry sauce.
Truly A’MAZON Fudge Brownie
see pricing
A sinful warm brownie covered in chocolate and caramel sauces with a scoop of rich vanilla bean ice cream on top.
Mango Butter Cake
see pricing
Our famous butter cake infused with mango puree and served warm, topped with mango sorbet and diced mango.
FRUIT CRÈMES
see pricing
A smooth blend of any of our fresh fruit purees & vanilla ice cream.
strawberry · mango · guava · passion fruit · raspberry · papaya
gluten free
tucanos specialty item

our story
Cafe Madrid was first located in the Black Diamond Center on 3900 South, in 2003. Then, Gabrielle and Todd McAfee built the current Cafe Madrid, from the ground up, on Highland Drive in 2011. Proudly run as a family owned and operated restaurant, Andrea Mier, daughter of Gabrielle McAfee, currently manages the restaurant with the community of Cafe Madrid at heart.

Review by - Google
five star review by
Michael F:
My family had this restaurant rented out for our Christmas party. The first thing I wanted to say and give credit to is the food is fantastic! The staff was very polite and nice and was very helpful when we needed more tables when more people showed up than we expected. Thank you very much Café Madrid!!!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Heather K:
Cafe Madrid never disappoints. The food is excellent. I had the chicken marsala last night and easily give it 5 stars. The marsala sauce is absolutely perfect. My husband had the pork chops and said they were the best he had ever had. They were perfectly cooked and the mustard sauce with them was delicious. The service is wonderful. We always had drinks full, food served just as ready and much attention given to us. It is a perfect place to go for a special ocassion or date night.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Don K:
Our go to place to celebrate wife's birthday. The Chilean sea bass was delicious and the salmon was so flavorful. Don't miss the brussel sprouts, they are a delicious starter.

100% vegan deliciousness. Made from scratch in Salt Lake City.
About Us
We’ve been slinging vegan sandwiches in Salt Lake City since 2012. Our little sandwich shop was born out of a deep love for animals and our passion for plant-based eating.
Everything we serve is made in-house, including all of our proteins and sauces. We are grateful to serve accessible, nutrient dense and affordable vegan meals to the community around us.

Menu
All of Toasters sandwiches are made with fresh, locally sourced meats, breads and vegetables custom crafted to tickle your taste buds. The People
The People
Toasters is a local business and is dedicated in helping create jobs along the Wasatch front. We take great pride in our staff because they are the people that make our business thrive every single day. We also value our dedicated customers that have helped us grow over the past 15 years, it is because of these friendly faces that we look forward to creating great breakfast and lunch experiences. Thank you to everyone who has eaten at a Toasters and those of you who have yet to walk through our doors!

Pasta & Zappis
Pasta
Macaroni and Cheese
Indulge in perfectly baked Macaroni, drenched in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, velvety Cream Cheese, Romano, and Parmesan Cheese. Crowned with a smoky, buttery cracker crumb, it’s comfort food with a gourmet twist!  Available for just 9.99
Buffalo Macaroni and Cheese
Get ready to savor baked Macaroni smothered in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, Cream Cheese, Romano, and Parmesan Cheese. Topped with zesty Buffalo Chicken, a sprinkle of Gorgonzola, and a smoky, buttery cracker crumb for the perfect finish. It’s a flavor-packed twist on a classic!   Available for just 12.99
Jala-Bacon Mac and Cheese
Macaroni baked in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, Cream Cheese, Romano, & Parmesan, topped with Jalapenos, Bacon, & a smoky Butter Cracker Crumb. It’s a flavor-packed twist on a classic!   Available for just 11.99
Spaghetti with Meatballs
Satisfy your cravings with our Spaghetti and Meatballs dish, featuring two Meatballs drenched in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce and served on a bed of al dente Italian Spaghetti. For an extra kick, pair it with our spicy Cajun Link Sausage. it's a meal you won't want to miss. Available for just 10.99
Spicy Thai Pasta
Indulge in the flavors of Oven-Roasted Chicken, Pineapple, fresh Carrots, Red Onions, and Sesame Seeds tossed with Spaghetti and a spicy Thai Peanut Sauce. This dish is finished with a generous sprinkle of fresh-cut Cilantro and Basil to elevate the taste. It's the perfect combination of sweet and spicy at a great value of 11.99
The Vesuvius Calzone
Experience the fiery explosion of flavors with our signature calzone, The Vesuvius, inspired by the only active Volcano in Italy. Our hand-tossed Dough is stuffed with Italian Spaghetti, Meatballs, and Mozzarella Cheese, all generously smothered in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce. Don't miss your chance to try this mouthwatering masterpiece, available for just 11.99

The Vesuvius Calzone
Experience the fiery explosion of flavors with our signature Zappi, The Vesuvius, inspired by the only active Volcano in Italy. The Wise Guy
Indulge in our delicious Zappi made with our hand-tossed Dough and filled with a creamy mixture of fresh Spinach Leaves, Artichoke Hearts, Whipped Cream Cheese, and Mozzarella Cheese. It's then topped with fresh-cut Basil, Romano Cheese, and diced Tomatoes marinated in a sweet Balsamic Reduction, making it a truly irresistible treat. You can also add Oven-Roasted Chicken for an extra burst of flavor at just .99 cents more. All of this is available for only 11.99
Cheese Zappi
Experience a classic Italian taste with our cheese Zappi, featuring melted Mozzarella Cheese and Pizza Sauce that creates the perfect balance of flavors. Enjoy it as it is for a simple yet satisfying meal, or add your favorite toppings such as fresh vegetables or savory meats for an extra burst of flavor. You can also add a dollop of creamy Ricotta Cheese for an indulgent twist. Each additional topping is only .99 cents, and our Seafood toppings are not available for Zappis. Get yours now for only 8.99
Meat Zappi
Indulge in our delicious Meat Calzone, loaded with gooey Mozzarella Cheese, zesty Pizza Sauce, and your choice of savory toppings. Pick from Pepperoni, Smoked Ham, Canadian Bacon, or Genoa Salami, fresh cut Onions, all mixed with fresh Mushrooms, crispy Green Peppers, and tangy Black Olives. For an extra burst of creaminess, add Ricotta Cheese for only .99 cents, or spice it up with Cajun Link Sausage for just .99 cents more. All this goodness for only 10.99
Vegetarian Zappi
Savor the delicious flavors of our Veggie Zappi, filled with creamy Mozzarella Cheese and zesty Pizza Sauce. Packed with wholesome ingredients such as fresh Mushrooms, Black Olives, Onions, and Green Peppers, this Calzone is a perfect choice for vegetarians. Want to add some extra richness? Go for a dollop of Ricotta Cheese at just .99 cents more! Only for 9.99
Desserts & Drinks
Beverages
Micro-Brewed Root Beer
Indulge in our delicious Micro Brewed Root Beer, made with a traditional recipe that's sure to satisfy your cravings. Our Root Beer is brewed from scratch using only the finest ingredients and served ice cold from a keg. With its smooth, rich flavor and frothy head, it pours like a fine Ale and is the perfect complement to any meal. Come and experience true Root Beer done right!
Soft Drinks
Our beverage selection includes unlimited refills of Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, and Dr. Pepper. You can also take your favorite soft drinks to go with our convenient 2-liter bottles and 6-packs available for delivery or take-out. So whether you're dining in or taking out, you can enjoy your favorite sodas anytime, anywhere.
Draft Beer
At our establishment, we take pride in offering a diverse selection of beers to our patrons. We feature a rotating selection of local craft beers on tap, showcasing the best brews from the region. In addition, we offer a range of domestic and imported beers in the bottle, ensuring that there is something for every taste and preference. Whether you're a fan of hoppy IPAs, cool Ambers, or refreshing Lagers, we have a beer that will satisfy your cravings. Come in and check out our beer menu today!
Bottled Juices
We offer a refreshing selection of bottled fruit juices to quench your thirst. Choose from sweet and tangy Orange Juice or crisp and refreshing Apple Juice. Each bottle contains a generous serving of your favorite fruit juice, perfect for enjoying on-the-go or pairing with your favorite meal.

Hand-tossed spiced Dough with Vegan Garlic Ranch Sauce shredded Vegan Seitan Chicken tossed in a spicy Buffalo Sauce, Red Onions, and Vegan Non-Dairy Cheese. Deliciously messy! 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A
Vegan Figaro Pie
Hand-tossed Dough with Marinara Sauce, Vegan Fennel Sausage, Onions, Green Peppers, Sicilian Spiced Tomatoes, and Vegan Non-Dairy Cheese. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A
VEGAN Bacon Cheese Beyond Burger Pie
Our hand-tossed Dough with Toasted Sesame Seeds, seasoned Beyond Beef, Red Onions, Tomatoes, and (soy) Bacon with a light sprinkle of Vegan Non-Dairy Cheddar Cheese and topped with chopped Dill Pickles and The Pie's gourmet Burger Sauce. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A
Vegan Xtreme Veggie Pie
Hand-tossed Dough with Marinara Sauce, fresh Spinach, Artichoke Hearts, Sicilian Spiced Tomatoes, Red Onions, Vegan Non-Dairy Cheddar & Mozzarella Cheese. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A
Vegan Classic Veggie Pie
Hand-tossed Dough with Marinara Sauce, fresh Mushrooms, Green Peppers, Onions, Black Olives, Vegan Non-Dairy Cheddar & Mozzarella Cheese - topped with fresh sliced Tomatoes. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A
Vegan Goodfella Pie
The Pie’s hand-tossed Dough is layered with Vegan Creamed Cheese, fresh Spinach Leaves, Artichoke Hearts, Vegan Seitan Chicken, Vegan Non-Dairy Cheese, and a touch of Marinara Sauce – Topped with diced Tomatoes, fresh-cut Basil, and a drizzle of sweet Balsamic Reduction. 12"-16.99  /  14"-20.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
Vegan Thai Pie
Our Thin crust with spicy Thai Peanut Sauce, Vegan Seitan Chicken, Carrots, Red Onions, Pineapple, fresh Basil, and chopped Cilantro. Topped with Vegan Non-Dairy Cheese and toasted Sesame Seeds. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A

Current Specialty Pie
Heisenberg Pie - *Specialty*
Break out your Lederhosen and swing by any of The Pie's to try our Heisenberg’s Oktoberfest Pie. Smoked Brats & Spicy Link Sausages, Caramelized Onions, Sauerkraut, Toasted Caraway Seeds, Caramelized Green Apples, Mozzarella, Cheddar, and a sweet Bavarian Mustard Sauce with Fresh Dill swirled on top! It's only available until the end of October so get yours soon before it's gone!

Our Story

Crafting fresh food!
See Our Menu
Cooking fresh food!
Order Online To Go
We work hard to bring you freshly made food with local ingredients, hand crafted in-house from our talented team of chefs. Creating classic dishes from around the world to compliment our craft beer. See our menus below:
Fresh Food
Local Ingredients
Skillfully Crafted
Dine In Menu
Order To Go
Brunch
Amazing stories from our customers
feel free to add your review on Google, Yelp, or Untappd
Out of all the choices of breweries that get thrown at you when searching for them in Salt Lake City, this is the one to choose. Great atmosphere, large selection of unique beers, and the food is delicious. You’re welcome.
C.Watts
Love this place. Not a drinker, but the food is great and they have some fun local sodas to try. The bratwurst is great (amazing sauerkraut), and the pastrami sandwich was to die for! Super cool vibe. Great place to watch fight night. :)
Stacie Graves
I can’t say enough about this place. Excellent beer and the Rueben was phenomenal. We also sampled a bunch of the appetizers and all were so yummy! Great place with enough parking downtown
Annie Thomas
Really clean and fun pub. Staff was all so fantastic and friendly. We ate so much good food, and had awesome beers. We were able to eat, enjoy beers and laugh and felt so comfortable. So happy to have found this place while in town visiting family.
Toni Linquist

PLEASE INFORM YOUR SERVER OF ANY FOOD/NUT ALLERGIES, VEGETARIAN, GLUTEN OR SPICE PREFERENCES. WE COOK WITH NUTS IN OUR KITCHEN.
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
Cake Fee
2.00 per person
Separate Check Requests
Please allow additional time
Corkage Fee
8.00 per bottle
Favorite
Killer Nachos
(Vegetarian option available)
Generous portion of totopos topped with refried beans, pork chile verde, house-made pork chorizo, melted Jack cheese, pico de gallo, guacamole, sour cream, black olives, green onions, and jalapeños--Substitutions make it NOT so KILLER!
Vegetarian
Nachos Regulares
House-made tortilla chips topped with refried beans and melted cheese, garnished with jalapeños, sour cream, olives, and tomatoes.
Gluten-Free
Vegetarian
House-Made Guacamole
Serves four or more. Avocado, tomato, onion, serranos, and cilantro, and made fresh daily.
Adventurous
Gluten-Free
Rajas De Chile Poblano Con Queso
Strips of roasted chile poblano sautéed with sliced tomatoes and onions, finished with melted Jack cheese, served with your choice of flour or corn tortillas.
Add house-made pork chorizo
Gluten-Free
Vegetarian
Hongos Al Ajillo
Mushrooms, garlic, butter, white wine, and chili flakes.
Adventurous
Encurtidos
(4)
Four pickled jalapeños stuffed with shrimp and queso fresco, dipped in egg batter, fried and topped with Salsa Española and melted Jack cheese, guacamole on the side.
Gluten-Free
Vegetarian
Enchiladas Potosinas
(4)
A unique enchilada born in the state of San Luis Potosi, made of corn masa, filled with queso fresco, green onions, and crushed red chile, grilled, fried, topped with melted Jack cheese and sprinkled with green onions, and served with guacamole.
Vegetarian
Chile Con Queso With Totopos
Anaheim chile, fresh jalapeños, onions, and tomato blended with Velveeta and Jack cheese.
Shrimp Quesadilla
Seasoned grilled shrimp folded into a flour tortilla with melted Jack cheese. Served with a side of sour cream.
House Quesadillas
Garnished with guacamole, a 10-inch flour tortilla generously filled with your choice of:
Jack cheese
Cheese and rajas de chile poblano, onion and tomatoes
Cheese and sautéed mushrooms
Cheese, potato and pork chorizo
Grilled chicken
Adventurous
Killer Chicken Salad
Maria’s original
Chopped chicken breast blended with chipotle chiles, capers, pecans, mayo, and a hint of mustard. Served on artisan mixed greens, avocado slices, and house-made totopos.
Gluten-Free
Red Iguana Dinner Salad
Artisan mixed greens tossed with diced grilled nopales, tomatoes, toasted pepitas, cotija cheese and your choice of ranch, caesar, or house vinaigrette.
Add your favorite protein:
Grilled chicken
Grilled top sirloin tips
Grilled tiger prawns
Grilled fish of the day
Mole (pronounced MOH-lay) is a sauce made of dried and fresh chiles, nuts, spices, herbs, fruits and vegetables. Delight in Red Iguana’s interpretation of Mexico’s national dish.
Mole Coloradito
Pine nuts, almonds, peanuts, sesame seeds, dried ancho and guajillo chiles, blended with fresh chile poblano and Mexican chocolate, served with succulent carnitas.
Gluten-Free
Mole Negro
The king of moles! Dried chile mulato, negro pasilla, Mexican chocolate, raisins, peanuts, walnuts and bananas—tossed with chicken or turkey.
Gluten-Free
Mole Amarillo
Golden raisins, yellow tomatoes, yellow zucchini, guajillo, aji, and habanero chiles make this mole a fiery favorite, tossed with chicken.
Gluten-Free
Mole Poblano
Puebla's beloved mole: Guajillo and ancho-dried chiles, peanuts, sesame seeds, walnuts, raisins, bananas, and Mexican chocolate, tossed with turkey.
Gluten-Free
Mole Verde
Fresh chile poblano, jalapeño, blended with pepitas, sesame seeds, basil, onions, lettuce, zucchini, and avocados, tossed with turkey or chicken.
Gluten-Free
Red Pipian
A pumpkin seed sauce made with dried chile guajillo, peanuts, pepitas, onions, and tomatoes, tossed with chicken.
Mole Sauces To-Go
Take some delicious mole sauces home with you. Delicious, hot or cold!
Pint
Quart
ALL COMBO PLATES BELOW ARE SERVED WITH RICE AND BEANS. NO SUBSTITUTIONS, PLEASE.

Most of our menu items are available a la carte.
Red Iguana
One cheese enchilada, a Taco al Iguana, a beef flauta topped with guacamole and sour cream, a chile relleno, and a beef tostada complete this very special combo plate.
Poblano Plate
One sour cream chicken entomatada topped with Salsa Española, a Taco a la Iguana, and a beef tostada served with a side of guacamole.
Tapatio Plate
One chicken, beef or cheese enchilada, chile relleno, and a beef or chicken flauta topped with sour cream and guacamole.
Iguana Plate
One chicken, beef or cheese enchilada, one chile relleno, and one hard-shell beef taco.
Mexican Plate
One chile verde burrito, one hard-shell beef taco, and one beef tostada.
Favorite
Gluten-Free
Puntas De Filete A La Norteña
Top sirloin tips sautéed with bacon, jalapeño strips, onions and fresh tomatoes, served atop our almond mole. Refried beans and tortillas complete this much-loved dish.
Adventurous
Gluten-Free
Cochinita Pibil
Pork loin rubbed with achiote, vinegar, lime juice, orange juice, paprika and salt, slow-roasted, then shredded and simmered in the roasting juices. Served with black beans, rice of the day, and garnished with pickled red onion.
Gluten-Free
Pechuga Poblana
An 8 oz grilled chicken breast served atop a tangy, flavorful salsa de tomatillo, garnished with rajas de chile poblano and three tiger prawns, served with black beans, Mexican-style white rice, and tortillas.
Vegetarian
Enmoladas
Three corn tortillas folded into triangles, filled with refried beans, topped with mole negro, sprinkled with a queso fresco and cotija blend, then topped with pickled red onions.
Adventurous
Gringas
(2)
Tender tips of carne adobada grilled with pineapple, sliced green, red, and yellow bell peppers, tomatoes, and onions, folded into a 10-inch flour tortilla.
Add cheese
Gluten-Free
Ramon’s Famous Fish Tacos
Grilled fresh fish of the day served in soft corn tortillas, accompanied with our house-made tangy coleslaw, cucumber salsa, limes, and Spanish rice.
Gluten-Free
Camarones Sonora
Seven large tiger prawns sautéed in garlic and butter with lemon and a hint of pepper. Served with Mexican white rice, black beans, and tortillas.
Favorite
Carne Asada A La Tampiqueña*
A traditional dish from the port of Tampico. A 10 oz choice New York steak, cheese enchilada, refried beans, guacamole, and your choice of tortillas.
Gluten-Free
Steak A La Ranchera*
Diced choice top sirloin steak, grilled and finished in our special sauce of green chiles, fresh tomatoes and potatoes. Served with rice, beans and tortillas of your choice.
Gluten-Free
Encebollado*
A 10 oz choice New York steak, grilled and topped with sautéed onions, tossed with chorizo. Served with rice, beans, and tortillas.
Ramon Jr’s Quesadilla San Francisco
A 10-inch flour tortilla filled with carne asada, queso cotija, Jack cheese, sliced black olives, pico de gallo, jalapeño, avocado slices, and sour cream, grilled to perfection and accompanied with our tangy house-made coleslaw and black beans.
Chile Verde
Tender, selected diced pork cooked in our green chile and tomatillo sauce, served with rice, refried beans, with flour or house-made corn tortillas.
Gluten-Free
Chile Colorado
Diced top sirloin, seasoned and simmered in a dried red chile powder and tomato blend sauce, served with rice, refried beans, and your choice of tortillas.
Vegetarian
Chile Rellenos
Two Anaheim peppers stuffed with Jack cheese, fried in egg batter, and topped with our Salsa Española, served with rice, refried beans, and a choice of tortillas.
Carnitas
Tender pieces of succulent pork cooked in its own juices with spices and orange pulp, then fried with beer and a hint of milk, served with refried beans, guacamole, pico de gallo, jalapeño, and your choice of tortillas.
Gluten-Free
Fajitas
Served sizzling on a platter with onions, red, yellow and green bell peppers, and tomatoes. Accompanied by pico de gallo, guacamole, and a jalapeño, served with your choice of tortillas.
Chicken
Tiger prawns
Top sirloin
Vegetarian
All enchiladas come with rice and beans
Red Iguana Traditional Enchiladas
Shredded beef, chicken or cheese enchiladas in two corn tortillas, topped with our house-made dried red chile powder enchilada sauce, finished with melted Jack cheese, and served with rice and beans.
Favorite
Enchiladas Suizas
(Not your traditional suiza)
Two corn tortillas filled with sour cream chicken and avocado, topped with mole poblano, finished with melted Jack cheese, and a dollop of sour cream.
Gluten-Free
Enchiladas Verdes
Two sour cream chicken enchiladas topped with mole verde and melted Jack cheese, garnished with roasted pepitas.
Favorite
Enchiladas Amarillas
Two enchiladas filled with pork carnitas, topped with our fiery mole amarillo, finished with melted Jack cheese, and drizzled with crema Mexicana.
Vegetarian
Enchiladas Poblanas
Two sour cream and cheese enchiladas topped with our traditional enchilada sauce, melted Jack cheese, garnished with avocado, and a dollop of sour cream.
Mango Enchiladas
Succulent pork carnitas wrapped in two corn tortillas, topped with our spicy, sweet and savory mango mole, made with golden raisins, spices, yellow chiles and mango, finished with melted Jack cheese.
Gluten-Free
Entomatadas
(Least Spicy)
Two sour cream chicken enchiladas topped with Salsa Española, melted Jack cheese and jalapeño.
Gluten-Free
Vegetarian
Enchiladas Rancheras
Jack cheese wrapped in two corn tortillas topped with a mountain of sautéed mushrooms, salsa ranchera and more melted Jack cheese, garnished with diced green onions.

Enchilada style
Smothered in mole
Smothered in chile verde

Tacos Don Ramon

Gluten-Free

Three hard-shell corn tortillas filled with shredded beef or chicken, garnished with lettuce, sauce, cheese and tomatoes.

Two Chile Verde Burritos

Two Shredded Beef or Chicken Burritos

A 10-inch flour tortilla, rolled up with refried beans, your choice of filling, deep fried to perfection, then smothered in our salsa española - finished with melted Jack cheese, a side of guacamole and sour cream.
Salsa Española
is a delicate, flavorful sauce of thinly sliced onions, fried with minced garlic, bay leaf, oregano, white pepper, ground cinnamon, pimiento peppers, blended with crushed tomatoes and tomato sauce.
Your Choice of Shredded Seasoned Chicken or Slow-Roasted Shredded Beef
Chile Verde Chimichanga

Painting of Xochitonal
Watch this time-lapse video showing Utah artist Stephen Kesler painting Xochitonal.
When was Mole first created?
Mole is the Mexican national dish for holidays and feasts. But how and when was mole first created? Among the common folklore of its creation includes a tale from the early colonial period. According to the legend, upon hearing that the archbishop was going to visit the Convent of Santa Rosa in Puebla, the nuns were in a panic because they were poor and had nothing to prepare. They prayed about the situation and brought together the little bits of what they had to make a sauce. This included peppers, spices, day-old bread, nuts, and a little chocolate. They served the sauce on top of some turkey and the Archbishop loved it!
Holy Moley!
Red Iguana is famous for our moles (pronounced moh-lays) and we have at least 8 different types that are available regularly — Mole Negro, Amarillo, Poblano, Verde, Coloradito, Red Pipian, Mango, and Almendras. If you’d like to sample each mole currently available, ask your waiter for a mole sampler (seen below).
During his visit to the Red Iguana, Diner’s, Drive-ins, and Dives host, Guy Fieri exclaimed, “Holy Moley!” while helping owner Lucy Cardenas add ingredients to a giant vat of mole.
Old World Style Wall
For the main wall feature in the patio area of Red Iguana 2, designers used an old-world style of construction that combines mixed materials like stone, bricks, and mortar, while also incorporating found objects such as driftwood, sandstone, glass bottles, and cobblestone. How many different items can you spot in this unique architectural feature?
TABLE 45
You may find that the tables at the original Red Iguana location are placed close together, giving your dining experience a “lively” appeal. However, couples seeking a romantic moment can ask for Table 45, a quiet table for two, tucked in a small alcove at the center of the restaurant.

Catering / To Go Orders
Are you on the rush? 
Are you planning to host a family or friend reunion? 
We are here to serve you
If you are planning to host a family or friend reunion, a school or business event, or you simply are starving or just got unexpected visitors at home…
Give us a call! And get ready to enjoy the authentic taste of Mexico without the wait.
It will be always our pleasure help you to serve your table with a wide variety of food full of rich flavors and warm hospitality.
Place your order
testimonial
What Did They Say About Mexican Cousine?
Our guests have savored the essence of Mexico in every bite, and their experiences speak for themselves. Discover what they have to say about the rich flavors, warm hospitality, and unforgettable moments shared at
Taqueria El Rey de Oros
.
All Testimonial
This is my second time coming here. It did not disappoint. I had the #1 three taco combo with 16 oz beverage. I chose Al Pastor Style. The tacos were delicious and the sauce that came with them enhanced the flavor. Additionally, I ordered chips with salsa. The portions were perfect and filling. The service was impeccable. I will return to this restaurant again. I highly recommend this place if you are looking for authentic taste that is not a chain restaurant.
Edward Krohn
La comida esta deliciosa y el servicio es super lindo, lo que más me impresión fue la limpieza, un restaurante con baño cuidado habla muchísimo de su calidad de servicio. 💯 % recomendado.
The food is delicious and the service is super nice, what impressed me the most was the cleanliness, a restaurant with a well-kept bathroom speaks volumes about its quality of service. 💯% recommended.
Cecilia Evia
This place is amazing. They have great menudo and tacos. I recommend the tacos Al pastor.
Parking space
Plenty of parking – Free Parking
Santinator
Been going here for many years and we know that we can always expect great food and sevice. Love their sopes, and carne asada fries!!
C trujillo
Contact Us
For Further Info, Please Contact Us
Have a question or want to know more about our menu? We’re here to help! Reach out for inquiries, feedback, or just to say hello. Whether you’re planning a visit or need assistance with a catering or pick up order, we’re always happy to connect with you.

West Valley City

Cottonwood Heights

Located in west side of Salt Lake Valley, and Cottonwood Heights, Taqueria El Rey de Oros has been serving, for around two decades, the Authentic Taste of the Mexican Cuisine.

De Los Muertos Menu
Welcome to De Los Muertos Mexican Kitchen! Inspired by recipes handed down thru generations to chef and owner Aza Torres, our goal is to bring you a new twist on classic Mexican street food favorites. Bienvenidos!
Monterrey Style Burritos
Made with love in the style of Monterrey, Mexico Street Burritos
Smothered Spicy Chile Verde Burrito
Braised Pork in a Chile Verde Sauce with Refried Black Beans Wrapped in a Flour Tortilla and Smothered with More Chile Verde Topped with Melted Muertos Cheese and Chipotle Lime Crema. Served with Crisp Shredded Romaine, Pico de Gallo, Radish and Pickled Onions.
Abuela’s Smothered Chicken Mole Burrito
Shredded Chicken Braised in Abuela’s Secret Mole Sauce and Refried Black Beans Wrapped in a Flour Tortilla and Smothered with More Mole, Melted Muertos Cheese, and Chipotle Lime Crema. Served with Crisp Shredded Romaine, Pico de Gallo, Radish, Pickled Onions.
Los Muertos Carne Asada Burrito
Juicy Carne Asada, Smoked bacon, Melted Muertos Cheese, Guacamole, Pico de Gallo, Tomatillo Green Salsa, Cilantro, Red Onion
El Rey Mysterio Plant Based Impossible Meat Burrito – (Vegetarian)
Plant Based Impossible Ground “Beef”, Chipotle Lime Crema, Pico de Gallo, Crisp Shredded Romaine Served on a Fresh Flour Tortilla w/ Melted Cheese
La Oscuridad Black Bean and Cheese Burrito (Vegetarian)

Guacamole with Chips Two Ways (Vegan)

Plant Based Impossible Ground “Beef”, Chipotle Lime Crema, Pico de Gallo, Crisp Shredded Romaine Served on a Fresh Flour Tortilla w/ Melted Cheese
El Gordito Guapo Birria Taco
Corn Tortilla Dipped in Beef Consumé with Melted Muertos Cheese Blend, 24hr Braised Birria Beef, Pickled Red Onions, Cilantro, Side of Birria Consumé
Los Muertos Asada Taco
Juicy Marinated Carne Asada, Smoked bacon, Pico de Gallo, Cilantro, Tomatillo Salsa, Guacamole and Red Onion on a Freshly Cooked Flour Tortilla w/ Melted Muertos Cheese Blend
La Calavera Black Bean & Cheese Taco (Vegetarian)
Creamy Refried Black Beans and Queso Fresco on a Freshly Cooked Tortilla w/ Melted Muertos Cheese Blend
Breakfast Tacos and Burritos – Served All Day!
Tex-Mex Breakfast Favorites Perfected!
El Tocino Bacon Breakfast Burrito
Fresh cooked flour tortilla, soft scrambled pasture-raised eggs with smoked bacon, creamy black beans, melted Muertos cheese blend, double fried tater tots, pico de gallo, and chipotle lime crema
El Campesino Vegetarian Eggs & Cheese Breakfast Burrito
Fresh cooked flour tortilla, soft scrambled pasture-raised eggs with creamy black beans, melted Muertos cheese blend, double fried tater tots, pico de gallo, and chipotle lime crema
El Jalisco Bacon & Cheese Breakfast Taco
Soft Scrambled Pasture Raised Eggs, Smoked Bacon, Double Fried Tater Tots, Chipotle Lime Crema, Pico de Gallo, Fresh Cooked Tortilla with Melted Muertos Cheese
El Santo Eggs & Cheese Breakfast Taco (Vegetarian)
Soft Scrambled Pasture Raised Eggs, Creamy Refried Black Beans, Double-Fried Tater Tots, Chipotle Lime Crema, Pico de Gallo, Fresh Cooked Flour Tortilla with Melted Muertos Cheese

Scroll to top
Scroll to top
Scroll to top
Painting of Xochitonal
Watch this time-lapse video showing Utah artist Stephen Kesler painting Xochitonal.
When was Mole first created?
Mole is the Mexican national dish for holidays and feasts. But how and when was mole first created? Among the common folklore of its creation includes a tale from the early colonial period. According to the legend, upon hearing that the archbishop was going to visit the Convent of Santa Rosa in Puebla, the nuns were in a panic because they were poor and had nothing to prepare. They prayed about the situation and brought together the little bits of what they had to make a sauce. This included peppers, spices, day-old bread, nuts, and a little chocolate. They served the sauce on top of some turkey and the Archbishop loved it!
Holy Moley!
Red Iguana is famous for our moles (pronounced moh-lays) and we have at least 8 different types that are available regularly — Mole Negro, Amarillo, Poblano, Verde, Coloradito, Red Pipian, Mango, and Almendras. If you’d like to sample each mole currently available, ask your waiter for a mole sampler (seen below).
During his visit to the Red Iguana, Diner’s, Drive-ins, and Dives host, Guy Fieri exclaimed, “Holy Moley!” while helping owner Lucy Cardenas add ingredients to a giant vat of mole.
Old World Style Wall
For the main wall feature in the patio area of Red Iguana 2, designers used an old-world style of construction that combines mixed materials like stone, bricks, and mortar, while also incorporating found objects such as driftwood, sandstone, glass bottles, and cobblestone. How many different items can you spot in this unique architectural feature?
TABLE 45
You may find that the tables at the original Red Iguana location are placed close together, giving your dining experience a “lively” appeal. However, couples seeking a romantic moment can ask for Table 45, a quiet table for two, tucked in a small alcove at the center of the restaurant.

Indulge in the Rich Flavors of Mexico
Taste the Traditions of Mexico with Our Mouth-Watering Tortas
Tortas are a staple in Mexican cuisine and have been enjoyed by families for generations. Our goal is to bring the authentic taste of Mexican Tortas to your table, with every bite taking you on a journey through the vibrant flavors and traditions of Mexico. Whether you’re a seasoned foodie or trying tortas for the first time, we guarantee that you’ll fall in love with this tasty sandwich. So come join us and savor the authentic taste of Mexico with every bite.

Oder Now
Sur 39
Sur 54
What is a Torta?
A torta is a broad class of Mexican sandwich that is usually offered with many different choices of filling. A torta should weigh roughly the amount of Infinite Jest (paperback is fine), and you should be completely covered in it after just a few bites.” Tortas are so huge and messy that you really shouldn’t eat them in the company of those who would be scandalized by you licking your fingers (and hands and possibly arms) while you eat.
This torta photo has chicken and beef milanesa (meat, usually beef, pounded thin, breaded, and fried), tomatoes, avocado, lettuce, jalapeno, and cheese. And of course there is mayo on it. In case you weren’t keeping count, that’s all of the good things stacked between two halves of a special hoagie roll that are gloriously toasted and just substantial enough to mostly hold your sandwich together until you’re almost done, but not so substantial you can’t bite through it cleanly. The meats vary from sandwich to sandwich, but the condiments pretty much stay the same. Before you eat, as if all that weren’t enough, you slather that piece of awesomeness with freshly-made chipotle salsa.

What people say
ABOUT US AND OUR FOOD
You’re gonna spend $12.00 on a torta but the amount of food you get will feed you for two meals no problem. Absolutely loaded with meats and cheese. I usually hate chipotle sauce but I loved it from Big Tortas. 10/10 can’t wait to go back.
Joshua Petrie
Wonderful experience. The tacos are huge. My first time I ordered twice the number of tacos I thought I could eat. The lady at the register was SUPER nice and genuinely happy to be there. Plenty of seating, parking and very clean. Definitely coming back.
Jordan Knight
This place is delicious, tortas are huge and yummy. If you try the “Marinera” (it has shrimp) you’re not gonna be disappointed. Tacos are also a really good choice, “carnitas” “suadero” “lengua” “arrachera” whichever you choose will be a good option.
Alonso Topete

name: Tacos Don Rafa
address: 798 S State St, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
raw_text:
TDR | Tacos Don Rafa
top of page
Tacos Don Rafa - TDR - JRC.ENTERPRISES
The First Original Street
Taco Stand in Utah Since 1998
Services
We can provide great catering services for almost any type of event in the state and love to travel anyplace!
Catering Indoor Style Buffet
Electric or Gas setup
With a team of professionals taco masters chef and servers we can cater indoor or outdoor in any event venue or office with the right equipment to cater depending the place and type of event requirements.
Taco Truck / Food Truck
Available 24/7
We are very proud to tell you we have 5 food trucks ready for you and serve every need in any event doesn't matter if its far, in the mountain, lake or in a big party, gameday or fundraiser we got the taco truck perfect for any situation.
Taco Cart Stand
(Limited depending area)
Our traditional small taco stand can come to your party, venue or office just keep in mind this are propane power only and does required open space area and wide flat surfaces where can be set up because this is quite heavy and we don't carry it in stairs or complicated backyards.
Check out our virtual brochure
Our Stores Retail Taco Shops
Our team members come from different backgrounds, they all speak spanish and little english but what they all have in common is a passion for the culinary mexican art and a desire to share it with others. We are dedicated to producing the most delicious tacos in the City and we ensure that our customers are always happy with our service.
Find out more about us here and don't hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions.

THE VAULT BAR
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER
MENUS
Locally-Inspired Food & Drink Menus
Here at Bambara our menu revolves around what’s in season and local to the region, relying on our relationships with farms and purveyors to provide the freshest, most authentic experience, all prepared using a modern take on classic cooking techniques. Share a board of local cheeses and house cured meats with a signature cocktail, or indulge in our 24 Hour Wagyu Short Ribs with expertly paired wines. Bambara ensures every taste is a tantalizing, approachable culinary experience.

raw_text:

La Cocina Mexican Restaurant
Menu
Menu

About Us

Menu
If you love
Mexican cuisine
, come to La Cocina Mexican Restaurant in Salt Lake City, UT. We have an impressive selection of Mexican dishes and beer for you to enjoy with friends or family. We also have a children’s menu and grilled menu that includes grilled fajitas and tacos.
Our Menu Items Include:
Appetizers ~ Burritos ~ Enchiladas ~ Chimichangas ~ Fajitas ~ Salads ~ Carne Asada ~ Carnitas ~ Fish ~ Shrimp ~ Kid’s Menu ~ Desserts
Download Menu Here
Order Online
Liquor Menu Available
La Cocina Mexican Restaurant
has a liquor license and offers your favorite drinks and imported beers. We have a large variety of drinks for you to try. We also have non-alcoholic margaritas that are free with dinner Tuesday, Thursday and on Saturdays after 4:00 pm.
