name: La Condesa
categories: Breakfast & Brunch, Mexican, Juice Bars & Smoothies
address: 11078 S State St, Ste 105, Sandy, UT 84070
raw_text:
La Condesa™ Menu - Authentic Mexican Brunch & Dishes in Sandy, Utah
0
Skip to Content
Menu
Our Story
Contact
Join Our Brunch Waitlist!
Reserve Your Table!
Open Menu
Close Menu
Menu
Our Story
Contact
Join Our Brunch Waitlist!
Reserve Your Table!
Open Menu
Close Menu
Menu
Our Story
Contact
Join Our Brunch Waitlist!
Reserve Your Table!
Our
Menu
SWEET BEGINNINGS
Sunrise Bowl
A vibrant medley of nutrient-packed fresh fruit, creamy protein-rich yogurt, and crunchy granola, finished with a drizzle of golden honey. The perfect balance of flavor and fuel to energize your day and keep you feeling strong!
Waffle Wonderland
A golden, crispy waffle topped with fresh strawberries, juicy blueberries, and tangy kiwi, crowned with a creamy scoop of ice cream.
Abrazo de Leche Pancakes
Indulge in our fluffy pancakes, soaked in a rich blend of three milks and topped with a luscious caramel drizzle. Garnished with fresh strawberries and juicy blueberries, this decadent dish delivers the perfect balance of sweetness and freshness for a satisfying treat.
Classic French Toast
Savor our perfectly golden French toast, served with fresh strawberries, blueberries and a light sprinkle of cinnamon and sugar powder. Paired with a side of maple syrup for that perfect touch of sweetness.
The Ultimate Pancake Tower
A brunch masterpiece you didn’t know you needed! This towering delight features layers of fluffy pancakes and a crispy waffle, stacked high with savory bacon, fresh fruit, crunchy granola, and creamy Greek yogurt. A perfect blend of sweet and savory.
Pastries Basket
An assortment of freshly baked pastries, perfect for sharing with your morning coffee or abuelita hot
chocolate.
MORNING FAVORITES
*Our omelettes are served with spring mix, avocado slices and tangy pickled onions
Rise & Shine Breakfast
Enjoy farm-fresh eggs cooked to your liking, served with your choice of savory bacon, ham, or sausage, alongside crispy country potatoes. Complete with a side of toast, this hearty breakfast is the perfect start to fuel your day.
Avocado Toast
Crispy sourdough bread topped with a savory cheese crust and buttery avocado, finished with crispy bacon. Crowned with a fresh spring mix and spinach salad, lightly dressed in a zesty orange vinaigrette, this vibrant toast is a perfect balance of flavors and textures for a refreshing, wholesome meal.
*Spinach and Mushroom Omelette
Fluffy eggs perfectly paired with tender spinach and earthy mushrooms, served with a fresh spring mix salad lightly dressed in a zesty orange vinaigrette.
*Rib Eye Omelette
Tender ribeye wrapped in fluffy eggs, filled with melted mozzarella cheese, and served with a side of crispy country potatoes. This hearty and savory omelette is perfect for a protein-packed, indulgent breakfast.
*Tinga Omelette
Fluffy eggs stuffed with melted cheese and smoky, slow-cooked shredded chicken tinga in our secret sauce. Topped with fresh avocado slices.
*Pork Belly Omelette
Fluffy eggs filled with melted mozzarella cheese and crispy pork belly, smothered in our zesty house-made salsa verde.
*Birria Omelette
Fluffy eggs stuffed with tender, slow-cooked birria and melted mozzarella cheese, delivering a mouthwatering blend of rich flavors.
Breakfast Burrito
A hearty start to your day! Packed with fluffy scrambled eggs, crispy country potatoes, savory bacon, and melted cheese, all wrapped in a warm, soft tortilla.
Add an extra layer of flavor by asking for it smothered in our house sauce for just 2.00
Molletes
Crispy bolillo bread topped with a golden mozzarella cheese crust, creamy condesa beans, savory tinga, and fresh pico de gallo, finished with a dollop of guacamole. Each bite delivers a satisfying burst of rich, bold flavors and textures.
SMALL BITES
Bean Dip
Your choice of smooth refried beans or hearty condesa beans, topped with cotija cheese served with a side of crispy tortilla chips. This flavorful dip is perfect for sharing, offering a delicious and satisfying taste of authentic Mexican comfort in every bite.
Guacamole and Chips
Freshly made guacamole served with a basket of crispy tortilla chips.
Chicharrón Bites with Guacamole
Crispy, golden pork chicharrón served alongside fresh, flavorful guacamole. The perfect combination of crunch and creaminess.
CHILAQUILES DE LA CASA
(All chilaquiles are served with fresh cilantro, tangy pickled onions, creamy avocado, rich sour cream, and a sprinkle of Cotija cheese)
Chilaquiles Miss Condesa
Indulge in our signature dish featuring crispy chilaquiles tossed in our house-made red sauce, topped with tender ribeye and your choice of eggs. Served with a side of creamy condesa beans, a savory corn tamal, and a sweet finish of French toast.
Chicha-Quiles
Our signature salsa verde paired with crispy pork belly, perfectly indulgent.
Chilaquiles al Pastor
Sweet and smoky carne al pastor with a hint of pineapple, layered over house red sauce for a tantalize bite.
Chilaquiles con Tinga
Shredded chicken, slow cooked in our secret sauce, adds a rich, smoky flavor to this house red sauce favorite.
Chilaquiles Ribeye
Savor tender ribeye steak atop crispy tortillas, all generously coated in your choice of our house-made sauce. This indulgent dish is a flavorful and satisfying treat, perfect for those who appreciate the finer things in brunch.
Birria Quiles
Slow-cooked birria beef infuses crispy tortillas with deep, savory richness, creating a hearty and flavorful dish that warms the soul.
LUNCH DELIGHTS
Quesa Birria Tacos
Savor three corn tortillas filled with tender, slow-cooked birria and melted cheese, perfectly crisped for a rich, savory bite. Served with a flavorful consomé on the side for dipping
Consomé de Birria
A rich and flavorful birria broth, slow-cooked to perfection and served with fresh red onion, crisp cabbage, and fragrant cilantro.
Quesadilla de Birria
A warm, soft flour tortilla filled with melted cheese and tender, slow-cooked birria. This savory quesadilla is packed with rich flavors, making it a perfect indulgence for any birria lover.
Tacos de Rib Eye
Indulge in tender, grilled-to-perfection rib-eye steak, served in warm corn tortillas. Paired with fresh guacamole, zesty pico de gallo, and a side of salsa taquera.
Tortilla Soup
A hearty and flavorful broth with crispy tortilla strips, avocado, panela cheese, and a hint of lime.
Fajita Mushroom Tacos
Sautéed fajita-style mushrooms, bursting with flavor and served in warm corn tortillas. Topped with grilled peppers and onions for a perfect blend of savory, smoky goodness.
Enchiladas Verdes
Corn tortillas filled with chicken, smothered in a tangy tomatillo sauce, and topped with crema and cheese.
Enchiladas Rojas
Corn tortillas filled with chicken, covered in a rich red sauce, and topped with melted cheese and crema.
Enchiladas Cremosas
Soft corn tortillas filled with tender chicken, smothered in our rich and velvety specialty creamy sauce. Comfort food elevated to perfection!
CHILAQUILES YOUR WAY
Chilaquiles Cremosos
Crunchy Tortilla smothered in creamy chipotle sauce with grilled chicken.
Chilaquiles Rojos
Crispy tortillas drenched in our flavorful house-made red sauce, topped with creamy crema and crumbled queso cotija for a rich, savory experience. Customize it with your choice of eggs for the perfect hearty and satisfying meal.
Chilaquiles Verdes
Crunchy tortillas smothered in our zesty secret salsa verde, topped with creamy crema and crumbled cotija cheese for a fresh and tangy bite. Add your choice of eggs to make this vibrant dish even more satisfying.
Chilaquiles Poblanos
Crispy tortillas smothered in our secret spicy poblano sauce, delivering a bold and flavorful kick. Add your choice of eggs to elevate this deliciously fiery dish for a truly satisfying meal.
Chilaquiles Divorciados
Enjoy the best of both worlds with one side of crispy tortillas smothered in rich red salsa and the other in tangy green salsa. Add your choice of eggs to complete this flavorful and perfectly balanced dish.
Choice of Proteins:
Add a side of your favorite protein
Chicharrón
Crispy, savory chicharrón adds the perfect crunch to your chilaquiles.
Pastor (Marinated Pork)
Juicy, marinated pork al pastor brings a burst of tangy and savory flavors.
Rib Eye
Tender, succulent rib-eye steak elevates your chilaquiles to gourmet status.
Tinga (Shredded Chicken)
Smoky, shredded chicken tinga adds depth and a spicy kick.
Birria (Slow cooked beef)
Slow-cooked, flavorful birria beef infuses your chilaquiles with rich, savory goodness.
Grilled Chicken
Juicy, tender grilled chicken seasoned to perfection and cooked just right to maintain its natural flavors.
Eggs (Fried or scramble)
CONDECHI KIDS MENU
(For our little guests 10 and younger)
1. Pancake Happy Face
Fluffy pancake served with a choice of ham or bacon, and a side of scrambled eggs. Comes with syrup and butter.
2. Berry Fun Waffle Squares
Fluffy waffle squares topped with fresh strawberries, blueberries, and a drizzle of syrup. Whipped cream on the side for extra fun
3. Scrambled Eggs & Quesadilla
Scrambled eggs with your choice of ham or bacon, served with a quesadilla.
4. Fruit Cup
A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits, perfect as a light snack or dessert.
LA CONDESA SWEET ENDINGS
Caramel Dream Flan
A silky smooth caramel custard that melts in your mouth, a classic favorite!
Double Delight Choco Flan
A delightful two-in-one treat with rich chocolate cake and creamy flan layered together.
Heavenly Tres Leches
Moist sponge cake soaked in three kinds of milk, topped with whipped cream. A sweet and dreamy indulgence.
Decadent Chocolate Indulgence
Rich and sumptuous, this chocolate cake is a chocoholic's dream come true.
LA CONDESA JAVA CREATIONS
Cafe de Olla
Traditional Mexican coffee brewed with cinnamon Spices and piloncillo for a rich, aromatic experience.
Drip Coffee
Freshly brewed coffee, simple and satisfying.
Cafe Americano
Espresso diluted with hot water for a smooth and bold flavor.
Espresso
A shot of rich, concentrated coffee, perfect for a quick pick-me-up.
Cafe Latte
Smooth espresso with steamed milk, topped with a light layer of foam.
Cappuccino
Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam, offering a balanced and creamy taste.
Chocolate Abuelita
Mexican hot chocolate with a touch of cinnamon, creamy and comforting.
Add a pump of flavored syrup for just 0.75
Sugar-free options are also available for a lighter touch of sweetness!
JUICE BAR
Freshly Squeezed Orange Juice
Bright and zesty juice from freshly squeezed oranges.
Green Goddess Juice
A revitalizing blend of celery, cucumber, pineapple, parsley, and lime for a healthy boost.
Horchata
Creamy rice milk with cinnamon and vanilla, served chilled.
Jamaica
Refreshing hibiscus tea with a tangy flavor, served over ice.
Lemonade
Classic lemonade made with fresh lemons, sweet and tart.
Mineral Water Lemonade
A refreshing twist on a classic! This zesty lemonade is made with fresh-squeezed limes and sparkling mineral water, offering a crisp, bubbly refreshment.
Fountain Drinks
Coke products: Coke, Diet Coke, Coke Zero, sprite, Dr. Pepper, red cream soda and unsweetened black tea.
MIXOLOGY
Mimosas
A refreshing blend of bubbly champagne and freshly squeezed orange juice, offering a bright and zesty twist on a classic.
La Marca Prosecco.
A glass of crisp and elegant La Marca Prosecco, featuring vibrant bubbles and notes of fresh citrus and green apple.
Condesa Mescalina
A smoky mezcal cocktail with the vibrant flavors of Jamaica and fresh lime, finished with a chili chamoy rim for a perfect spicy-sweet kick.
La Condesa Margarita
Tequila, lime juice, and agave—simple, fresh, and perfect on the rocks.
Jalapeño Margarita
A bold twist on the classic, combining tequila, fresh lime juice, and a spicy kick of jalapeño, balanced with a touch of sweetness.
Bloody Condesa
Our signature house tomato clam juice blends with vodka, garnished with carne seca, celery banana pepper and olives.
Espresso Martini
Choice of vodka or Baileys meets fresh espresso, delivering a smooth and indulgent flavor.
Piña Colada
Creamy coconut and fresh pineapple blended with rum—a tropical escape in every sip.
Carajillo
Smooth espresso, Licor 43 topped over ice for a decadent after-meal treat.
Paloma
A refreshing mix of 1800 tequila reposado, a splash of fresh grapefruit juice and soda.
Mojito
A refreshing blend of white rum, fresh mint, lime and soda water. Crisp, vibrant, and perfect for cooling down with a touch of sweetness.
Hendrick’s Gin & Tonic
Hendrick’s gin paired with tonic water, garnished with a refreshing cucumber slice and a touch of raspberry for a delightful twist on a classic.
Moscow Mule
A refreshing blend of vodka and ginger beer with a hint of freshly squeeze lime juice, served chilled for the perfect balance of zing and smoothness.
Michelada
A refreshing and bold Mexican classic! Our Michelada features a cold beer mixed with fresh lime juice, house-made spicy tomato blend, and a dash of flavorful spices. Served in a salt-rimmed glass.
Bottle Beer
Pacifico, Modelo especial y Dos equis
Draft Beer
Enjoy a cold, refreshing glass of our rotating selection of draft beers. Stella Artois, Dos Equis Lager, Modelo Especial y Pacifico
BY THE BOTTLES
Dom Pérignon
An iconic champagne with a rich, creamy texture and complex flavors of toasted brioche, almonds, and bright citrus. A luxurious choice for special celebrations, offering an unforgettable, sophisticated experience.
Veuve Clicquot
A classic champagne with a crisp, balanced profile featuring notes of apple, peach, and a touch of vanilla. Its vibrant bubbles and refined finish make it perfect for toasting any occasion.
La Marca Prosecco
A light and refreshing Prosecco with lively bubbles and bright flavors of fresh citrus, green apple, and a hint of floral notes. An elegant, budget-friendly option to elevate any gathering.
Tacos & Taps
Menu
Tacos Tuesday La Condesa Way!
Choose from our signature tacos
Three tacos served with guacamole and salsas
Tacos al Pastor
A fiesta of flavors! Succulent marinated pork, sweet pineapple, fresh cilantro, and zesty onions come together in every bite for a taste that's authentically irresistible.
Tacos de Asada
Juicy, tender grilled steak kissed by smoky perfection. Simple, satisfying, and bursting with flavor—this is steak taco heaven.
Tacos de Birria
Melt-in-your-mouth beef slow-cooked to perfection, topped with fresh onions and cilantro. The ultimate birria experience.
Taco Sonora
A bold creation from the north! Grilled steak, cheese crust, and our signature Condesa beans, all wrapped in a soft, golden flour tortilla for a flavor-packed delight.
Taco Condechi
A true flavor explosion! Soft flour tortilla loaded with melted cheese, smoky chorizo, juicy asada, crispy bacon, and savory pastor, topped with fresh bell peppers, zesty chipotle, and a drizzle of our irresistible secret sauce. This taco is the ultimate indulgence!
Quesadilla Don Lore
A hearty, flavorful favorite! Warm flour tortilla stuffed with cochinita pibil, crisp lettuce, and tangy pickled onions—perfectly balanced and utterly delicious.
DRAFT BEER
Pair your tacos with a draft beer with Mexican flavor
Stella Artois
Dos Equis Lager
Modelo Especial
Pacifico
SMALL BITES
Bean Dip
Your choice of smooth refried beans or hearty condesa beans, topped with cotija cheese served with a side of crispy tortilla chips. This flavorful dip is perfect for sharing, offering a delicious and satisfying taste of authentic Mexican comfort in every bite.
Guacamole and Chips
Freshly made guacamole served with a basket of crispy tortilla chips.
Chicharrón Bites with Guacamole
Crispy, golden pork chicharrón served alongside fresh, flavorful guacamole. The perfect combination of crunch and creaminess.
La Condesa™
—where every moment, flavor, and smile is made just for you.
11078 S. State St. Suite 105,
Sandy, UT 84070
Open daily to serve you
Mon – Thu: 8am a 3pm
Fri – Sun: 8am a 4pm
Phone:
385-213-3085

ABOUT US
This journey has been filled with passion, perseverance, and love. We’ve poured our hearts into creating a space where you can experience the warmth and flavors of our home.  Each dish tells a story, a symphony of flavors transporting you to the enchanting landscapes of our homeland. Step into our world, where every bite embraces and every sip serenades.  This is more than a restaurant-it’s our dream brought to life.

Skip Photo Gallery
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
Gerry V.:
Its a cozy and quaint place. Went during lunch. They had great food and service. The drinks were delicious! Highly recommend this place.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Ryan M.:
Excellent Columbia restaurant!! I had the Encanto burger, and it was sweet and salty. It was fantastic! The passion fruit drink is amazing. I will come back.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Paola G.:
Encanto is a true culinary gem. Its unique decor sets it apart from other Colombian restaurants, creating a warm and special atmosphere. The food is a solid 10 out of 10, with authentic and well-executed flavors. The burgers are outstanding, featuring the best quality, juicy meat. The stuffed arepas are absolutely delicious. Highly recommended!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Josh G.:
We loved our time at Encanto! The arepas + Cajun fries were amazing. Already looking forward to next time 😋

Main St. Menu
Kosh Amadade!
Welcome to Afghan Kitchen! We have been serving authentic Afghan cuisine to our community in the Salt Lake City Area for the past 6 years. Afghan food is mildly spiced and we use the freshest ingredients, so you can experience our familyʼs recipes as they were made in our home kitchen in Kabul. We pride ourselves on making our dishes with fair trade spices and locally sourced fresh ingredients. Nosh e jan, enjoy!
A TASTE OF KABUL
Family Style Meals
My Meating - $38.99
Serves Two
A platter for two including chicken qabuli palow, one beef kabob skewer, one chicken kabob skewer with burani banjan, salaata, long grain seasoned white rice, and 5 beef dumplings.
Meat n Kabul - $59.99
Serves Three
A platter for three including chicken qabuli palow, mixed dashi (beef and chicken), 1 beef kabob skewer, 1 chicken kabob skewer with burani banjan, salaata, long grain seasoned white rice, and 5 beef dumplings.
Afghan Feast - $109.99
Serves Five
A platter for five including chicken qabuli palow, lamb shank qabuli palow, mixed dashi (beef and chicken), 2 beef kabob skewers, 2 chicken kabob skewers with burani banjan,, salaata, long grain seasoned white rice, and 5 beef dumplings.
A VEGETARIAN TASTE OF KABUL
Plant Lover Meals
Bi Plants - $39.99
Serves Two
A platter for two including your choice of two vegetarian dishes and one appetizer served with with long grain seasoned rice and salaata.
VeggieFull - $49.99
Serves Three
A platter for three including your choice of three vegetarian dishes and one appetizer served with long grain seasoned rice and salaata.
VeggieLand - $69.99
Serves Five
A platter for five including Eggplant, Pumpkin, Lentils, Spinach, 10 Pumpkin dumplings  served with seasoned long grain  rice and salaata.
A TASTE OF KABUL
Appetizers
Beef Mantu – $7.99
Steamed
dumpling filled with seasoned ground beef and onions then topped with split peas and house-made yogurt-garlic sauce
Garlic Naan – $4.49
Oval shaped bread baked with garlic in Tandoor
Sauces
Habanero Hot Sauce - very spicy!
Yogurt cucumber sauce - Cooling and creamy
Tomato Chutney - Rich and vibrant sauce made from cilantro, tomatoes, and bell peppers
Chili Paste - adds a nice kick to your food
Pumpkin Mantu  – $7.99
Steamed pumpkin dumpling topped with split peas and house-made yogurt-garlic sauce
Bulani – $7.99
Traditional Afghan flatbread stuffed with potato, green onion, and Afghan spices then pan-fried to perfection.
Afghan Naan – $3.99
Oval shaped bread baked in Tandoor
A TASTE OF KABUL
Meat Dishes
All entrees served with side of white long grain seasoned rice and can be substituted with Afghan qabuli rice upon request for an additional charge of $2.99
Qabuli Palow – $16.99
Flavorful chicken cooked with steamed rice, raisins, and carrots served with Burani Banjan and salaata
*This is the most popular dish in Afghanistan, and is considered the national dish
Chicken Mushroom – $16.99
Chicken thigh cooked with mushrooms, garlic, onions, ginger, tomatoes, and fragrant spices
Chicken Palow – $16.99
Afghan style rice cooked with chunks of chicken, onions, garlic, ginger, and other spices served with Burani Banjan and salaata
Chicken Qurma – $16.99
Boneless chicken cooked with onions, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, and fragrant spices
Chicken Lawang – $16.99
Boneless chicken thighs cooked in a house-made yogurt-garlic sauce
A TASTE OF KABUL
Lamb Shank

Herriman Location
Now Open
11977 Herriman Main St, Herriman, UT 84096
Our Story
La Fountain Mexican Restaurant was established in Utah in 2009 by the Ramos Brothers, who migrated from San Luis Potosi, Mexico to Utah. The hard-working and dedicated brothers worked for more than 15 years and decided to unite efforts and savings to open their first restaurant in West Valley City, initiating the achievement of their American Dream.
Their unique efforts, great service, and amazing Mexican food were well accepted by the locals and this allowed them to open a second location in Tooele a year later in 2010. In 2012 they were able to once again expand and established two new locations in Riverton and Sandy, Utah. Their success was noticed by other entrepreneurs and through a strategic partnership, two more locations were open, in Salt Lake City and Lehi, Utah. At the beginning of 2018, West Valley City welcomed its second La Fountain Mexican Restaurant on Decker Lake Ln. Next to the Maverick Center making this the seventh La Fountain in the State of Utah
To this date, and with much success, each of the Ramos brothers and their families is still seen in their restaurants managing, serving, cooking, welcoming and working hard every day.
OUR MENU

Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Marketing

These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operatorâs permission.
Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesnât collect information that identifies a visitor.

WHEAT / WEIZEN / WIT
Wheat is higher in protein than the barley favored by brewers, which aids in the head retention and body of beer. American wheat styles are cleaner tasting with a light grainy flavor, while German Hefeweizens are favored for the banana/bubble gum and clove flavors produced by the yeast. Belgians call these beers âWit Beerâ meaning white and are brewed with orange peel and coriander. Specialty malts may be added for darker richer beers with notes of banana-nut bread, vanilla, and raisin.

BELGIAN
These beers are brewed using a Belgian yeast strain which produces high levels of fruity esters and peppery phenols. These beers are similar in flavor to German Hefeweizens but typically do not contain wheat. Highly carbonated and very dry, these are refreshing, zesty beers with ba-nana/clove notes in the lighter styles and plum/raisin in darker styles.

WHEAT / WEIZEN / WIT
Wheat is higher in protein than the barley favored by brewers, which aids in the head retention and body of beer. American wheat styles are cleaner tasting with a light grainy flavor, while German Hefeweizens are favored for the banana/bubble gum and clove flavors produced by the yeast. Belgians call these beers âWit Beerâ meaning white and are brewed with orange peel and coriander. Specialty malts may be added for darker richer beers with notes of banana-nut bread, vanilla, and raisin.

BELGIAN
These beers are brewed using a Belgian yeast strain which produces high levels of fruity esters and peppery phenols. These beers are similar in flavor to German Hefeweizens but typically do not contain wheat. Highly carbonated and very dry, these are refreshing, zesty beers with ba-nana/clove notes in the lighter styles and plum/raisin in darker styles.

Menu
Drinks
Specials
Events
Our Menu
Classic
Vegan
Late Night
Breakfast
Starters
House Wings*
$9.99/Half Order
$15.99
Ten jumbo wings tossed with your choice of traditional Buffalo hot sauce, honey Sriracha sauce, house BBQ sauce, or blackened, served with carrots, celery and ranch or bleu cheese dressing.
The 31st East Avocado Rolls
$12.99
House made eggrolls filled with chicken, bacon, black beans, avocado, tomato and cheddar jack cheese, served with jalapeno ranch or chipotle ranch.
Angus Beef Sliders*
$12.99
3 Hand pressed 2 oz. Angus beef patties topped with caramelized onions, bacon bits, and chipotle aioli.
Bavarian Pretzel & Beer Cheese
$7.99
2 soft pretzels served hot with Fat Tire Ale Beer Cheese and whole grain mustard.
The Green Pig Quesadilla
$10.99
Grilled Chipotle tortilla stuffed with cheddar jack cheese, black beans, onion and tomato, finished with roasted red pepper sauce and sour cream. Add chili verde or chicken for $5.00 or  steak for $8.00
Chicken Tender Basket
$12.99
3 large battered chicken tenders, served with hand cut, house fries and your choice of dipping sauce: chipotle ranch, jalapeno ranch, house BBQ or buffalo.
Chile Verde Nachos*
$14.99
House cut tortilla chips smothered (or on the side when to go) in chile verde  and melted cheddar jack cheese then topped with jalapeno, red onion, olives, tomato, green onion, salsa, sour cream and cilantro. Vegetarian option $10.99.
House Fries*
$6.99
Fresh Idaho potatoes, hand cut, double fried and tossed in house seasoning, served with Utah Fry Sauce. Add cheese and bacon crumbles $3.00  Or add cheese, bacon and gravy $5.00
Chips & Salsa*
$6.99
House cut tortilla chips served with salsa fresca. Add Guacamole $4.50
Pig Specialties
Fish & Chips
$17.99
Cod hand battered in Pig pilsner beer batter, fried and served with hand cut, house fries, tartar sauce, malt vinegar and lemon wedges.
Tender Tacos
$13.99
Battered chicken tenders on 3 flour tortillas, cucumbers, shredded cheddar cheese & jalapenos, Served with jalapeno ranch dressing & salsa verde.
Blackend Salmon Tacos*
$14.99
Blackend salmon served in 3 warm flour tortillas, topped with chipotle aioli, coleslaw, green and red onion, tomato, queso fresco and cilantro, served with fresh lime wedges and blackberry jalapeno sauce.
Fish Tacos
$15.99
Cod hand battered in Pig pilsner beer batter, fried and served in 3 flour tortillas, served with chipotle aioli, coleslaw, green and red onion, tomato, queso fresco and cilantro with blackberry jalapeno sauce on the side.
Carnitas Street Tacos
$13.99
Marinated shredded pork served in 3 tortillas topped with diced onion, cilantro, avocado and lime crema served with chips and salsa & traditional salsa verde on the side.
Carne Asada Tacos*
$14.99
Tender, thinly sliced, marinated steak served in 3 corn tortillas topped with cabbage, green and red onion, tomato and queso fresco with sour cream and salsa on the side.
Sandwiches
All sandwiches are served with your choice of house fries, soup de jour, green salad or pasta salad.
Angus Corned Beef Reuben*
$14.99
Melt in your mouth, house sliced corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese piled high with 1000 island dressing on toasted marbled rye.
BBQ Pulled Pork*
$14.99
Marinated shredded pork smothered in BBQ sauce, topped with coleslaw and a pickle spear on a toasted ambassador roll.
Cubano*
$14.99
Marinated shredded pork with grilled ham, swiss cheese and pickles, with roasted garlic mayo on a toasted baguette.
Pig-A-Delphia Cheese Steak*
$14.99
Thinly sliced top round sautéed with Anaheim peppers and onions topped with melted pepper jack cheese and piled high on a toasted ambassador roll served with a side of jalapeno ranch.
French Dip*
$14.99
Fresh slice roast beef pilled high with swiss cheese & garlic aioli. Served on a ambassador roll & aju for dipping.
Buffalo Chicken Sandwich*
$14.99
Tender chicken breast battered & dipped in buffalo sauce with blue cheese, lettuce, tomato,  onion & ranch mayo served on a hoagie bun.
Burgers
Additions: Cheddar, Provolone, Pepper Jack, Swiss, Mushrooms, Jalapenos+$1 • Avocado, Blue Cheese, White Cheddar, Green Chillies, Fried Egg +$2 • Applewood Smoked Bacon, Cajun Bacon +$3
The Angus Burger*
$15.99
Hand pressed 8 oz. ground, 100% grass fed Angus beef topped with swiss cheese, white cheddar, lettuce, tomato, vidalia onion and sweet onion aioli served on a toasted ciabatta bun.
Denver Burger*
$13.99
Hand pressed 6 oz. ground Angus beef topped with caramelized onions, jalapeno cream cheese, Applewood smoked bacon served on a toasted ciabatta bun.
House Burger*
$11.99
Hand pressed 6 oz. ground Angus beef topped with lettuce, tomato, red onion and pickle served with 1000 island dressing on a toasted challah bun.
Magnolia Burger*
$14.99
Hand pressed 6 oz. ground Angus beef blackened and topped with applewood smoked bleu cheese crumbles, cajun bacon, lettuce, tomato, onion and chipotle aioli served on a toasted ciabatta bun.
Bowls & Greens
Add Any Protein to Any Salad: Chicken $4 | Steal $8 | Salmon $8 • Choice of dressing: House Vinaigrette, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Ranch, Bleu Cheese, Caesar or Tequila Lime
Soup Of The Day
$5.99/Cup
$6.99/Bowl
Soup prepared from scratch daily. Monday - Rueben Tuesday - Tomato Basil Wednesday - Broccoli Cheese Thursday - Pasole Friday-Sunday - Clam Chowder • Cup $5.99 | Bowl $6.99
Smoked Buffalo Chicken Salad
$13.99
Buttermilk marinated chicken breast, fried & tossed in Buffalo sauce, on fresh romaine with applewood smoked bacon, heirloom cherry tomatoes, julienne red onion and applewood smoked bleu cheese crumbles with bleu cheese dressing.
Salmon Salad
$16.99
Fresh mixed greens topped with seared Atlantic salmon, oven roasted, marinated tomatoes, cucumber salad, red onion and radish sprouts, drizzled with olive oil and raspberry red wine vinegar.
Classic Caesar Salad
$10.99
Fresh romaine, house made croutons, shaved Parmesan and creamy Caesar dressing. Add chicken $5, steak $8 or salmon $8.
Southwestern Cobb Salad
$15.99
Fresh spinach tossed in tequila lime vinaigrette, topped with applewood smoked bacon, sweet corn, black beans, red onion, heirloom cherry tomatoes, applewood smoked bleu cheese, tortilla strips, hard boiled egg and sliced avocado. Add chicken $5, steak $8 or salmon $8.
Daily Specials
Specials change daily. Ask server for details.
Daily Special
$10.00
Ask your server about our daily $10 food specials.
Menu
Vegan Tiger Wings
$13.99
A dozen vegan wings tossed in your choice of traditional Buffalo hot sauce, honey Sriracha sauce or house BBQ sauce, served with carrots, celery and vegan ranch or vegan bleu cheese dressing.
Vegan Avocado Rolls
$12.99
Hand made eggrolls with chick’n, vegan bacon bits, black beans, avocado, vegan mozzarella and tomato, served with vegan ranch and agave blackberry jalapeno sauce.
The Impossible Burger
$15.99
Impossible patty, chao cheese, sautéed onions, gegan mayo, spring mix, on a toasted ciabatta bun.
Angry Vegan Chick’n Sandwich
$14.99
Vegan chick’n, sautéed onion & jalapenos, chao coconut cheese, Cajun vegan bacon, lettuce and tomato with vegan chipotle aioli on an ambassador roll.
Impossible Cheese Steak
$15.99
Ground impossible with Anaheim peppers & onion topped with melted vegan mozzarella cheese & pilled high on a toasted ambassador roll served with a side of vegan jalapeno ranch. Choice of fries, soup, salad or pasta salad.
Buffalo Tiger Wrap
$14.99
Tiger wings tossed in buffalo sauce, wrapped in a warm spinach tortilla with fresh mixed mesclun greens, tomatoes, English cucumbers and served with a side of vegan ranch dressing.
Impossible Street Tacos
$13.99
3 Corn tortillas filled with avocado, onion, cilantro & vegan chipotle aioli. Served with tortilla chips, salsa fresco, & vegan sour cream.
Vegan Thai Tacos
$13.99
Vegan Seitan meat tossed with sweet chili pepper sauce, cabbage & cilantro in 3 corn tortillas. Served with chips & salsa.
Vegan Disco Fries
$12.99
Fresh hand-cut, double fried potatoes smothered in vegan gravy, vegan cheese & vegan bacon bits.

Protein Options and Toppers
Sweet Pork
Sweet Pork
A 24-hour labor of love, our sweet and savory pork is first seared with fresh veggies, then slow-braised until fall-apart tender.
Shredded Barbacoa Beef
Shredded Barbacoa Beef
A delicious and traditional shredded beef is slow-braised in high-quality brisket stock until ultra-tender.
Grilled Steak
Grilled Steak
Beautifully marbled and wonderfully tender, our steak is gently grilled on an open flame and rested to seal in moisture and flavor.
Grilled Chicken
Grilled Chicken
Our fresh and light chicken breast is remarkably tender, moist, and full of flavor.
Raspberry Chipotle Chicken
Raspberry Chipotle Chicken
Tender grilled chicken breast coated with our signature raspberry chipotle sauce made with fresh berries and beautifully balanced with hints of the smoky Southwest.
Black Beans
Black Beans
Gently cooked to their full flavor and texture potential, made with fresh green pepper, onion, and cilantro, then seasoned to perfection with our proprietary bean spices.
Pinto Beans
Pinto Beans
Cooked slowly and carefully with fresh green pepper, onion, and cilantro, then seasoned to perfection with our proprietary bean spices.
Refried Beans
Refried Beans
Made from our delicious pinto beans, this sweet and creamy creation has a hint of heat and phenomenal flavor.
Raspberry Chipotle
Raspberry Chipotle
The perfect balance of sweet and spicy for any entree, our signature raspberry chipotle sauce is made with fresh berries and beautifully balanced with hints of the smoky Southwest.
Baja Red Enchilada
Baja Red Enchilada
Earthy and spicy with carefully layered bold flavors, this sauce is wonderfully warm, rich, and complex.
Roasted Green Chile
Roasted Green Chile
Made with fresh green chiles from Hatch, New Mexico, this sauce is slow-cooked in a sweet and savory broth with caramelized yellow onions and jalapeños to create the perfect combination of heat and sweetness.
Tomatillo Cilantro
Tomatillo Cilantro
Carefully sourced tomatillos, onions, and cilantro combine to create a tangy, light, garden-fresh flavor.
CHIPS, DIPS,
& SIDES
Chips
Our lightly fried corn tortilla chips are finished with salt & fresh-squeezed lime.
Chips
House-fried tortilla chips go great with any (or all!) of your favorite dips!
Start an  order
See more
Queso
(with chips)
Our famous creamy, savory queso coats each chip with just the right amount of zing!
Queso
(with chips)
We combine a blend of our signature sauces with the perfect amount of Queso Seguro to make a rich, creamy, and utterly delicious cheese dip.
Start an  order
See more
Salsa
(with chips)
Choose one of five house-made salsas, from the mild Salsa Fresca to the fiery Salsa Roja.
Salsa
(with chips)
House-made fresh daily!
Salsa Fresca:
Made with fresh, carefully sourced jalapenos, tomatoes, tomatillos, onions, cilantro, and limes, delivering medium heat.
Pico de Gallo:
Freshly chopped tomatoes, serrano peppers, onions, cilantro, garlic powder, salt, and oil provide mild heat.
Mango Salsa:
Our simple, sweet salsa is made with diced mango, red wine vinegar, red onions, cilantro, jalapeno, and salt for a hint of sweet heat.
Salsa Roja:
Our spiciest salsa! Roasted Roma tomatoes, serrano peppers, jalapenos, garlic, onions, cilantro, lime juice, and seasonings combine for a sweet, smoky flavor.
Honey Habanero:
(available at select locations) A sweet, tangy, medium-spicy salsa made with honey, tomatoes, tomatillos, onions, lime juice, habanero, and cilantro.
Start an  order
See more
Guac
(with chips)
Chunky, flavorful, and made in-house from the very best Mexican avocados.
Guac
(with chips)
Chopped avocados mixed with onion, lime, garlic, salt, cilantro, and a little spice.
Start an  order
See more
Chicken Tortilla Soup
A delicious house-made and hearty combo of creamy chicken soup finished with cool and crunchy toppings.
Chicken Tortilla Soup
Made with a mix of grilled chicken, carrots, onions, tortilla strips, and rice in a homemade broth, topped with cotija cheese, more crispy tortilla strips, guacamole, and pico de gallo —plus a warm tortilla on the side!
Start an  order
See more
Desserts
Tres Leches
Fresh-made bread cake soaked in our three-milk syrup for a creamy, smooth, and sweet treat.
Tres Leches
Start an  order
Key Lime Pie
Made with freshly squeezed lime juice, house-made custard, and graham cracker crust, served with whole-milk whipped cream and a lime wedge.
Key Lime Pie
Start an  order
Cinnamon Tortilla
A fresh tortilla lightly grilled with butter and sprinkled with cinnamon sugar — a favorite for kids, young and old!
Cinnamon Tortilla
Start an  order
Chocolate Chip Cookies
Our timeless recipe features simple ingredients and, most importantly, chunky chocolate chips.
Chocolate Chip Cookies
Start an  order
Specialty Drinks
Horchata
A traditional Mexican rice milk with a creamy-sweet taste and hints of cinnamon.
Horchata
Start an  order
Limonada
Mexico's version of lemonade, made with limes — sweet, tart, and fresh-squeezed daily from sun-kissed citrus..
Limonada
Start an  order
Strawberry Limonada
A twist on our classic Limonada, infused with fresh strawberries for a sweet, refreshing beverage.
Strawberry Limonada

Indian Restaurant in Sugar House, Saffron Valley
The menu includes a mix of authentic Indian favorites and classics.
We also offer chai, lassis and and a comfortable place to dine in.
Vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free choices available. We offer dine in, take out, delivery, semi-private dining.

Explore the Authentic Flavors at our Indian Restaurant & Catering in Riverton
The Saffron Valley location in Riverton, UT near Herriman is called Saffron Circle.
The theme of this restaurant is an Indian love story, and everything from the food to the decor to Rishi and Maya's love story will take you on a journey to happily ever after.
Located in Mountain View Village, Saffron Circle provides a modern take on Indian cuisine in a romantic setting and features a full bar including wine, beer and cocktails.
Experience the best Indian food in town and try Aunty's Assembly, our tasting menu that lets you sample multiple dishes for one set price!

Allergen Information
Our menu items may contain or come into contact with common allergens such as peanuts, tree nuts, dairy, eggs, soy, wheat, fish, or shellfish. If you have a known food allergy or dietary restriction, please inform your server before placing your order. While we take precautions to prevent cross-contamination, it is possible that trace amounts of allergens may be present. If you have severe allergies, please be aware of this risk when making your select
ion.
*Consumption Advisory
Items may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked food may increase your risk
of food-borne illness.
Please consume these items at your own discretion
.

ed to your bill.

inued support.

Tokyo Tower
Japanese Sushi
ASIAN RESTAURANT
Tokyo Tower
A Fusion of Flavorful Moments
Welcome to Tokyo Tower Japanese Sushi, where traditional Japanese flavors meet comforting Asian classics. From beautifully crafted sushi, sashimi, and hand rolls to crispy deep-fried rolls and flavorful rice balls, every bite is a taste of Japan. We also serve a variety of Chinese entrées, fried rice, lo mein, and hearty dinner sets to satisfy every craving. Whether you're in the mood for fresh seafood or savory stir-fry, Tokyo Tower has something delicious for everyone.
ORDER NOW
Roll with Tradition, Stay for the Flavor.

Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.

About the Business
From the capital of gourmet lamb in Inner Mongolia-Baotou, to the United States; Happy Lamb Hot Pot travels thousands of miles to bring you the best Mongolian style hot pot.We encourage our customers to taste the natural flavor of food ingredients by just putting them into our boiling rich broth. Unlike other hot pots that require dipping sauces to enhance the flavor, Happy Lamb Hot Pot's soup broth is packed with flavour which is the best base for all fresh food ingredients. Come taste for yourself!

About the Business
Business owner information
Emily G.
Manager
Named after Yokohama, Japan's ramen capital, Yoko Ramen is putting a fresh twist on traditional Japanese dishes. We use local ingredients and house-made sauces to make sure you're always getting the best flavors whether you order a sandwich or our ramen -- ramen that's broth is made fresh every single day. And our menu is designed so everyone can find something they'll love. That means options not only for those who enjoy chicken and pork but also for vegetarians and vegans, too. So swing on by for a bowl to see firsthand why everyone's talking about our ramen.
…
Read more

How is the take-out portion of ramen? Is it a decent size portion with a good amount of substance?

The one time I did takeout it was same amount as eat in and just as satisfying. They put the noodles and soup into separate containers so the noodles didn't get soggy. I can never eat the whole serving in one sitting (but I also always get gyoza as…

name: Pho Tay Ho
address: 1766 S Main St, Salt Lake City, UT 84115
raw_text:
Menu | Pho Tay Ho
Pho Tay Ho
Menu
Basic Info
Hours
About
Press
Menu
Please click to enlarge
Q: Which pho is free of MSG?
The Vegetarian Pho is the only one that is MSG-free. However, you can always request any of the other pho combinations to be made with the vegetarian broth.
Q: What are some of the most popular pho combinations that you recommend?
– #13 Pho if you DO NOT like fat in your steak
– #18 Pho if you DO like fat in your steak
– #16 Pho if you’re feeling adventurous and want to try textured meats like tripe (stomach lining, chewy texture) and tendon (ligament, gelatin texture)
Q: I don’t like my meat rare, should I still order the rare steak?
The rare steak is only rare before it hits the broth. Once it arrives to your table, it should be finished cooking. It usually cooked to about medium well. If you are concerned, you can request for it to be extra cooked.
Q: What are your vegetarian or vegan options?
– Our #20 Pho is vegetarian and vegan-friendly
– A tofu substitution can be requested for our Fried Eggrolls appetizer or the Vermicelli Bowl entree (This is vegetarian-friendly, but not vegan)
– A tofu substitution can be requested for our Spring Rolls appetizers. Please allow for a longer wait to fry the tofu (This option is both vegetarian and vegan friendly)
Q: What are your gluten-free options?
– All of our pho combinations are gluten-free, except for any that has the meatballs
– Our Spring Rolls are gluten-free. BUT the sweet brown sauce that comes with them is NOT. Please request the fish sauce if you have a gluten intolerance
– Hoisin and soy sauce are NOT gluten-free
Q: I ordered pho and received a vegetable plate, what do I do with it?
The vegetable plate is for your Pho, everything is optional to use:
– Bean sprouts are for a crispy texture
– Thai basil (only use the leaves) extracts a minty/licorice flavor into the broth
– Lime or lemon wedges are for a sour flavor
– Jalapeños are for spice
Q: What are the sauces on my table?
– The red bottle is Sriracha: Spicy
– The brown bottle is Hoisin: Sweet & salty
– The silver tin is Chili Oil: Smokey & spicy
(You can also request soy sauce & concentrated fish sauce with us)
*** Prices do not include 8.75% Utah State Tax
*** We may require customers to pre-pay for takeout placed over the phone, if it is a big order or if it is close to closing time
*** Dine-in area always closes 30 minutes before posted closing time. Takeout orders are accepted until then

events
The Dumplings Company
Unique Mouth-Watering Dishes.
At The Dumplings Company, we believe that great food brings people together. Our restaurant is a cozy gathering place where tradition meets creativity. Every dumpling we serve is handmade with fresh, locally sourced ingredients, crafted with love and inspired by flavors from around the world.
Skip Gallery Carousel
Start stop gallery carousel
People Are Talking
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
Ocean H:
It was very good , I had the chicken soup with dumplings at medium spice and I got a side of rice to add bc it was too spicy for me but adding the rice to the soup was so delish. Cute little place with nice staff. Very yummy dumplings
Review by - Google
five star review by
Sujit S:
Can't get enough of the varieties of momo here. Love soup dumplings and i also recommend my go to chilli dumplings for the spicy lovers out there. Close to the taste of Nepal, for sure.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Nathan P:
We are very pleased to have discovered this place. My wife got the Fried Mango Chicken dumplings and I got the Steamed Pork. Both were fantastic. We'll be back to try their other dumplings and their other dishes. Their cakes looked delicious but we were too full for any.

Korean BBQ and Hot Pot Menu
Lunch
Join us for a flavorful lunch at KPOT, where you can enjoy our extensive Korean BBQ and Hot Pot menu, all served with fresh ingredients and bold flavors to satisfy your midday cravings. Plus, with quick service and ingredients ready to go, you won't spend your whole lunch break waiting.
Price Varies by Location

All-you-can-eat Korean BBQ or Hot Pot or both

Freshly prepared ingredients

Unlimited access to our Hot Bar & Sauce Bar

Complimentary dessert and ice cream*
*Dessert options may vary based on locations
Dinner
Gather your friends and family for an unforgettable dinner at KPOT, where Korean BBQ and hot pot come together for a fun, interactive dining experience filled with mouthwatering flavors and shared moments around the table. See our Korean BBQ and Hot Pot menus below!
Price Varies by Location

All-you-can-eat Korean BBQ or Hot Pot or both

Freshly prepared ingredients

Unlimited access to our Hot Bar & Sauce Bar

Complimentary dessert and ice cream*

Premium selections of meats and seafood
*Dessert options may vary based on locations
All Korean BBQ and Hot Pot menu pricing options come with access to our hot appetizer and signature sauce bar. with over 70+ freshly prepared ingredients, get ready to craft the perfect sauce to compliment your meal.
Learn How to Kpot
*Korean BBQ and Hot Pot Offerings May Vary Based on Locations
Our bar isn’t just a place to grab a drink—it’s where unforgettable nights begin! Whether you’re toasting with handcrafted cocktails, sipping on ice-cold beer, or exploring our curated selection of wines and spirits, there’s something for everyone.

Recipes
Local Menu Pricing
Appetizers
Krab Rangoons 4 pc (890 cal) • 7 pc (1,420 cal)
Filled with krab, scallions and cream cheese and served with sweet & sour sauce.
Crispy Eggrolls 4 pc (790 cal) • 7 pc (1,250 cal)
Filled with pork and vegetables, lightly fried and served with sweet & sour sauce.
Asian Potstickers 4 pc (560 cal) • 7 pc (840 cal)
Filled with chicken and vegetables, lightly fried and served with sweet & sour sauce.
Coconut Shrimp 5 pc (1,030 cal)*
Hand-dipped in a light tempura batter and encrusted in coconut, served with a spicy dipping sauce.
A Taste of the Bounty 3 of each (1,440 cal)
Eggrolls, Potstickers & Krab Rangoons served with sweet & sour dipping sauce.
Desserts
NY Cheesecake (1,000 – 1,110 cal)
Finished with your choice of topping.
Cheesecake Rangoons 5 pc (1,170 – 1,230 cal)
Cheesecake-filled rangoons served with ice cream and choice of topping.
Molten Muffin (780 cal)*
Hot fudge flows from this moist chocolate cake; served with ice cream.
Sweet Victory S’Mores (1,050 cal)*
Traditional S’mores at your table with your own campfire – enough for at least two!
Khan’s Cake (820 cal)
Layers of chocolate topped with more chocolate.
*Item availability varies by location
Soups & Fresh Salads
Soup-of-the-Day
Egg Drop or HuHot & Sour – (60 cal)
Asian Salad (300 cal)
Mixed greens with veggies, mandarin oranges, toasted noodles and our famous Asian vinaigrette.
Garden Salad (300 cal)
Mixed greens with veggies and croutons served with Ranch dressing.
Chicken Teriyaki Salad (1,140 cal)
Mixed greens topped with teriyaki chicken, toasted noodles, almonds, tomatoes, mandarin oranges, broccoli, and our Asian vinaigrette.
Drinks
We also offer beer, wine, saké, hot tea, coffee and milk at most locations. Contact your
Local HuHot
for more details.

Served with french fries or fruit cup.
Macaroni & Cheese
(with fruit cup, 380 cal. • with fries, 570 cal)
Served with french fries or fruit cup.
Many locations offer a weekly Kids Night special.
Contact your
local HuHot
for details…and don’t forget to leave room for S’mores!*

About the Business
Business owner information
Rina Z.
Business Owner
J&C House is an authentic Japanese restaurant located in Riverton City, Utah, proudly serving the community since 2014. We specialize in preparing exquisite sashimi using the freshest ingredients, flown directly from Japan. Our sushi chefs showcase their masterful knife skills to craft sashimi into works of art. One of our signature offerings is the Bluefin Tuna, a highlight of our menu that captures the essence of traditional Japanese cuisine with both taste and presentation.
…

Fresh Premium Sashimi-All Raw
Chu Toro: Bluefin tuna middle belly | Amaebi: Sweet Shrimp (Small delicate crustacean, popular in Japanese cuisine) |  Toro: Bluefin Tuna Big Belly | King Salmon: Also known as chinook, is a large, prized fish with rice, flavorful flesh.
A5 Wagyu Nigiri
Top-grade  Japanese beef, known for its marbling, tenderness, and rich flavor. Produced from Wagyu cattle, it's highly prized and often considered a luxury delicacy in culinary circles worldwide.
Combination Of Sashimi and Wagyu
One A5 Wagyu Nigiri, One Amaebi Nigiri, Three Pieces of Sashimi includes One King Salmon, One OO TORO, One Chu Toro.
Whole Lobster Tail
Fresh Canada Lobster and ordered from Boston. Steamed with House Special Garlic Butter and green onions

name: Chopfuku Sushi Bar
address: 7869 S Redwood Rd, West Jordan, UT 84088
raw_text:
Best Sushi & Asian Fusion in West Jordan | Chopfuku
Home
ORDER ONLINE
Contact
More
Gift Cards
Digital or physical cards from $25–$500. Never expire, transferable, not redeemable for cash unless required by law.
Reservations
Book tables up to 12 online; same-day accepted before 4 PM.
Parties 9+ or omakase?
Call to hold with card.
Your Favorite Local Japanese Bar
Best Sushi in West Jordan
Order Now
Chef's Inspired
$65 Tasting Menu for Two
Available for dine-in every Monday only through October 27th, 2025
Join us for an exclusive, limited-time dinner thoughtfully crafted by our talented chefs.
Limited Time ! Reserve Now
Luxury Tasting
The top-notch dining experience filled with super fine products like fresh root wasabi, premium western caviar, Japanese A5 wagyu Kobe beef, Kumamoto oyster, Santa Babara Uni, and many more!
Satisfy Your Cravings
Chopfuku Bar
Discover our curated selection of beverages, expertly chosen to complement every dish. From sushi and tapas to full-course meals, the Chopfuku Bar offers the perfect pairing to elevate your dining experience. Enjoy our full liquor bar featuring an extensive selection of wine, beer, sake, handcrafted cocktails, and premium Japanese whisky.
Grab Your Favorites
From Our Talented Head Chefs
SAVOR THE MOMENT
Feast your eyes on our gallery of vibrant dishes and cozy vibes. Every photo tells a story of flavor, passion, and the perfect dining experience—where every bite is picture-perfect!
Roll into Fusion Flavor: The UK Roll
Savor the fusion of East and West with our signature UK Roll. This innovative creation pairs fresh, premium fish with the bold flavor of crispy bacon, blending traditional sushi craftsmanship with a British twist. Enjoy a unique and unforgettable bite that redefines sushi with international flair.
Enjoy Chopfuku at Home
All-in-One Perfection: Bento Bliss
Delight in a perfectly balanced meal with our Bento Bliss. Each Bento Box features an enticing variety of expertly prepared meats—from savory teriyaki to crispy tempura—paired with fresh sides for a satisfying and flavorful dining experience. Enjoy all-in-one perfection, thoughtfully crafted for your enjoyment.
Let’s Eat – Order Here
Japan-Inspired: Kyoto Fried Rice
Savor the authentic flavors of Japan with our Kyoto Fried Rice. Inspired by local Japanese recipes, this elegant dish features premium A5 Wagyu beef and succulent Hokkaido scallops, all expertly cooked in rich Kyoto soy sauce. A luxurious twist on a classic favorite, crafted to delight your palate.
Hungry? Order Now!
THE GIFT OF SUSHI
Whether you're treating yourself or surprising someone special, our custom sushi boxes and elegant gift cards make it easy to share the experience of premium, handcrafted sushi.
Send a beautifully prepared take-out sushi box straight to their door, or let them choose their favorites with a gift card—perfect for birthdays, celebrations, or just because.
THE CROWD FAVORITE:

Raw Fish & Shellfish Warning
We proudly serve fresh, flash-frozen sushi-grade fish that meets FDA parasite-destruction standards. Even so, eating raw or under-cooked seafood or eggs can expose you to bacteria, viruses, or parasites that may cause food-borne illness—particularly if you are pregnant, elderly, or have a weakened immune system. Written safety information is available upon request.

About Mana Thai Cafe
ที่ Manathai cafe เรานำเสนออาหารคุณภาพชั้นเลิศและขอเชิญให้คุณลองชิมอาหารรสอร่อยของเรา
กุญแจในการประสบความสำเร็จของเราไม่ซับซ้อน: การให้บริการคุณภาพที่สอดคล้องกับอาหารที่มีรสชาติยอดเยี่ยมในทุก ๆ ครั้ง เรามีความภูมิใจในตัวเราเองในการให้บริการอาหารที่มีรสชาติอร่อยอย่างแท้จริงแก่ลูกค้าของเรา อย่างเช่น: เอเชีย, ไทย, Fish & Chips
ทานอาหารอร่อย คว้าเครื่องดื่ม แต่ที่สำคัญที่สุด ผ่อนคลาย! เราขอขอบคุณจากก้นบึงของหัวใจในการให้การสนับสนุนเราอย่างต่อเนื่อง

name: Red Basil Thai Restaurant
address: 1652 W 9000th S, West Jordan, UT 84088
raw_text:
LUNCH SPECIAL
$7.99
Monday to Saturday 11.00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m.Lunch Special served with house special salad or soup of the day, choice of  entrée, steamed rice and 2 fried wontons.
1. Massaman
Curry Chicken
2. Green Curry Chicken
3. Yellow Curry Chicken
4. Red Curry Chicken
with pumpkin
5. Pineapple Curry
Chicken (Red or Yellow)
6. Pad Ka Prow Chicken
7. Garlic pepper
Chicken
8. Sweet and Sour Chicken
9. Ginger Chicken
10. Beef Broccoli
11. Vegetable Medley with
Tofu
Salad served with your choice of Ranch,Thousand Island, Italian or Special House Dressing
Soup of the day depends on chef.
2 Fried Wontons served with house plum sauce.
Appetizers
Cream Cheese Wontons ( 8 ) ………..………………....  6.95
Combination with crispy wonton skin outside and creamy inside with cream cheese, minced clam and  green onion filling.
Fried Wontons( 10 )  ………………...........................….  4.25
Deep fried wonton skins with our house plumsauce.
Shrimp In The Blanket ( 8 )  …………………………..….  8.95
Shrimp wrapped with wonton skin deep fried until golden brown served with house special plum sauce.
Satay Chicken( 4 )  ………...….…………………..…….  6.95
Chicken marinated with our own satay sauce on a skewer and grilled. Served with house special peanut sauce.
BBQ Pork OnThe Stick ( 4 )  ……...………………...…...  6.95
Moo Ping is the Thai name. Sliced marinated pork in Thai style with seasoned herb, grilled and served with Thai special sauce.
Egg Rolls (Po Pia Tod ) ( 4 )  ……….………………..…..  4.95
Deep fried egg roll skin stuffed with ground pork, glass noodle, shredded vegetables served with Thai egg roll sauce.
Fresh Springroll ( 4 ) ………….…………………..…...….  5.95
Vegetables(mint, carrot, lettuce, basil, cucumber), shrimp and Rice noodles in fresh spring roll skin. Served with Hoisin peanut sauce.
Deep FriedTofu  ( 8 ) ………..…………………….………  4.95
Deep-fried fresh Bean Cake served with sweet chili sauce with ground peanut.
Pot stickers( 8 ) …………………………………….……….5.95
Deep fried pocket of dough that is stuffed with minced pork and vegetable served with dumpling sauce.
Soups
Tom Yum Chicken or Tofu ………….…... 10.95     Shrimp…………....… 11.95
One Thai classic soup made with diced lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, cilantro cooked with straw mushroom,s tomatoes, chicken or tofu with a hot and sour taste.( Hotpot serves 2-4 )
Poh-Thaag (Sea food soup )………………………...…. 13.95
A hot & spicy seafood combination soup with a touch of lime juice.( Hot pot serves 2-4)
Tom Kha Chicken or Tofu………………... 10.95     Shrimp ….…….…….. 11.95
Coconut soup base made with the same ingredients as Tom Yum but adding galangal and coconutmilk for heartier richer flavorful soup. ( Hot potserves 2-4 )New paragraph
Salads
Som Tum Thai( Papaya Salad )…..…………………….….. 8.95
Green papaya,dried shrimp, peanuts, tomatoes, sour lime, hot chili, salty fish sauce and sweetness added by palm sugar. Served with sticky rice.
Laab………………………….…………………………………..  9.95
Ground chicken, pork or beef mixed with chili, mint, ground toasted rice and assorted vegetables flavored with fish sauce, lime juice and freshherbs. Served with sticky rice.
Num Tok(Waterfall )...………………………………..………  10.95
Medium rare tender beef with chili, mint, ground toasted rice and assorted vegetables flavored with fish sauce, lime juice and fresh herbs. Served with sticky rice.
Rice & Noodles
Thai Fried Rice ….…………..……...... 9.95  Shrimp ………………….…....10.95
Choice of chicken, pork or beef stir fried with rice, egg, onion, green onion and tomato.
Spicy Fried Rice ……………….......... 9.95  Shrimp …………………….....10.95
Choice of chicken, pork or beef stir fried with rice, egg, onion, garlic, basil ,chili.
Pineapple Fried Rice ........................ 10.95  Shrimp ……………………....11.95
Fried Rice the addition of juicy, slightly tangy pineapple and cashew nut.
Crab Fried Rice  ……………..………………………...…..…… 10.95
Fried rice with the addition of crab flavor mixed to perfection
.
Pad Thai ...............………………….... 9.95  Shrimp ……………...………..10.95
Stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, fish sauce, tamarind juice, red chili pepper, crushed peanut, green onion, bean sprouts and carrot.
PadSi-Eiw  ………………………......... 9.95 Shrimp ……………………......10.95
Stir fried flat rice noodle with meat, egg, broccoli and sweet soy sauce. Choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Lad Naa  ………………………..…...... 9.95  Shrimp ……………………….. 10.95
Flat rice noodle stir fried with sweet soy sauce. Topped with rich brown gravy and broccoli. Choice  of chicken, pork orbeef.
Pad Kee Mao ………………………….9.95 Shrimp …………………….…. 10.95
Stir fried Flat rice noodle with, broccoli, bell peppers, onion, garlic, red chili, egg and Thai basil with choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Kua Kai noodle  ………………………….………….…………..9.95
Pan fried flat rice noodle with chicken, bean sprout, green onion and roughly ground peanut
Chow Mien ……………………..…......9.95  Shrimp ...…………………….. 10.95
Premium gourmet egg noodles stir fried with celery, carrot, cabbage, bean sprout add a taste of sesame with your choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Entrees
Massaman Curry ……………………………………………….….… 10.95
Made with massaman curry paste, coconut milk, roasted peanuts, potatoes, carrots, onions and your choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Green Curry  …………………………………………….............……10.95
Thai green curry is one of the most famous Thai curries, made with chicken, beef or pork, bamboo shoot, coconut milk, and Basil.
Yellow Curry  ….………...………………………………………........10.95
Richer and creamier than other Thai curries, Made with Yellow curry paste, coconut milk, potatoes, carrots, onion with your choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Panang Curry  ….………...………………………………………........10.95
Kaffir lime leaves in red Panang curry with choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Pineapple Curry  ….………...………………………………………....10.95
Made with red curry paste, coconut milk, pineapple tidbits with your choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Red Curry with pumpkin  ….………...…………………………….....10.95
Made with Red curry paste, coconut milk, basil and Thai pumpkin with your choice of chicken, pork, or beef.
Pad Ka-Prow  ..….………...………………………………………........10.95
Stir fried in fresh diced Thai chili, garlic, bell pepper, onion and basil with your choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Garlic & Pepper  ..………...………………………………………........10.95
A common Thai dish with stir fried sliced chicken, pork or beef with garlic and pepper.
Pad Preaw Wan ( Sweet & Sour ) ...……………………………........10.95
Stir fried chicken, pork or beef in house special sweet & sour sauce with pineapple, onion, tomatoes, carrot and bell pepper.
Beef Broccoli  ..….………...………………………………………........10.95
Stir fried sliced beef with oyster sauce, garlic and house sauce on top of broccoli.
Pad Khing Sod  ….………...………………………………………........10.95
Stir fried sliced pork, chicken or beef with shredded ginger, onion, green onion and bell pepper.
Pad Pik Khing ...….………...………………………………………........10.95
Stir friend sliced pork, chicken or beef with red curry paste, green beans, shredded kaffir lime leaves and bell peppers.
Thai Chicken Cashew ….……….…………………………………........10.95
Stir fried chicken with cashew nuts, onions, roasted chilies, green onion, red bell pepper and chili paste with soya bean oil.
Vegetable Medley with Tofu  ….………...………………………........10.95
Stir fried combination of vegetables: broccoli, carrots, baby corn, cabbage, celery and onion with deep fried tofu and garlic.
Stir-Fried Eggplant  …..…...………………………………………........10.95
Stir fried eggplant with garlic, Thai basil and your choice of chicken, pork or beef.
Desserts
Thai Custard with Sweet Sticky Rice ……………………………........4.45
Sweet coconut sticky rice with a topping of coconut palm sugar egg custard.
Fresh Mangoes with Sweet Sticky Rice ( Seasonal ) ….……….......5.95
Sweet coconut sticky rice served with fresh mango.
Drink
Soft Drinks (free refill )  ……..……..     1.75
Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Lemonade,Root Beer, Dr.Pepper
Thai IcedTea  ….………..……..….…    2.50
Thai IcedCoffee  ………..………..…    2.50
BottledWater  …………………….….    1.50
Hot tea …………..………………....…   1.50
ALLERGY WARNING
. Not all ingredients are listed. If you are allergic to any and all types of ingredients, Please let management know before ordering.

name: Thai Orchid
address: 6219 S Highland Dr, Salt Lake City, UT 84121
raw_text:
Thai orchid authentic thai cuisine
Lunch Menu
Special Lunch combination     7.95
Your choice of
two
of the following served with streamed rice and the house salad.
L1
Gai Tod (Fried Chicken)
Marinated chicken coated with breadcrumb then, fried. Served with sweet and sour sauce.
L4
Tom Yum Gai ( Chicken )
A popular spicy and sour soup with mushrooms, galanga,
kaffir lime leaf, and lemon grass.
L5
Tom Kha Gai  ( Chicken )
An exotic creamy coconut soup with lemon grass, kaffir lime leaf, galanga, mushrooms, and  cabbage.
L6
Gang Dang ( Chicken )
Medium spicy red curry with coconut milk, bamboo shoots, bell peppers, basil, and kaffir lime leaf.
L7
Gang Keow Wan ( Chicken )
Medium spicy green curry with coconut milk, bamboo shoots, bell peppers,
peas,  basil, and kaffir lime leaf.
L8
Gang Ka Ree ( Chicken )
Medium spicy yellow curry with  vinegar,  coconut milk, potatoes, carrots,
and  onion.
L9
Gang  Massaman ( Chicken )
Medium spicy massaman curry with tamarind juice,  coconut milk, potatoes,
carrots   onion, and peanuts.
L10
Pad Gra Prow ( Chicken )
A famous Thai dish with garlic, Thai spicy chilies,  bell peppers, basil,
green beans and onion.
L12
Pad Puck Tofu
A delicious stir-fry combination of vegetables, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms, zucchini, and onion.
L13
Pra Ram
A Fabulous combination of steamed vegetables; broccoli, mushrooms,
carrots, zucchini, and onion. Covered with our tasty peanut sauce and 
ground peanut.

address: W Terminal Dr, Terminal B, Salt Lake City, UT 84122
raw_text:
Menu — Bambuza Vietnam Kitchen & Bar
Welcome
Home

Family Inspired
In the Community

Catering

Products
Welcome
Home
Menu
Family Inspired
In the Community
Taste Driven
Catering
Bambuza Hospitality Group
Products
Our Menu
LOCALLY SOURCED • FRESH INGREDIENTS
Where possible, Bambuza brings locally sourced, organic ingredients to ensure the highest quality and to support local growers.
Pricing and availability are subject to change and may vary sligthly between locations.
Handrolls & Starters
Bambuza Salad Rolls (G)
Your choice of shrimp or tofu. Crisp lettuce, delicate rice noodles, thinly-sliced carrots, & fragrant basil, freshly hand-wrapped in rice paper & served with a rich, smooth peanut sauce.
Crispy Spring Rolls
Your choice of succulent pork or mild & nutty taro paired with minced fresh vegetables & encased in a crispy golden shell. Served with our sweet & salty nuoc mam dipping sauce.
Coconut Shrimp
Juicy shrimp tossed in flaky coconut and crunchy panko and fried to a golden crisp, served with sweet chili dipping sauce.
Potstickers
Half dozen pan-fried dumplings with seasoned ground pork & vegetables.
BBQ Pork Bun
Marinated & roasted BBQ pork in a soft, pillowy bun.
Grilled Shrimp Skewers
Fresh grilled shrimp skewers, topped with caramelized onions and crunchy shallots.
Salad
Chicken Cabbage Salad (G,V)
Grilled chicken with mixed cabbage & cilantro tossed in a lime vinaigrette.
Banh Mi Sandwich
Chicken, Pork of Tofu (V)
Piled high with grilled meat or tofu, sweet & tangy pickled carrots, fresh cucumbers & cilantro, with a zesty garlic-sriracha spread on a toasted baguette.
Grill Bowls
Honey Glazed Chicken | Garlic Glazed Pork Loin | Sauteéd Tofu | Grilled Shrimp | Crispy Spring Rolls
Ample portions of seared marinated meat or tofu served with crispy greens, crunchy cucumbers, tangy pickled carrots,  crunchy fried onions, scallions& shallots, all served with our sweet & salty nuoc mam dipping sauce.
Noodle Soups
All soups served with a side of fresh bean sprouts, spicy jalapeños, aromatic basil, & a wedge of lime.
Pho Soups (G)
Rib-eye Steak Pho | Chicken  Pho | Vegetarian 100% Vegetable Broth (G,V)
Our scratch bone broth is slowly simmered overnight to create a rich, nourishing base for our pho (pronounced “fuh”). Our soups feature delicate rice noodles & fragrant onions & cilantro.
Wonton Dumpling Soup
Delicately handcrafted pork & shrimp dumplings, fresh egg noodles, & locally sourced vegetables served in a flavorful chicken broth.
Craft Beverages
Vietnamese Iced Coffee
Rich, dark iced coffee served over ice.
Thai Tea
Creamy, sweet tea served over ice.
Lime Juice
Refreshing, tangy & tart lime juice over ice.
Mango Nectar
Food Allergy/Intolerance Statement: We are committed to identifying ingredients that may cause reactions for those with food allergies and sensitivities; however, because foods are prepared in a kitchen with shared equipment, there is always some risk of cross-contact of allergens and gluten.
(G)
“Gluten Sensitive” Made with ingredients that do not contain gluten. We do not claim these items are “gluten-free” because they are prepared in a facility that also handles gluten-containing ingredients.
(V)
“Vegetarian” A vegetarian, or in some cases vegan, preparation is available for this dish.

Sweet and Spicy Chicken with Red Curry Paste, Stewed in Coconut Milk with Pineapple, Kaffir Lime, garnished with Thai Basil. Served on Thai Jasmine Rice (Medium Spicy)
GF
Chiang Mai Noodles - Khao Soi
Egg Noodles with Chicken Breast Slices stewed in Coconut Milk with Yellow Curry Paste, Hand-Squeezed Lime Juice, Garnished with Crispy Noodles, Jullian Picked Carrots & Pickled Mustard Greens.
Not Spicy
Not Gluten Free
Thai Noodle Soup - Pho
GUAY TEOW NUEA ก๋วยเตี๋ยวเนื้อ
(Vietnamese call this Pho)
Homemade Beef-broth Soup with Rice Noodles, imported Thai Meatballs, thinly sliced Beef & Bean Sprouts.
Garnished with Cilantro, chopped Green Onions & Thai Basil.
Suzy's Thai Chili Powder Available on Request
GF
Summer Noodle Salad
Slow-Smoked Pork or Chicken with Cucumber, Lettuce, Carrots, Cilantro, and Vermicelli Rice Noodles. Mixed with a mild Thai Chili dressing with fresh squeezed Lime and a touch of Peanuts. (Can be customized)
Jumbo Shrimp added at $1 each.
(Not Spicy)
GF
Pumpkin Curry
Kabocha Pumpkin, Marinated Chicken Breast Slices, Julienne Bamboo Shoots, Kaffir Lime Leaves, Thai Basil,
Coconut Milk, Red Curry, Coconut Cream
(Medium Spicy)
GF
Tom Yum Goong
Spicy and Tart Soup with Jumbo Shrimp or Chicken, Mushrooms, Sweet Onions and Fresh Lime Juice, Lemon Grass, Shallots and Galangal. Served on Thai Jasmine Rice.
(Medium Spicy)
GF
Stir Fry Noodles
Stir Fried Egg Noodles with Garlic, Carrots, Broccoli, Medley of Red, Yellow & Green Peppers, Cabbage and Sliced Chicken Breast.
Suzy's Thai Chili Powder Available on Request
Beef Waterfall
Grilled strips of Tender Beef, marinated in Lime Juice, Cilantro, Onion, Roasted Rice Chips & Chili Powder - served on Thai Jasmine Rice or Sticky Rice.
(Mild Spicy - Request if you want Hot)
GF
Veggie Stir-Fry
Medley of Broccoli, Carrots, Cauliflower, Onions, Baby Corn & Rainbow of Bell Peppers.
Served on Thai Jasmine Rice
(Jumbo Shrimp or Chicken add- ons available.)
Suzy's Thai Chili Powder Available on Request.
GF
Add Ons
Can be added to most orders but not the Neighborhood Delivery Program
Jumbo Shrimp
Large succulent shrimp that are priced per piece so you can have as many as you want.
Chicken
Sliced Chicken Breast
Dessert
Award Winning
Mango Sticky Rice
Sweet Thai Mango served on Coconut infused Sticky Rice with a Coconut Cream topping.
Garnished with an edible Thai Orchid.
GF & Dairy Free
Menu subject to change based on ingredient availability

SLICE OF THE DAY
Spicy Italian Sausage and Fresh Mushrooms
Date:
Sep 29, 2025
Calendar:
							Slice of the Day
At our store, we provide products that contain peanuts, tree nuts, soy, milk, eggs, and wheat. Despite taking necessary measures to minimize the risk of cross-contamination, we cannot guarantee that any of our products are entirely safe for individuals with peanut, tree nut, soy, milk, egg, or wheat allergies. We advise our customers to take necessary precautions and consult with our staff if they have any concerns regarding allergies.
