Starters
Pull-A-Parts
Cheese Pull-A-Part
(Breadsticks stuffed with cheese) Indulge in a 14" crust stuffed with Mozzarella Cheese, brushed with Olive Oil, and sprinkled with Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano Cheese. Served with creamy Ranch and Pizza Sauce, this cheesy treat is a steal at only 9.99
The Chedda Pull-A-Part
(Breadsticks stuffed with cheese) Satisfy your craving for cheesy goodness with our 14" breadsticks, with a blend of Sharp Cheddar and Mozzarella Cheese, brushed with Olive Oil and seasoned with Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano Cheese. Accompanied by creamy Ranch sauce and Pizza Sauce for dipping, this irresistible treat is available at a wallet-friendly price of just 9.99
Pizza Pull-A-Part
(Breadsticks on a pan) Treat yourself to a 14" pan of freshly baked Breadsticks, brushed with Olive Oil and sprinkled with a flavorful blend of Garlic, Oregano, Parmesan, and Romano Cheeses. Served with creamy Ranch and Pizza Sauce, this delectable delight is a steal at an affordable price of just 6.99
Wings & Bread
Cheese Garlic Bread
Try our Texas Toast Garlic Cheese Bread, topped with Mozzarella Cheese. Each slice of Bread is seasoned with Garlic and toasted to a crispy golden brown, then smothered in melted Cheese. This decadent twist on a classic side is sure to be a crowd-pleaser. 2-Slices 3.99 / 4-Slices 6.99
Garlic Bread
Indulge in our Texas Toast Garlic Bread, crafted with freshly baked Bread, seasoned with Garlic, and toasted to a crispy golden brown. This classic side is the perfect complement to any meal. 2-Slices 2.50 / 4-Slices 3.99
Buffalo Wings
Savor six succulent Buffalo Wings, available in a variety of our delicious sauces - Spicy, Spicy BBQ, Spicy Teriyaki, Spicy Thai, Strawberry Balsamic, or classic Buffalo - all at an unbeatable price of 9.49
Salads
Crisp Salads
All of our salad dressings are made fresh daily from scratch.  Available dressings:
1000 Island
Buttermilk Ranch
Caesar
Chipotle Ranch
Chunky Bleu Cheese
Low-Calorie Italian (VEGAN)
VEGAN "House-made" Buttermilk Ranch
Cobb Salad
Enjoy a refreshing and nutritious Cobb Salad featuring crisp Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Bacon Bits, Blue Cheese crumbles, Red Onions, Oven-Roasted Chicken, Hard-Boiled Eggs, and fresh Tomatoes. 10.99
Chicken Caesar Salad
Enjoy a satisfying meal of Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast paired with a crisp blend of Romaine lettuce, Garlic Croutons, Parmesan Cheese, mild Banana Peppers, and our house made Caesar dressing, all generously portioned and offered at a great value of 9.99
Deluxe Chef Salad
Savor a delicious and hearty Chef Salad, made with a blend of fresh Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, topped with Smoked Ham, Mozzarella Cheese, Red Onions, fresh Green Peppers, Black Olives, fresh Mushrooms, Tomatoes,  Carrots, and Garlic Croutons - all for the affordable price of 10.99
Half Chef
Indulge in a delectable half-sized Chef Salad comprising a combination of crispy Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Smoked Ham, flavorful Mozzarella Cheese, Red Onions, fresh Green Peppers, Black Olives, fresh Mushrooms, Tomatoes, fresh Carrots, and Garlic Croutons - all for only 7.99.
Dinner Salad
Experience a simple yet satisfying diner-style Salad made with a fresh blend of Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Tomatoes, fresh Carrots, and Garlic Croutons. Serves 1 for $5.99
Group Salad
Experience a simple yet satisfying Group Salad made with a fresh blend of Iceberg and Romaine Lettuce, Tomatoes, fresh Carrots, and Garlic Croutons.  Our Group Salad (serves 4-6) $17.50
Specialty Pies
Deletions No Problem. No Substitutions Please!
Caprese Pie
Thin crispy Cheddar crust, herbed Marinara, Parmesan Cheese, fresh raw Mozzarella, sliced Tomatoes and fresh Basil topped with a sweet Balsamic Reduction. *(not available in 1/2 & 1/2) 12"-13.99  /  14"-17.99  /  16"-23.99  /  23"-N/A
Cheesy Bacon Burger Pie
Hand-tossed dough with toasted Sesame Seeds, Seasoned Ground Beef, Red Onions, Bacon, Tomatoes, and a mix of aged Mozzarella and sharp Cheddar Cheese - Topped with chopped Dill Pickles and The Pie’s Gourmet Burger Sauce. A must-try!! 12"-14.99  /  14"-18.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A
Bacon-Berry Pie
Indulge in the perfect combination of sweet and savory with our Bacon-Berry Pie. Our thin crust is brushed with a Strawberry Balsamic sauce and topped with Oven-Roasted Chicken, Mozzarella Cheese, Bacon, Red Onions, and Feta Cheese. The pizza is then baked to perfection and garnished with freshly chopped Cilantro and fresh Strawberries. It's a flavor explosion you won't want to miss! 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
Buffalo Chicken Ranch
Get ready for a spicy twist with the Buffalo Chicken Ranch Pie pizza. Our Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast is marinated in a spicy Buffalo Sauce, and paired with Mozzarella Cheese, Garlic Ranch Sauce, and Red Onions, all atop a Cheese Spiced Crust. This pizza packs a punch of flavor to satisfy your cravings for something bold and delicious. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
The Wise Guy Pie
Introducing The Wise Guy Pie, a pizza that will make you want to exclaim, "Say hello to my little friend!" This hand-tossed pie boasts a blend of whipped Cream Cheese, fresh Spinach Leaves, Artichoke Hearts, Chicken Breast, Mozzarella Cheese, and a hint of Marinara Sauce, all layered on top of the Dough. Once baked to perfection, it's topped with diced Tomatoes, freshly cut Basil, and a sweet Balsamic Reduction drizzle that ties it together. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
Mountain of Meat
The Mountain of Meat Pie pizza is a carnivore's dream, loaded with an irresistible combination of Pepperoni, Smoked Ham, Genoa Salami, Italian Sausage, and Ground Beef. Get ready to sink your teeth into a flavor-packed pizza that delivers on all levels of meatiness. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-43.99
Chicken Ranch
Satisfy your cravings with the mouthwatering Chicken Ranch Pie pizza. This savory treat features our signature Garlic Ranch Sauce spread over the crust and topped with Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast, Bacon, Tomatoes, Onions, and a blend of Sharp Cheddar and Mozzarella Cheese. Each bite is a burst of delicious flavors that will leave you wanting more. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-N/A
Hawaii Pie-O
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with the Hawaii Pie-O Pie pizza. Featuring Smoked Ham, Pineapple, Marinara, and Mozzarella Cheese, each bite is a delicious blend of sweet and savory flavors. As they say in Hawaii Five-O, "Book it Dano!" and enjoy this mouthwatering pizza. 12"-15.49  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-23.99  /  23"-41.99
Stromboli Pizza
Indulge in the perfect combination of savory and spicy with our delicious Stromboli Pizza topped with slices of Pepperoni, freshly diced Onions and Green Peppers, and Italian Sausage. Each bite is bursting with flavor and is sure to satisfy your cravings. 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-43.99
BBQ Chicken Cilantro
Indulge in the savory and sweet flavors of the BBQ Chicken Cilantro pizza. This delicious pie is made with Oven-Roasted Chicken Breast, Smoked Gouda, and Mozzarella Cheese, all smothered in a mouthwatering sweet BBQ Sauce. Topped with fresh-cut Cilantro, each bite is a flavorful explosion that will leave you wanting more. 12"-14.99  /  14"-18.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-42.99
Xtreme Veggie
Our Xtreme Veggie pizza is bursting with fresh flavor, featuring a colorful medley of fresh Spinach, Artichoke Hearts, Sicilian Spiced Tomatoes, Red Onions, and a blend of Feta and Mozzarella Cheeses. It's a veggie lover's dream come true! 12"-15.99  /  14"-19.99  /  16"-25.99  /  23"-43.99
The Pie’s Combo
Get ready for a pizza that has it all with the Combo Supreme! Loaded with Pepperoni, Smoked Ham, Genoa Salami, fresh Mushrooms, Onions, Green Peppers, Italian Sausage, Linguica Sausage, and Ground Beef, this pizza is a flavor explosion. Each bite is packed with a delicious mix of savory meats, fresh veggies, and bold spices. As they say, "Look Out!" - this pizza is sure to satisfy your cravings and leave you feeling full and happy. 12"-16.99  /  14"-20.99  /  16"-26.99  /  23"-46.99
Thai Pie
Looking for something different to eat? A perfect blend of spicy Thai Peanut Sauce, Oven Roasted Chicken Breast, Carrots, Red Onions, Pineapple, fresh Basil, and chopped Cilantro on a thin crust topped with light Mozzarella Cheese and toasted Sesame Seeds. You won't regret it... 12"-13.99  /  14"-17.99  /  16"-23.99  /  23"-N/A
The Greek
Get ready for a taste of the Mediterranean with the Greek pizza! This delicious pie is topped with a White Cucumber Yogurt Sauce, Gyro Meat, Mozzarella Cheese, and Feta Cheese, and finished off with a sprinkle of fresh Cut Tomatoes, Red Onions, and a squeeze of Lemon, all on a crispy Thin Crust. As they say in Greece, "Opa!" - this pizza is sure to impress with its delicious blend of flavors. 12"-14.99  /  14"-18.99  /  16"-24.99  /  23"-N/A

Pasta & Zappis
Pasta
Macaroni and Cheese
Indulge in perfectly baked Macaroni, drenched in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, velvety Cream Cheese, Romano, and Parmesan Cheese. Crowned with a smoky, buttery cracker crumb, it’s comfort food with a gourmet twist!  Available for just 9.99
Buffalo Macaroni and Cheese
Get ready to savor baked Macaroni smothered in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, Cream Cheese, Romano, and Parmesan Cheese. Topped with zesty Buffalo Chicken, a sprinkle of Gorgonzola, and a smoky, buttery cracker crumb for the perfect finish. It’s a flavor-packed twist on a classic!   Available for just 12.99
Jala-Bacon Mac and Cheese
Macaroni baked in a blend of Sharp Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, Cream Cheese, Romano, & Parmesan, topped with Jalapenos, Bacon, & a smoky Butter Cracker Crumb. It’s a flavor-packed twist on a classic!   Available for just 11.99
Spaghetti with Meatballs
Satisfy your cravings with our Spaghetti and Meatballs dish, featuring two Meatballs drenched in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce and served on a bed of al dente Italian Spaghetti. For an extra kick, pair it with our spicy Cajun Link Sausage. it's a meal you won't want to miss. Available for just 10.99
Spicy Thai Pasta
Indulge in the flavors of Oven-Roasted Chicken, Pineapple, fresh Carrots, Red Onions, and Sesame Seeds tossed with Spaghetti and a spicy Thai Peanut Sauce. This dish is finished with a generous sprinkle of fresh-cut Cilantro and Basil to elevate the taste. It's the perfect combination of sweet and spicy at a great value of 11.99
The Vesuvius Calzone
Experience the fiery explosion of flavors with our signature calzone, The Vesuvius, inspired by the only active Volcano in Italy. Our hand-tossed Dough is stuffed with Italian Spaghetti, Meatballs, and Mozzarella Cheese, all generously smothered in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce. Don't miss your chance to try this mouthwatering masterpiece, available for just 11.99
Zappis
The Pie's version of a Calzone.
Deletions No Problem. No Substitutions Please!
The Vesuvius Calzone
Experience the fiery explosion of flavors with our signature Zappi, The Vesuvius, inspired by the only active Volcano in Italy. Our hand-tossed Dough is stuffed with mouthwatering Italian Spaghetti, savory Meatballs, and gooey Mozzarella Cheese, all generously smothered in The Pie's homemade Pasta Sauce. Don't miss your chance to try this mouthwatering masterpiece, available for just 11.99
The Wise Guy
Indulge in our delicious Zappi made with our hand-tossed Dough and filled with a creamy mixture of fresh Spinach Leaves, Artichoke Hearts, Whipped Cream Cheese, and Mozzarella Cheese. It's then topped with fresh-cut Basil, Romano Cheese, and diced Tomatoes marinated in a sweet Balsamic Reduction, making it a truly irresistible treat. You can also add Oven-Roasted Chicken for an extra burst of flavor at just .99 cents more. All of this is available for only 11.99
Cheese Zappi
Experience a classic Italian taste with our cheese Zappi, featuring melted Mozzarella Cheese and Pizza Sauce that creates the perfect balance of flavors. Enjoy it as it is for a simple yet satisfying meal, or add your favorite toppings such as fresh vegetables or savory meats for an extra burst of flavor. You can also add a dollop of creamy Ricotta Cheese for an indulgent twist. Each additional topping is only .99 cents, and our Seafood toppings are not available for Zappis. Get yours now for only 8.99
Meat Zappi
Indulge in our delicious Meat Calzone, loaded with gooey Mozzarella Cheese, zesty Pizza Sauce, and your choice of savory toppings. Pick from Pepperoni, Smoked Ham, Canadian Bacon, or Genoa Salami, fresh cut Onions, all mixed with fresh Mushrooms, crispy Green Peppers, and tangy Black Olives. For an extra burst of creaminess, add Ricotta Cheese for only .99 cents, or spice it up with Cajun Link Sausage for just .99 cents more. All this goodness for only 10.99
Vegetarian Zappi
Savor the delicious flavors of our Veggie Zappi, filled with creamy Mozzarella Cheese and zesty Pizza Sauce. Packed with wholesome ingredients such as fresh Mushrooms, Black Olives, Onions, and Green Peppers, this Calzone is a perfect choice for vegetarians. Want to add some extra richness? Go for a dollop of Ricotta Cheese at just .99 cents more! Only for 9.99
Desserts & Drinks
Beverages
Micro-Brewed Root Beer
Indulge in our delicious Micro Brewed Root Beer, made with a traditional recipe that's sure to satisfy your cravings. Our Root Beer is brewed from scratch using only the finest ingredients and served ice cold from a keg. With its smooth, rich flavor and frothy head, it pours like a fine Ale and is the perfect complement to any meal. Come and experience true Root Beer done right!
Soft Drinks
Our beverage selection includes unlimited refills of Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, and Dr. Pepper. You can also take your favorite soft drinks to go with our convenient 2-liter bottles and 6-packs available for delivery or take-out. So whether you're dining in or taking out, you can enjoy your favorite sodas anytime, anywhere.
Draft Beer
At our establishment, we take pride in offering a diverse selection of beers to our patrons. We feature a rotating selection of local craft beers on tap, showcasing the best brews from the region. In addition, we offer a range of domestic and imported beers in the bottle, ensuring that there is something for every taste and preference. Whether you're a fan of hoppy IPAs, cool Ambers, or refreshing Lagers, we have a beer that will satisfy your cravings. Come in and check out our beer menu today!
Bottled Juices
We offer a refreshing selection of bottled fruit juices to quench your thirst. Choose from sweet and tangy Orange Juice or crisp and refreshing Apple Juice. Each bottle contains a generous serving of your favorite fruit juice, perfect for enjoying on-the-go or pairing with your favorite meal.
Desserts
Cinn-A-Part
Treat your taste buds to The Pie's artisanal sweet Cinnamon Breadsticks, made with their signature hand-crafted Sweet Dough, brushed with Butter, a blend of ground Cinnamon and Brown Sugar,  then finished with a layer of Cream Cheese Frosting - perfect for sharing with groups. 7.99
Half Baked Cookies & Cream
Satisfy your sweet tooth cravings with our Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, partially baked in-house and paired with a generous serving of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream, drizzled with Caramel and Chocolate sauces, topped with Whipped Cream, and a Cherry - this dessert is big enough for sharing. 9.99
*Not available for take-out or delivery
Two Scoops of Vanilla Ice Cream
Two scoops of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream is a classic dessert for a bargain of 4.99
*Not available for take-out or delivery
Chocolate Caramel Sundae
Indulge in a delicious finale to your dining experience with two scoops of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream, topped with Caramel and Chocolate, a dollop of Whipped Cream, and crowned with a Cherry on top. 5.99
*Not available for take-out or delivery
Campfire Calzone - New
Give me Smore! The Pies Sweet Dough stuffed with toasted Marshmallows, Nutella, and Graham Crackers all folded up then brushed with smoked Butter and topped with Chocolate Sauce.  8.99
Fast Lunch
In a hurry? Our Large Slices of Pizza are ready in minutes.

Gluten-Free Specialty Pizzas

Gluten-Free pies are all 14" Large.
GF Bacon Chicken Ranch
Indulge in the savory and satisfying flavors of our Gluten-Free Bacon Chicken Ranch pizza. This delectable creation features Ranch Sauce, Oven Roasted Chicken, Breakfast Bacon, Red Onions, Sicilian Tomatoes, and a blend of Mozzarella and Cheddar Cheese. Every bite is bursting with deliciousness, making this pizza a must-try for any pizza lover. Available in a 14" size, this Gluten-Free pizza is priced at 20.99
GF Bacon and Berries Pie
Indulge in the unique Gluten-Free flavor combination of our Strawberry Balsamic Sauce, Oven-Roasted Chicken, Mozzarella Cheese, Bacon, Red Onions, and Feta Cheese. This delicious pizza is topped off with fresh Cilantro and chopped Strawberries. Available in 14" size for 20.99
GF Mini Meat Pie
Our Gluten-Free Mini Meat Pizza, a perfect choice for those who love a classic meaty flavor. This pizza is made with Breakfast Bacon, Pepperoni, Canadian Bacon, Mozzarella, and Pizza Sauce, all on a delicious Gluten-Free crust. It's compact and satisfying choice for a quick lunch or snack. Available in a 14" size, for just 20.99
GF Chicken Bar-B-Que
Indulge in our Gluten-Free Chicken Bar-B-Que pizza, featuring Oven-Roasted Chicken, BBQ sauce, Pineapple, Red Onions, and Mozzarella Cheese. Savor the perfect combination of sweet and savory flavors in every bite. Available in a 14" size for only 19.99
GF Veggie Xtreme
Our Gluten-Free Veggie Xtreme pizza is a vegetable lover's dream. It features a delicious combination of fresh Spinach, Artichoke Hearts, Sicilian Spiced Tomatoes, and Red Onions, all topped with Feta Cheese and Mozzarella Cheese. Our signature pizza sauce ties it all together, creating a perfect balance of flavors. Available in a 14" size, this Gluten-Free pizza is priced at 20.99
GF Supreme Pie
This mouthwatering Gluten-Free Supreme Pizza comes loaded with Pepperoni, Breakfast Bacon, Canadian Bacon, fresh Mushrooms, Black Olives, Red Onions, Mozzarella Cheese, and our signature Pizza Sauce. Available in a 14" size, for just 20.99
GF Pie Island
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our Gluten-Free Pie Island pizza. Our Gluten-Free Pie Island pizza features Canadian Bacon, Pineapple, Marinara Sauce, and Mozzarella Cheese. Available in 14" size for only 19.99

About the Business
At Aker, we are a 21+ establishment. And we are redefining the parameters of sophisticated dining and entertainment. Our innovative concept harmoniously blends the mastery of high-end Japanese culinary art, centered around the captivating robata grill tradition, with the vibrant energy of Salt Lake City's nightlife scene.

OUR BEER

Great People - Delicious Food - Award Winning Craft Beer
View Jobs at Red Rock
Follow the
@redrockbrewing
on Instagram for daily updates, brewpub specials and beer release announcements.
What's New at Red Rock Brewing
ONO – Bourbon Barrel Aged Stout
“Ono” is an opulent 10% ABV bourbon barrel aged Imperial Stout infused with toasted coconut and coffee. It’s black as midnight and pours with a dense, creamy head. Ono greets you with an aroma of coconut and roasted coffee beans, intertwined with notes of rich cocoa, and bourbon-soaked oak. Bourbon barrel aging imparts layers of…
Read More
→
Secale 2024 Now Available
You can enjoy this storied beer at all Red Rock Brewing locations starting today! Secale by Red Rock Brewery is a bold doppelbock lager aged in first-run, rye whiskey barrels. Doppelbocks are known for their rich malt character and full body. As it rests in the rye whiskey barrels, Secale absorbs delicious layers of complexity.…
Read More
→
Fresh Pickin’s Wet Hop Lager
Hop to It! Red Rock’s Fresh Pickin’s – A Limited Edition Wet Hop Lager Awaits Oktoberfest lagers are fabulous, and pumpkin beers are delightful. But fresh, wet-hopped beers can make a beer lover squeal!  They’re a special and fleeting treat – here for a good time, not a long time. Fresh Pickin’s is a standout…
Read More
→
Above the Clouds Double IPA
Above the Clouds is a modern West Coast IIPA. It pours a clear yellow color and has a beautiful floral and candy like aroma. Flavors include berries, citrus, stone fruit, and a hint of pine. The bitterness has a very soft edge that quickly dissipates, leaving behind a lingering citrus flavor. This beer is light…
Read More
→
Forbidden Fruit Series – P.O.G.
The history of P.O.G. began in the 1970’s, when Haleakala Dairy on the island of Maui first created a vibrant juice blend of passionfruit, orange and guava.  This trio of tropical delights quickly became one of the most popular drinks on the Hawaiian Islands. It’s no surprise that this tangy fruit combination blends perfectly with…
Read More
→
Why So Serious?
Sports.  They bring out the best in us.  They bring out the worst in us. In a little over 48 hours, someone’s day will be ruined while another jumps for joy. People take sports so seriously.  But why? Red Rock’s newest IPA poses more questions than answers.  What we do know is this: It’s an…
Read More
→
The Utah craft beer scene is booming and nobody represents the full spectrum of Utah’s best craft beers than Red Rock Brewery in downtown Salt Lake City, Utah.
Red Rock Brewery opened its doors on March 14, 1994.  From the very beginning, we set out to brew high-quality craft beers and serve delicious food.
Red Rock Brewery has earned a national reputation as one of the most creative breweries in the country. Our beers have received more than 100 regional and national awards and our restaurant has been named ‘Brewpub of the Year’ by
Brewpub Magazine
and ‘Large Brewpub of the Year’ by the
Great American Beer Festival
.
Locally, the original brewpub has become a staple of Salt Lake City’s
downtown dining
scene. Red Rock has opened additional restaurants at
Fashion Place Mall
in Murray, Utah, and in Kimball Junction near the resort community of Park City, Utah.
Our
Park City restaurant
features a taproom to watch the game while you have a local craft beer. Our curated
menus
offer the best steak, wood-fired pizza, seafood, pasta, burgers, salads, small bites, and dessert, as well as a full liquor and wine menu.
All locations offer to-go food for
takeout and delivery
. We are committed to maintaining the highest health and cleanliness standards in our dining rooms.
In 2011, we expanded our brewing capacity with a dedicated production
brewery
to support our restaurant growth and to expand the availability of
our beers
to local pubs and retail locations.
We produce more than 30 core, seasonal, and special release brands of beer that can be purchased either directly from the
Red Rock beer store
, at Utah State Liquor stores, at our restaurants, Harmon’s Grocery stores, and many other locations throughout Utah.
Stop into the
Red Rock Beer Store
and find seasonal and limited-release beers.
Red Rock Brewing Company has brewed the best beer in Salt Lake City and has been your favorite lunch, brunch, and dinner spot for 27 years!
Cheers!
Copyright© Red Rock Brewery 2022
WORK AT RED ROCK

About the Business
At Cultivate Craft Kitchen, it was our mission to design a space that provides a refined casual dining experience. A place where memories are made and stories are told over a delicious meal. With a meticulous attention to detail and only the freshest ingredients, our chefs have built a menu that offers a variety of modern dishes that capture the flavor of the season. All while paying tribute to the rich farming history of Draper City. Whether you are celebrating a special occasion or enjoying a night out, our talented staff will be here to welcome you in and ensure every visit is perfect.

About the Business
Business owner information
Scott A.
Business Owner
The Tavernacle Social Club has been Salt Lake City's most wild dueling piano show for over 11 years!

A dueling piano show is like a great big sing-along. Two piano players sit facing each other at baby grand pianos.

The 'dueling' part of a dueling piano show comes from YOU, the audience. You determine what you want to hear by filling out request slips provided at each table. Bring your request slip up to either of the pianists, accompanied by a tip. The size of the tip determines how badly you want to hear the song. 

NOTE: The amount of money on the song determines its priority in the lineup of requests. 

If someone else in the audience doesn't want to hear your favorite song, they can stop it for a dollar more than it was requested for... but you can start the song again for one dollar more. Let the duel begin.

We encourage singing, clapping, and even a little dancing on the piano if it's your special day. Come join us for a rockin' good time with our dueling piano shows
…
Read more

Q:
Is there a cover fee?
A:
Yes. $5 cash or card. I was there on a Saturday. $1 off with a Yelp check in.

Our Menu
Quality and freshness is our recipe, House-Made sauces, Root Vegetables, Curated Coffee, & Local suppliers everywhere we can. A melting-pot of American cuisine, with so many cultures that make up our limitless community – It’s simple, take great local ingredients, prepare these into seriously great dishes to serve our guests the best way we know how.

Consuming seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. To our guests with food sensitivities, allergies or special dietary needs, our restaurants prepare and serve products that contain peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, eggs, milk, soy and gluten. Regular kitchen operations involve shared cooking and preparation areas, and food variations may occur due to differences in suppliers, ingredient substitutions, recipe revisions, and/or preparation at the restaurant. For these reasons, we cannot guarantee that any menu item will be completely free of allergens.

Allergen & Nutrition Information
2000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice, but calorie needs vary. 1,200 to 1,400 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice for children ages 4-8 years and 1,400 to 2,000 calories a day for children ages 9-13 years, but calorie needs vary. Additional nutrition information available upon request.
*Eggs served sunny-side up may be under-cooked.  NOTICE: CONSUMING RAW OR UNDER-COOKED MEATS, POULTRY, SEAFOOD, SHELLFISH OR EGGS MAY INCREASE YOUR RISK OF FOOD BORNE ILLNESS, ESPECIALLY IF YOU HAVE CERTAIN MEDICAL CONDITIONS.
‡Prepared in a common kitchen alongside items containing gluten.
Fried items may be prepared in the same frying oil as menu items containing animal ingredients. We cannot guarantee that cross-contact with animal ingredients will not occur.

Lucky H Bar
The luck in Lucky H Bar isn’t like good or bad luck that comes and goes. It’s the luck of having a place and having people that make you feel at home.
To know the luck of Lucky H is to know the feeling of being part of a tradition that isn’t like anywhere else.
Hours
M-Sun:
11:00 AM – 12:00 AM
Guests
Must be 21 or older to dine at Lucky H Bar.
At the Bar
More Info
Saddle up to the bar or ease into a comfortable booth. Our bartenders are on hand to expertly mix a classic cocktail or a perfectly pull your favorite draft beer.
Explore the Menu
Meet the Chef
More Info
Little America’s Executive Chef Santiago Ramos first learned the importance of cooking with love by watching his mom. Since joining the team at Little America in 2004, he’s worn many hats, including in the kitchens at our sister properties, The Grand America Hotel and Little America in Cheyenne.
Read More
On the Menu
More Info
Made-from-scratch sandwiches or hearty snacks, the classic comforts from our neighboring restaurant, The Coffee Shop, pair perfectly with your drink of choice at Lucky H Bar.

BREAKFAST FAVORITES
HAM, BACON, OR SAUSAGE & EGGS
Two eggs cooked to order, choice of ham, bacon or sausage, served with hash browns and choice of breakfast bread.
HOME STYLE BISCUIT BREAKFAST
Two buttermilk biscuits covered in sausage gravy served with two eggs, hash browns and your choice of bacon or sausage.
CHICKEN FRIED STEAK & EGGS
Chicken fried steak smothered in sausage gravy served with two eggs, hash browns and choice of breakfast bread.
PORK CHOP & EGGS
A tender pork chop served with two eggs, hash browns and choice of breakfast bread.
CROISSANT BREAKFAST
Scrambled eggs, American cheese, choice of ham, bacon or sausage on a warm croissant, served with hash browns.
TRADITIONAL CREPES
Three delicious crepes filled with cream cheese and topped with strawberries (fresh when in season), blueberry compote, apple-cinnamon compote, or bananas and whipped cream.
CORNED BEEF BREAKFAST
Corned beef hash, two eggs, hash browns and choice of breakfast bread.
EGGS BENEDICT
Two poached eggs and ham served on a toasted English muffin topped with hollandaise sauce served with hash browns.
TOP SIRLOIN & EGGS
Choice top sirloin fillet served with two eggs, hash browns and choice of breakfast bread.
CREPE BREAKFAST COMBO
Two crepes with cream cheese filling, fruit topping, and whipped cream are served with two eggs, hash browns, and two pieces of bacon or sausage.
MONTEGO SCRAMBLE
Three eggs scrambled with ham, green pepper, and onion, topped with cheddar cheese and salsa on the side, served with hash browns and a choice of breakfast bread.
CHILI VERDE BURRITO
Scrambles eggs with ham, onion, green peppers, and cheddar cheese rolled with hash browns in a flour tortilla covered in chili verde.
SUNRISE BREAKFAST BURRITO
Scrambled eggs with ham, green peppers, onions, and Cheddar cheese wrapped in a warm flour tortilla, topped with tomato, avocado, salsa, and sour cream, served with hash browns.
CALIFORNIA EGGS BENEDICT
Two poached eggs with bacon, spinach, avocado and tomato on a toasted English muffin smothered in hollandaise sauce, served with hash browns.
HOT OFF THE GRIDDLE
GRIDDLE COMBO
Your choice of two buttermilk pancakes, four wedges of French toast, or a sugar-dusted Belgian waffle served with two eggs and two strips of bacon or sausage.
Two large buttermilk pancakes
Three large buttermilk pancakes
Sugar-dusted Belgian waffle
Six Wedges of French toast
Choose toppings from strawberries (fresh when in season), blueberry compote, apple-cinnamon compote, bananas or chocolate chips and whipped cream.
BEVERAGES

Iced Coffee
OMELETS

Ham with cheddar cheese
SPINACH FETA OMELET
Spinach, onions, feta and Monterey jack cheese topped with diced tomatoes.
DEE’S COMBO OMELET

DENVER OMELET
Ham, green peppers and onions with melted cheddar cheese.
VEGETARIAN CHEDDAR OMELET
Onions, green peppers and mushrooms covered in cheddar cheese and served with tomatoes, avocado.
CALIFORNIA OMELET
Crispy bacon topped with avocado and cheddar cheese.
SPANISH OMELET
Ham, onions and green peppers topped with cheddar cheese, mild salsa, sour cream and guacamole.
PORK VERDE OMELET
Shredded pork, mushrooms, onions, topped with cheddar cheese, chili verde and sour cream.
*Two egg omelets available upon request.
A SIDE OF…
Ham, bacon or sausage
Biscuits & gravy
Breakfast bread
Assorted muffins
Hash browns
Fresh fruit
Oatmeal
Danish
PLATTERS
PIONEER PLATTER
Hash browns topped with sauteed onions, mushrooms, and sausage with cheddar cheese and two eggs with choice of breakfast bread..
COUNTRY PLATTER
Ham, bacon and sauteed onions over hash browns and topped with cheddar cheese and two eggs with two buttermilk biscuits in rich sausage gravy.
FRESH GARDEN PLATTER
Hash browns topped with onions, green peppers, mushrooms, spinach, avocado slives, diced tomatoes and two eggs with choice of breakfast bread.
CHICKEN-FRIED STEAK PLATTER
Mushrooms, onions, cheddar cheese and diced chicken-fried steak over hash browns and covered in rich sausage gravy, topped with two eggs and choice of breakfast bread.
GRAND BREAKFAST
Breakfast bread options:
Toast, hotcakes, biscuit, English muffin or scone.
Substitute a blueberry muffin.
Substitute a Belgian waffle.

THE COWBOY BREAKFAST
A thick slice of ham, two sausages, two bacon strips, three eggs on grilled sourdough bread with hash browns covered in sausage gravy and served with three large hotcakes.
MOUNTAIN MAN OMELET
Five egg omelet with ham, sausage, mushrooms, onions, and green peppers topped with cheddar cheese and Monterey jack cheese with hash browns and served with three large hot cakes.

Breaded, deep fried pickle chips with ranch or bleu cheese for dipping.
CHEESE QUESADILLA
Flour tortillas with cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, topped with olives and tomatoes.  Guacamole, salsa and sour cream on the side.
CHICKEN WINGS
Eight chicken wings served plain, spicy or a combination with your choice of sauces.
DINNER FAVORITES
All dinners are served with soup or side salad.
SPAGHETTI & MEATBALLS
Seasoned meat sauce and Italian meatballs served over spaghetti noodles with two slices of garlic toast.
TOP SIRLOIN STEAK
USDA choice top sirloin steak served with steamed vegetables and your choice of potato with a warm dinner roll.
PORK CHOP DINNER
Pork chops with steamed vegetables and your choice of potato or rice pilaf. Served with a dinner roll.
CHICKEN PARMESAN
Chicken-fried chicken breast on spaghetti covered in marinara sauce and topped with Monterey Jack cheese. Served with garlic toast.
MR. D’S SPECIAL
Half pound ground beef covered with grilled onions and served on thick slices of garlic toast with your choice of potato.
SALMON
Glazed salmon fillet, served with steamed vegetables and your choice of potato or rice pilaf along with a dinner roll.
CHICKEN FRIED STEAK
Chicken fried steak smothered in sausage gravy with steamed vegetables and your choice of potato or rice pilaf. Served with a warm dinner roll.
MUSHROOM CHICKEN DINNER
Two chicken breasts smothered in mushrooms, onions and green peppers, topped with Swiss cheese. Served with steamed vegetables, your choice of potato and a warm dinner roll.
HOT TURKEY DINNER
Sliced turkey breast topped with gravy on a choice of bread with mashed potatoes, cranberry sauce, and steamed vegetables.
GROUND BEEF STEAK
Half-pound ground beef topped with grilled onions and served with steamed vegetables and your choice of potato or rice pilaf. Served with a warm dinner roll.
FISH & CHIPS
Three batter dipped cod fillets with tartar sauce, lemon, steamed vegetables and French fries with a warm dinner roll.

OT CAKE COMBO

SENIOR FRENCH TOAST COMBO
Four wedges of French toast, one egg, and two bacon stripes or sausages.
DEE’S SENIOR BREAKFAST
Two eggs, hash browns, and toast or hot cakes.
HAM & CHEESE OMELET
Two egg ham and cheese omelet with hash browns and toast or hot cakes.
BACON & EGG
One egg, two strips of bacon or sausages with hash browns and toast.
FRENCH TOAST
Four wedges French toast, butter, and maple syrup.
LUNCH
GRILLED CHEESE
Grilled American or Swiss cheese on your choice of bread with French fries.
HAMBURGER AND FRIES
Quarter pound ground beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onions and pickles with French fries.
FISH FILLET SANDWICH
Breaded cod fish fillets on a French roll with tartar sauce, lettuce and tomato with French fries.
SENIOR MR. DEE’S
Quarter pound ground beef patty smothered in grilled onions, served on garlic toast with choice of potato.
TURKEY SANDWICH
Sliced turkey breast with lettuce, tomato, mayo and a side of cranberry sauce on toasted bread with French fries.
DINNER
SPAGHETTI
Pasta noodles, Italian sauce with meatballs and garlic toast.
CHICKEN TENDERS
Three breaded chicken tenders, vegetables, choice of potato, and a dinner roll.
FISH & CHIPS
Two breaded cod fillets with a dinner roll and steamed vegetables, and choice of potato.

Salmon, steamed vegetables, choice of potato, and a dinner roll.

Tank to glass â Beer from the source
Located on the west side of Salt Lake City, The Brewhouse Pub (21+ only) is a welcoming and casual locale nestled in the shadow of our fermentation farm. Featuring a full assortment of Uinta classics and seasonals on tap or by the can, you can also find limited and one-off special releases from our Research and Development Lab. Â
And when hunger strikes, our partners Nomad Eatery know their way around the kitchen like we know our way around a brewdeck. They offer a full menu of elevated pub fare built to pair with our lineup of beers.
When youâre done, hop into the General Store and Rep the Range with some fresh Uinta gear.
Available all year long.

About Nomad Eatery
True to itâs name, Nomad Eatery has wandered its way to the Uinta Brewhouse Pub, and weâre luckier for it. Chef Vance Lott slows down the fast casual dining experience and bring you everything from classic sandwiches, burgers and wings to his own take on the classic pub chips. We call it sophisticated pub food, youâll just call it delicious.

About the Business
Business owner information
Beirut C.
Business Owner
Authentic Lebanese Restaurant in Salt Lake City, experience authentic and time-honored recipes, meticulously crafted to transport your taste buds to the heart of Beirut, such as gyros, falafel, and shawarma, Kabob, Kebeh, Taboole and Fatoush  as well as burgers and Farr's ice cream. Our quick-serve food is perfect for on-the-go or casual in-house dining, we also offer catering. Family owned and operated, our Lebanese food embodies the standard of traditional Beirut cuisine.

For the last 20 years, there’s one thing we’ve never changed— every sauce is made in-house, our chicken is fresh-cut and marinated, every veggie is freshly cut and prepped daily. We’ve spent two decades sourcing breads and meats from top-quality producers, ensuring they’re crafted to our exact proprietary recipes. At Spitz, freshness and quality aren’t just priorities—they’re our main recipe, our secret recipe, the only recipe we’ll never change.

Если вам срочно понадобились деньги до зарплаты, тогда
кредит онлайн на карту без проверок и звонков
в Украине то, что нужно.
Погашення поточного боргу через
мікропозику на картку Приватбанку
- це дуже правильне і продумане рішення.
Пенсіонер або студент тепер може взяти
кредит за 5 хвилин на картку
, що б розплатитися з поточними борговими зобов'язаннями.
Отвечая простым требованиям микрофинансовых организаций, получите

For the last 20 years, there’s one thing we’ve never changed— every sauce is made in-house, our chicken is fresh-cut and marinated, every veggie is freshly cut and prepped daily. We’ve spent two decades sourcing breads and meats from top-quality producers, ensuring they’re crafted to our exact proprietary recipes. At Spitz, freshness and quality aren’t just priorities—they’re our main recipe, our secret recipe, the only recipe we’ll never change.
Menu Items May Vary Per Location

Protein of your choice and american cheese pressed like a quesadilla. Includes a kids sized side and juice box.

For the last 20 years, there’s one thing we’ve never changed— every sauce is made in-house, our chicken is fresh-cut and marinated, every veggie is freshly cut and prepped daily. We’ve spent two decades sourcing breads and meats from top-quality producers, ensuring they’re crafted to our exact proprietary recipes. At Spitz, freshness and quality aren’t just priorities—they’re our main recipe, our secret recipe, the only recipe we’ll never change.
Menu Items May Vary Per Location

Menus
FOOD
Drinks
From Our Family to Yours
In Mount Salem, Jamaica, lived a family of 11, who were raised by an amazing woman: Florence Harding. Chef, mother, grandmother, and sole provider, Florence worked 7 days a week preparing fresh meals for the Chin & Changs, (a Jamaican-Chinese family who migrated to Jamaica in the late 1940’s). Florence worked hard, until her hands callused, yet when her shift ended, she rushed back home to tend to her family pot. Upon arrival, Florence would light the coal burning stove while granddaughter Sheron Grant, (head chef of 11Hauz), would always be the first to watch her cook.
Sheron, intrigued and awed by her grandmother’s handwork in creating delicious meals, would sneak a hot taste any moment she could. In addition to being blessed with Florence’s authentic family recipes, Sheron has added a delectable flavorful touch all her own.
Today, 11Hauz is renowned for serving tasty, healthy, and authentic Jamaican dishes in and around the Park City area for years. Sheron, along with her two daughters, Nyesha and Tanisha, and her granddaughter Yanique, invite you to experience a taste of family, a taste of love, and a taste of Jamaica within the gorgeous mountains of Utah.
BECOME A LOCAL
GET STARTED WITH OUR NEWSLETTER, REWARDS, ANDGIFT CARD
Full yuh belly and get rewards too. You can now buy e-gift cards with us to give to a special someone or just to have. Because, you know… just in case. You can also sign up to get rewards from every purchase or visit.
Gift Cards
JOIN OUR NEWSLETTER
Rewards Sign Up
Balance
What Our Friends Say
Our food Speaks for itself, but hear what other say
11 Hauz was one of the highlights of our trip! After a mediocre meal in park city I got a random recommendation for an “authentic Jamaican restaurant” on the lift.  Our group of 6 went for dinner and it was incredible. We ordered family style and every dish was incredible. The rum punch (and another rum drink I can’t remember) were both phenomenal.  I can’t recommend 11 Hauz more!
Tyler Norton ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
This is my favorite restaurant in Park City. Jerk chicken wings, curry Roti with chicken, jerk shrimp…AMAZING! Also, the service is truly incredible. They are so kind and attentive. I will absolutely be coming back.
Lara Tang ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
My family and I visited this week and I must say this was a pleasant surprise. When I saw they were located right outside our resort, we had to try it. The family that works here is phenomenal. The service was great and the food was even better. I’m still shocked at how tasty the beef patties were considering location and altitude! A must try!
C.S. Harden ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Amazing authentic Jamaican food in skier’s paradise.  Come visit this family owned restaurant. Highly recommend the goat and chicken curry. And get a beef patty pie too!
Hung Lee ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Phenomenal food and friendly, fantastic service from Sonny. The beef patty was to die for and everything else (oxtail, roti curry, jerk chicken and shrimp) was so flavorful too! We'll definitely be back soon.
Amy Rogers ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
If I could give it 10 stars I would, hands down some of the best food in Utah by a mile. The jerk chicken and the curry tofu were top notch. Highly recommend this place.
Joe W ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Best chicken curry I ever ate in my life!! And I swear Im not exaggerating! Food tastes so delicious and fresh!
Isabella D. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

DESSERTS

BEVERAGES
We proudly serve Pepsi products.
Try one of our signature ice-cold Nut Job beers!
Don’t Just Take It From Us!
We tried this place because of its large gluten free options. It has become our go to wing spot because we liked it so much.
The wings are crispy and juicy and the sauces are on point! Even better, they’re actually healthy because everything is baked, which I never would have guessed because they’re so good.
The Buffalo chicken wrap is also really good and the Buffalo chips with ranch are awesome!!
We have yet to try anything we don’t like.
Highly recommend Wing Nutz.
-Elena R.
This is my second time here and Wing Nutz nailed it again for great tasting "bake wings".
The wings are so crispy you can't tell they're baked, but they do taste better then fried wings, not to mention better for your health too.  Also,  there is a varies of unique and delicious sauces to choose from too;  I choose the mango Chipotle mild sauce...soooo good!!
-Divina Hardin
Meat fell off the bone because of tenderness. Sauces are amazing. Service was excellent. 10/10 recommend. Worth the higher price for a top quality product.
-David Evans
My husband and I visit at least once a week.  The staff makes us feel like family which is great since we are transplants from the Midwest.  We love that they don’t fry anything including the chips.  The food is consistently delicious.  The chicken tenders have never once been dry!  Very casual, laid back atmosphere.  What’s not to like?
-Liz Creamer

About the Business
Dare to try and discover our flavors. We have carefully selected some of the most  exquisite and emblematic dishes of our country and we serve them in fresh and delicious bread, so you can have Peruvian food to go!

Try our Lomo Saltado sandwich or any other of our sandwiches and we  assure you the first, the second and every single bite will take you to heaven, to Peruvian heaven. Or try our Lomo Saltado plate and Pollo Saltado plate, just like you will get it in Peru.

Three-Egg Omelets
Bacon Avocado Omelet
Three eggs, hickory-smoked bacon, spinach, tomatoes, monterey jack cheese and avocado. Served with roasted potatoes. (920 Cal)
Egg White & Veggie Omelet
Three eggs, spinach, tomatoes, mushrooms, caramelized onions and crumbled feta cheese. Served with sliced tomatoes. (230 Cal)
Bacon, Ham & Sausage Omelet
Three eggs, hickory-smoked bacon, ham, pork sausage, andouille sausage, tomato and melted cheddar cheese. Served with roasted potatoes. (730 Cal)
Santa Fe Omelet
Diced jalapeño, cilantro, tomato, onion, tortilla strips and melted Monterey Jack cheese topped with spicy chipotle sauce. Served with roasted potatoes and choice of toast or a muffin. (590 Cal)
Two-Egg Dishes

Two Eggs
(160 Cal) served any style and your choice of
Protein
(300-910). Served with
Roasted Potatoes
(150 Cal) and your choice of
Toast
(130-400 Cal) or a
Muffin
(520-860 Cal).
Pork Sausage & Eggs
Two Eggs served any style and Pork Sausage. Served with Roasted Potatoes and your choice of Toast or a Muffin. (690 Cal)
Hickory-Smoked Bacon & Eggs
Two Eggs served any style and Hickory-Smoked Bacon. Served with Roasted Potatoes and your choice of Toast or a Muffin. (530 Cal)
Turkey Sausage & Eggs
Two Eggs served any style and Turkey Sausage. Served with Roasted Potatoes and your choice of Toast or a Muffin.
(460 Cal)
Hickory-Smoked Ham & Eggs
Two Eggs served any style and Hickory-Smoked Ham. Served with Roasted Potatoes and your choice of Toast or a Muffin. (1070 Cal)
Corned Beef Brisket Hash & Eggs
Two Eggs served any style and Corned Beef Brisket Hash. Served with Roasted Potatoes and your choice of Toast or a Muffin. (580 Cal)
Eggs Benedicts
Eggs Benedicts served with a side of
Roasted Potatoes
(150 Cal).
Florentine Benedict
Crisp bacon, poached eggs, spinach and sliced tomatoes topped with hollandaise sauce on a grilled english muffin. Served with a side of roasted potatoes. (760 Cal)
Eggs Benedict
Hickory-smoked ham and poached eggs topped with hollandaise sauce on a grilled english muffin. Served with a side of roasted potatoes. (670 Cal)
Corned Beef Hash Benedict
Slow-cooked corned beef brisket and poached eggs topped with hollandaise sauce on a grilled english muffin. Served with a side of roasted potatoes.
(730 Cal)
Smoked Salmon Benedict
Cold-smoked Atlantic salmon and poached eggs, topped with hollandaise sauce, diced red onions and capers on a grilled english muffin. Served with a side of roasted potatoes. (600 Cal)
Quiches
Quiche Lorraine
Hickory-smoked ham, bacon, aged parmesan and swiss cheese. Served with roasted potatoes. (700 Cal)
Quiche Florentine
Spinach, aged parmesan and swiss cheese. Served with roasted potatoes. (660 Cal)
Le Grand Style
Le Grand Dishes come with
Two Eggs
* served any style and your choice of
Protein
.
Pain Perdu With Mixed Berries
Stuffed brioche french toast filled with orange marmalade and cream cheese blend topped with fresh berries and strawberry purée. (1150 Cal)
Malted Waffles
Buttermilk-malt waffles with whipped margarine and maple syrup. (420 Cal)
Buttermilk Griddlecakes
Four buttermilk griddlecakes with whipped margarine and maple syrup. (860 Cal)
Brioche French Toast
French Toast dusted with powdered sugar with whipped margarine and maple syrup. (590 Cal)
Cinnamon Roll French Toast
A cinnamon roll french toasted and dusted with powdered sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. (720 Cal)
The Classics
Mimi’s Brunch Trio
A slice of Pain Perdu with mixed berries, a Malted Waffle, and a seasonal Griddlecake. Served with two eggs* (160 Cal) any style and your choice of pork sausage (530 Cal), turkey sausage (300 Cal), hickory-smoked bacon (370 Cal), hickory-smoked ham (910 Cal), or fresh fruit (30 Cal). Substitute your protein choice with slow-cooked corned beef hash (420 Cal) $
Monte Cristo Stuffed French Toast
Sweet and savory goodness! Mimi’s French toast filled with ham and melted Swiss cheese, topped with powdered sugar. Served with maple syrup and your choice of seasonal fresh fruit or roasted breakfast potatoes. (780-925 Cal)
Add mixed berries $
Fried Chicken & Waffles
Crisp breaded chicken and two buttermilk waffles. (1300 Cal)
Steak & Eggs
28-day aged 10 oz. USDA Choice New York Strip. House-made herbes de Provece butter available upon request. Served with french fries and two eggs. (1090 Cal)
Brown Sugar & Cranberry Oatmeal
Rolled oats sprinkled with brown sugar and cranberries and served with milk. (380 Cal)
Eggs & Bacon Croissant Sandwich
Hickory-smoked bacon, two fried eggs, sliced tomatoes, melted cheddar and mayonnaise on a flaky croissant. Served with sliced tomatoes. (910 Cal)
Farmhouse Breakfast Tacos
Hickory-smoked bacon, sausage, scrambled eggs, roasted potatoes, cheddar cheese, jalapeño, tomato, onion and cilantro in flour tortillas. Served with salsa. (910 Cal)
Breakfast Burrito
Flour tortilla stuffed with braised beef, scrambled eggs, avocado, jalapeño, onion, cilantro and tomato, smothered with spicy chipotle sauce and melted Monterey Jack and cheddar cheese. Served with roasted potatoes. (910 Cal)
Avocado Toast
Sliced avocado, tomato and two
poached eggs on sourdough toast with chili flakes, salt &
pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil. Served with fresh seasonal
fruit. (910 Cal)
Mimi’s Huevos Rancheros
Two fried eggs and fresh avocado on two crispy tostadas with vegetable red
sauce, fresh jalapeños, and feta cheese crumbles. Served
with a griddled potato cake and spicy chipotle sauce. (910 Cal)
Mixed Berry Crepes
Filled with sweet orange marmalade cream cheese,
topped with fresh strawberries & blueberries, and drizzled
with strawberry purée. Served with two eggs* (160 Cal)
any style and your choice of pork sausage (530 Cal), turkey
sausage (300 Cal), hickory-smoked bacon (370 Cal), or
hickory-smoked ham (910 Cal). (820 Cal)
Breakfast Crepes
Egg, spinach, tomato, and onion filling topped with creamy mornay cheese sauce. Served with roasted potatoes.(650Cal)

PLACE AN ONLINE ORDER:
ORDER ONLINE
DINE-IN / TAKE AWAY MENU
APPETIZERS
SMOKED SALMON DEVILED EGGS
$6.99
Four classic deviled eggs infused with Norwegian smoked salmon. (Gluten free.)
BISON STUFFED MUSHROOMS
$6.99
Ground bison, pork sausage, shredded smoked gouda cheese & herbs stuffed into large button mushrooms, then topped with scratch made foyot (f-why-yo) sauce. (Gluten free- no breading used.)
SPINACH ARTICHOKE  DIP
$6.99
Three creamy, melted cheeses blended with chopped spinach, artichoke hearts, & roasted heirloom tomatoes. Served with crispy tortilla chips. (Vegetarian & Gluten Free.)
COMBO PLATES
Includes 1 entrée choice and your choice of 2 side dishes.
HUCKLEBERRY PORK TENDERLOIN
$16.99
Seasoned & grilled pork tenderloin served with our signature huckleberry sauce made with wild, hand-picked huckleberries from the ashy slopes of Mount St. Helens. (Gluten free.)
DWAINE'S GRILLED CHICKEN
$13.99
Two plump, bone-in chicken thighs marinated for 24 hours in Grandpa Dwaine's secret family recipe marinade then seasoned and char-grilled to perfection. (Gluten free- marinade is also gluten free.)
LIMONCELLO CREAM SALMON
$19.99
Cold-smoked, oven-roasted Norwegian salmon topped with Limoncello cream sauce. (Gluten free.)
COLD-SMOKED, SOUS VIDE TRI-TIP
$19.99
Beef tri-tip, hickory cold smoked for a light infusion, sous-vide to a perfect medium, sliced & served with portobello mushroom duxelles & drizzled with port reduction. (Gluten free.)
*Upgrade to purebred, grade 9+ Wagyu
Tri-Tip +$60
PORCINI CREAM CHICKEN
$17.99
Porcini mushrooms simmered in mirepoix stock, blended with roasted garlic & caramelized onions, seasoned, and finished in whole cream, then tossed over smoky grilled chicken. (Gluten free.)
WHISKEY PEPPERCORN MEATBALLS
$16.99
Roasted beef meatballs tossed in whiskey & green peppercorn cream sauce, garnished with chopped parsley.
VEGETARIAN "MEATBALLS" WITH RED PEPPER ROMESCO
$15.99
Plant-based Italian "meatballs" served with our house-made Roasted Red Pepper Romesco sauce and topped with Goat Cheese Crumbles. (Vegetarian. *Vegan upon request. Slightly spicy.)
SIDES
Two sides are included with each combo plate. Pricing for additional sides appears below.
UTAH FUNERAL POTATOES
$4.99
Diced red potatoes in a delicious chicken cream sauce blended with five cheeses and sour cream then topped with crunchy crumbled corn flakes.
CLASSIC MAC N CHEESE
$3.99
Classic elbow pasta in a velvety, creamy, house-made five cheese cheddar sauce. (Vegetarian.)
GREEN BEANS WITH BACON & ONION
$3.99
Cut green beans, sautéed with bacon and caramelized onions. (Gluten free.)
CRISPY BRUSSEL SPROUTS
$3.99
Roasted Brussels Sprouts tossed in Chipotle Honey Mustard sauce and garnished with candied bacon crumbles. GF
*Can be made Vegetarian upon request.
PARMESAN MASHED POTATOES WITH GRAVY
$3.99
Creamy russet potatoes whipped to perfection with roasted garlic and grated Parmesan cheese and topped with beef demi-glace for a classic, comfort dish. (Gluten Free. *Vegetarian without the gravy.)
SWEET POTATO MASH
$3.99
Oven roasted sweet potatoes with orange, nutmeg, 100% real maple syrup and brown sugar, topped with candied pecan crumbles. (Vegan/Vegetarian/Gluten Free.)
SIDE CAESAR SALAD
$3.99
Hand-torn romaine lettuce served with shaved Parmesan, slow-roasted red tomatoes, & candied bacon crumbles with a side of tableside Caesar dressing. (Gluten free.)
SALADS
Add Chicken/Pork +$3.99. Add Steak/Shrimp +$6.99
DELUXE CAESAR SALAD
$9.99
Hand-torn romaine lettuce served with shaved Parmesan, slow-roasted red tomatoes, & candied bacon crumbles with a side of tableside Caesar dressing. (Gluten free.)
FIG & GOAT CHEESE SALAD
$9.99
Black mission figs, goat cheese crumbles, dried tart cherries, mandarin oranges, diced purple onion, walnuts, & balsamic vinaigrette on a bed of spinach. (Vegetarian & Gluten Free.)
DESSERTS
Individually portioned. Easy to grab and go.
HUCKLEBERRY CHOCOLATE MOUSSE
$6.49
Rich, hand-crafted chocolate mousse served with our signature huckleberry sauce and topped with a dollop of Crème Chantilly and almond crumbs. (Vegetarian & Gluten Free.)
HUCKLEBERRY SUPREME PIE
$6.49
Perfectly crumbly crust with creamy supreme filling, topped with our signature huckleberry coulis, Crème Chantilly, & almond crumbs.  (Vegetarian & Gluten Free.)
CRÈME BRÛLÉE
$6.49
Vanilla custard, blue-flame torched for a crackling caramelized crust. (Vegetarian & Gluten Free.)
BREAD PUDDING
$6.49
Fluffy and rich bread pudding folded with raisins then smothered in traditional whiskey custard sauce, topped with Crème Chantilly and almond crumbs. (Vegetarian.)
RED VELVET COOKIE
$1.49
Red Velvet Cookie with dark chocolate chunks, Hershey's mini kisses, and white chocolate chips, baked fresh, in-house.
CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIE
$1.49
Chocolate Chip Cookie with Hershey's milk chocolate kisses, semi-sweet chocolate chunks, and milk chocolate chunks, baked fresh, in-house.
KIDS' MENU
Includes a kid-sized entrée and 1 side dish. For ages 0-9.
CLASSIC MAC N CHEESE
$6.99
Classic elbow pasta in a velvety, house-made cheddar cheese sauce. Vegetarian  (Vegetarian.)
HUCKLEBERRY PORK TENDERLOIN
$6.99
Seasoned & grilled pork tenderloin served with our signature huckleberry sauce made with wild, hand-picked huckleberries from the ashy slopes of Mount St. Helens. (Gluten free.)
"DWAINE'S" GRILLED CHICKEN
$6.99
One plump, bone-in chicken thighs marinated for 24 hours in Grandpa Dwaine's secret family recipe marinade then seasoned and char-grilled to perfection. (Gluten free.)
DRINKS
Includes a kid-sized entrée and 1 side dish. For ages 0-9.
HUCKLEBERRY LEMONADE
$2.99
SPECIALTY LEMONADES
$2.99
Visit us in-store to choose from our rotating selection of specialty lemonades!
ANKAFÉ BARLEY BREW
$2.99
Barley brew, or café de cebada, is a Peruvian coffee alternative with just one ingredient: artisan roasted barley. Locally sourced by Utah farms. Caffeine-free with pleasantly bitter and nutlike notes. No preservatives. Try it black, with cream & sugar, or to complement a dessert.   (Contains Gluten; doesn't contain coffee or caffeine.)
COKE PRODUCTS
$2.99
Coke, Diet Coke, Coke Zero, Sprite, Minute Made Light Lemonade, Fanta Orange, Barq’s Red Cream Soda, Barq’s Rootbeer, Dr. Pepper, Diet Dr. Pepper
Come on down and try us in person for the best comfort food in Salt Lake City!

Salt Lake City, UT 84115

IVY & VARLEY ONLINE PRIVACY POLICY AGREEMENT
November 1, 2024
Ivy & Varley (Ivy & Varley) values its users’ privacy. This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) will help you understand how we collect and use personal information from those who visit our website or make use of our online facilities and services, and what we will and will not do with the information we collect. Our Policy has been designed and created to ensure those affiliated with Ivy & Varley of our commitment and realization of our obligation not only to meet, but to exceed, most existing privacy standards.
We reserve the right to make changes to this Policy at any given time. If you want to make sure that you are up to date with the latest changes, we advise you to frequently visit this page. If at any point in time Ivy & Varley decides to make use of any personally identifiable information on file, in a manner vastly different from that which was stated when this information was initially collected, the user or users shall be promptly notified by email. Users at that time shall have the option as to whether to permit the use of their information in this separate manner.
This Policy applies to Ivy & Varley, and it governs any and all data collection and usage by us. Through the use of https://ivyandvarley.com, you are therefore consenting to the data collection procedures expressed in this Policy.
Please note that this Policy does not govern the collection and use of information by companies that Ivy & Varley does not control, nor by individuals not employed or managed by us. If you visit a website that we mention or link to, be sure to review its privacy policy before providing the site with information. It is highly recommended and suggested that you review the privacy policies and statements of any website you choose to use or frequent to better understand the way in which websites garner, make use of and share the information collected.
Specifically, this Policy will inform you of the following:
1. What personally identifiable information is collected from you through our website;
2. Why we collect personally identifiable information and the legal basis for such collection;
3. How we use the collected information and with whom it may be shared;
4. What choices are available to you regarding the use of your data; and
5. The security procedures in place to protect the misuse of your information.
Information We Collect
It is always up to you whether to disclose personally identifiable information to us, although if you elect not to do so, we reserve the right not to register you as a user or provide you with any products or services. This website collects various types of information, such as:
• Voluntarily provided information which may include your name, address, email address, billing and/or credit card
information etc. which may be used when you purchase products and/or services and to deliver the services you have
requested.
• Information automatically collected when visiting our website, which may include cookies, third party tracking technologies and server logs.
In addition, Ivy & Varley may have the occasion to collect non-personal anonymous demographic information, such as age, gender, household income, political affiliation, race and religion, as well as the type of browser you are using, IP address, or type of operating system, which will assist us in providing and maintaining superior quality service.
Ivy & Varley may also deem it necessary, from time to time, to follow websites that our users may frequent to gleam what types of services and products may be the most popular to customers or the general public.
Please rest assured that this site will only collect personal information that you knowingly and willingly provide to us by way of surveys, completed membership forms, and emails. It is the intent of this site to use personal information only for the purpose for which it was requested, and any additional uses specifically provided for on this Policy.
Why We Collect Information and For How Long
We are collecting your data for several reasons:
• To better understand your needs and provide you with the services you have requested;
• To fulfill our legitimate interest in improving our services and products;
• To send you promotional emails containing information we think you may like when we have your consent to do so;
• To contact you to fill out surveys or participate in other types of market research, when we have your consent to do so;
• To customize our website according to your online behavior and personal preferences.
The data we collect from you will be stored for no longer than necessary. The length of time we retain said information will be determined based upon the following criteria: the length of time your personal information remains relevant; the length of time it is reasonable to keep records to demonstrate that we have fulfilled our duties and obligations; any limitation periods within which claims might be made; any retention periods prescribed by law or recommended by regulators, professional bodies or associations; the type of contract we have with you, the existence of your consent, and our legitimate interest in keeping such information as stated in this Policy.
Use of Information Collected
Ivy & Varley does not now, nor will it in the future, sell, rent or lease any of its customer lists and/or names to any third parties.
Ivy & Varley may collect and may make use of personal information to assist in the operation of our website and to ensure delivery of the services you need and request. At times, we may find it necessary to use personally identifiable information as a means to keep you informed of other possible products and/or services that may be available to you from https://ivyandvarley.com.
Ivy & Varley may also be in contact with you with regards to completing surveys and/or research questionnaires related to your opinion of current or potential future services that may be offered.
Ivy & Varley uses various third-party social media features including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube and other interactive programs. These may collect your IP address and require cookies to work properly . These services are governed by the privacy policies of the providers and are not within Ivy & Varley’s control.
Disclosure of Information
Ivy & Varley may not use or disclose the information provided by you except under the following circumstances:
• as necessary to provide services or products you have ordered;
• in other ways described in this Policy or to which you have otherwise consented;
• in the aggregate with other information in such a way so that your identity cannot reasonably be determined;
• as required by law, or in response to a subpoena or search warrant;
• to outside auditors who have agreed to keep the information confidential;
• as necessary to enforce the Terms of Service;
• as necessary to maintain, safeguard and preserve all the rights and property of Ivy & Varley.
Non-Marketing Purposes
Ivy & Varley greatly respects your privacy. We do maintain and reserve the right to contact you if needed for non-marketing purposes (such as bug alerts, security breaches, account issues, and/or changes in Ivy & Varley’s products and services). In certain circumstances, we may use our website, newspapers, or other public means to post a notice.
Children under the age of 13
Ivy & Varley’s website is not directed to, and does not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from, children under the age of thirteen (13). If it is determined that such information has been inadvertently collected on anyone under the age of thirteen (13), we shall immediately take the necessary steps to ensure that such information is deleted from our system’s database, or in the alternative, that verifiable parental consent is obtained for the use and storage of such information. Anyone under the age of thirteen (13) must seek and obtain parent or guardian permission to use this website.
Unsubscribe or Opt-Out
All users and visitors to our website have the option to discontinue receiving communications from us by way of email or newsletters. To discontinue or unsubscribe from our website please send an email that you wish to unsubscribe to
info@realine.com. If you wish to unsubscribe or opt-out from any third-party websites, you must go to that specific website to unsubscribe or opt-out. Ivy & Varley will continue to adhere to this Policy with respect to any personal information previously collected.
Links to Other Websites
Our website does contain links to affiliate and other websites. Ivy & Varley does not claim nor accept responsibility for any privacy policies, practices and/or procedures of other such websites. Therefore, we encourage all users and visitors to be aware when they leave our website and to read the privacy statements of every website that collects personally identifiable information. This Privacy Policy Agreement applies only and solely to the information collected by our website.
Notice to European Union Users
Ivy & Varley’s operations are located primarily in the United States. If you provide information to us, the information will be transferred out of the European Union (EU) and sent to the United States. (The adequacy decision on the EU-US Privacy became operational on August 1, 2016. This framework protects the fundamental rights of anyone in the EU whose personal data is transferred to the United States for commercial purposes. It allows the free transfer of data to companies that are certified in the US under the Privacy Shield.) By providing personal information to us, you are consenting to its storage and use as described in this Policy. Live Nite Events Presents takes precautions to protect your information. When you submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline. Wherever we collect sensitive information (e.g. credit card information), that information is encrypted and transmitted to us in a secure way. You can verify this by looking for a lock icon in the address bar and looking for “https” at the beginning of the address of the webpage. While we use encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online, we also protect your information offline. Only employees who need the information to perform a specific job (for example, billing or customer service) are granted access to personally identifiable information. The computers and servers in which we store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment. This is all done to prevent any loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure or modification of the user’s personal information under our control.
The company also uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) for authentication and private communications to build users’ trust and confidence in the internet and website use by providing simple and secure access and communication of credit card and personal information.
Acceptance of Terms
By using this website, you are hereby accepting the terms and conditions stipulated within the Privacy Policy Agreement. If you are not in agreement with our terms and conditions, then you should refrain from further use of our sites. In addition, your continued use of our website following the posting of any updates or changes to our terms and conditions shall mean that you agree and acceptance of such changes.
